subject: Fwd: Peer-to-Peer Learning Session on RAG, GANs & YOLO
snippet: Dear Students, Interested Students are requested to do the regiartion and attend the session. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Nirav Bhatt <hod.aiml@charusat.ac.in> Date: Mon, Mar 3,
content:
Dear Students,

Interested Students are requested to do the regiartion and attend the
session.


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Nirav Bhatt <hod.aiml@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Mon, Mar 3, 2025 at 3:06‚ÄØPM
Subject: Peer-to-Peer Learning Session on RAG, GANs & YOLO
To: Head IT CHARUSAT <hod.it@charusat.ac.in>, Head CSE <
hod.cse@charusat.ac.in>, Head CE CHARUSAT <hod.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Nikita
Bhatt <nikitabhatt.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Parth Shah <
parthshah.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Amit Thakkar <amitthakkar.it@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Sir,
Please share with 4th and 6th semester students.

Dear All,

I hope this email finds you well.

The students of the AIML Department, are excited to propose a peer-to-peer
learning session titled *"AI Frontiers: Unlocking the Future with RAG, GANs
& YOLO."* under the *Innovators Club.*This event is designed to introduce
the latest advancements in artificial intelligence through interactive
discussions and live demonstrations.

*Event Details:*
üìÖ *Date & Time:* Tuesday, March 4th | 2:00 - 4:20 PM
üìç *Venue:* 324-C, AIML Department, A6 Building.

*Objective:*

   - Educate students on Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), Generative
   Adversarial Networks (GANs), and You Only Look Once (YOLO).
   - Provide hands-on experience with live demonstrations.
   - Encourage peer-to-peer learning and knowledge sharing.
   - Boost confidence among students in AI applications.

*Event Format:*

1Ô∏è‚É£ *Theoretical Introduction* ‚Äì Core concepts of RAG, GANs, and YOLO.
2Ô∏è‚É£ *Live Demonstrations* ‚Äì Hands-on implementation of these technologies.
3Ô∏è‚É£ *Q&A & Interactive Session* ‚Äì Addressing queries and practical doubts.

*Registration Link:*
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScIJCPkc3WdxaQzIpq72NlEU7YUR1FWPld3g4yGxz6WC91Ajw/viewform?usp=dialog.
(Kindly register before 12:10 PM tomorrow)

*Note : *You are advised to bring your laptop for Hands - on implementation.

--

subject: Subject: Invitation for application on Live Project ‚Äì "Skill-Augmentation Portal" (Batch 2024)
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to invite applications for a live project opportunity, "Skill-Augmentation Portal," designed specifically for the 2024 batch students. This portal will help in
content:
Dear Students,

We are excited to invite applications for a live project opportunity,
*"Skill-Augmentation
Portal,"* designed specifically for the *2024 batch* students. This portal
will help in calculating event points and keeping track of records
efficiently. The project deals with *FTE-level data*, offering immense
learning potential in both front-end and back-end development.
*Technology Stack:*

   - *Front-end:* React, HTML, CSS
   - *Back-end:* Node.js
   - *Database:* PostgreSQL
   - *ORM *: Prisma

This is a great opportunity for students looking to gain *hands-on
experience* in full-stack development.
*How to Apply?*

Interested students must fill out the attached *Google Form* for the
selection process.

üîπ *Last date to apply:* *08-03-2025*

üîπ *Google Form:*  Click Here <https://forms.gle/ZFLyuDnYZs36agiV6>

For any queries, feel free to contact me.

Looking forward to your participation!

Best regards,

-- 
*Thanks & Regards *
*-----------------------------------*

*Ronak R Patel,*

*Assistant Professor,*
*U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,*
*Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,*
*CHARUSAT, Changa, Gujarat - 388421*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC*

--

subject: TRAINING AND INTERNSHIP DRIVE WITH PLACEMENT ASSISTANCE
snippet: Dear Student, Secure a place in LaunchED Global prestigious 2-Month Training + Internship Program with the credential of WIPRO DICE ID certification. STUDENT WILL RECEIVE: Comprehensive Training &
content:
*Dear Student,*

*Secure a place in LaunchED Global prestigious **2-Month Training +
Internship Program *with the credential of* WIPRO DICE ID *certification.
*STUDENT WILL RECEIVE:*

   1. *Comprehensive Training & Mentorship*
      - *Month 1:* Live interactive sessions with industry leaders using
      your personalized learning portal.
      - *Month 2:* Real-world internship projects under the guidance of
      experts.
   2. *Industry-Recognized Certifications*
      - Course Completion Certificate.
      - Internship Certificate from *top MNCs* verified by Wipro Dice ID.
   3. *Professional Skill Development*
      - Gain expertise in cutting-edge technologies like *Generative
AI*, *Prompt
      Engineering*, and *Low/No-Code Applications*.
      - Exclusive guest lectures from leaders at *Microsoft* and *Meta*.

*Exclusive Benefits:*

   - A* 6-month *access to an* LMS portal* with personalized options.
   - *Placement assistance* through a dedicated growth community.
   - 24/7 *personalized mentorship* and live doubt-clearing sessions.

*Application Details: *

   - *First come first serve*
   - *Application Form:* *https://forms.gle/fMsqcKp26ZbqxmPg6*
   <https://forms.gle/fMsqcKp26ZbqxmPg6>

*Stay Updated:*

This program is a stepping stone for those aspiring to *excel in their
careers*. Don‚Äôt miss this opportunity to *enhance your skills* and *gain
credentials* recognized by leading industries.

*For those already enrolled, please disregard this email.*

Best regards,
*LaunchED Global*

snippet: Interested Students are requested to do the registration. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Head IT DEPSTAR CHARUSAT <hod.itds@charusat.ac.in> Date: Sat, Mar 1, 2025 at 4:33 PM Subject
content:
Interested Students are requested to do the registration.


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Head IT DEPSTAR CHARUSAT <hod.itds@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Sat, Mar 1, 2025 at 4:33‚ÄØPM
Subject: Fwd: Endowment Chair Activity - Department Of Information
Technology -DEPSTAR -FTE, CHARUSAT
To: Parth Shah <parthshah.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Amit Thakkar <
amitthakkar.it@charusat.ac.in>, Nirav Bhatt <niravbhatt.it@charusat.ac.in>,

dharmendrapatel.mca@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>, Dean FTE CHARUSAT
<dean.fte@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Sir/Madam,

Greetings from the Department Of Information Technology -DEPSTAR - FTE,
CHARUSAT !!

Department Of Information Technology - DEPSTAR - FTE, CHARUSAT is
organizing an endowment chair activity* on Cloud Computing during 07-08
March 2025.*

This event will feature expert sessions by *Mr. Bhavesh Shah*, *Cloud
Practice Lead at Intuitive.Cloud*. With over 15 years of IT experience, Mr.
Shah specializes in cloud migration, presales, and solution architecture.
He has successfully built a $6M cloud practice and led large-scale AWS
migrations for global enterprises, achieving significant cost optimizations
and scalable solutions.

We cordially invite faculty members, research scholars, and students to
participate in this enriching academic event, which promises to deliver
valuable insights and hands-on experience in cutting-edge *Cloud Computing*
topics.

*Registration: *
Kindly register by *March 05, 2025*, using the link below:
https://forms.gle/JeRStGUpGmeFnASw6

We look forward to your active participation in making this event a grand
success.

Please find the attached brief profile of the expert.

Thank You

--

subject: Join Us for the UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University! üåç
snippet: Dear All, We're excited to announce the upcoming UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University on February 28th ‚Äì a must-attend event for students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú® Here's
content:
>
> Dear All,
>
> We‚Äôre excited to announce the upcoming *UniExplore 2.0 International Fair*
>  at *Charusat University* on *February 28th* ‚Äì a must-attend event for
> students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú®
>
> *Here‚Äôs what you can look forward to:*
>
>    1.
>
>    *On-the-Spot Counseling*
>    Direct guidance from university representatives, answering all your
>    study abroad questions.
>    2.
>
>    *Complete Guidance for Education Loans*
>    Get a clear understanding of the documentation and loan process
>    step-by-step.
>    3.
>
>    *Exclusive Scholarships*
>    Discover scholarship opportunities for studying in top destinations
>    like the *USA, UK, Canada, NZ, Australia*, and *Germany*.
>    4.
>
>    *One-to-One Profile Evaluation*
>    After pre-counseling, meet university reps tailored to your profile
>    for more personalized advice.
>
> This event is a your *gateway to transforming their future* and gaining
> clarity about your educational journey.
>
> *üìå Don‚Äôt miss out!*
> Mark your calendars for *February 28th*, and take your first step toward

snippet: Students are requested to participate. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Hackathon NMIT <hackathon@nmit.ac.in> Date: Thu, Feb 27, 2025, 7:26 PM Subject: Hackathon Invitation | NMIT
content:
Students are requested to participate.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Hackathon NMIT <hackathon@nmit.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Feb 27, 2025, 7:26 PM
Subject: Hackathon Invitation | NMIT HACKS 2025 | Nitte Meenakshi Institute
of Technology
To:


[image: Image]
[image: Image]

Greetings from the Department of CSE, NMIT!



The Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Nitte Meenakshi
Institute of Technology, Bangalore, is excited to announce the *8th edition
of our National-Level Flagship Hackathon ‚Äì NMIT Hacks 2025*, scheduled to
take place from *May 16th to 18th, 2025*.

We extend a warm invitation to your students to participate in this
prestigious event, where they will have the opportunity to collaborate with
like-minded peers, develop innovative solutions to real-world problems, and
receive mentorship from *industry experts*.



We sincerely request you to encourage students from your esteemed
institution to participate in this dynamic and competitive event.




*Why Participate?*

Following the overwhelming success of *NMIT Hacks 2024*, we aim to make
this edition even bigger and better. Here are some highlights from last
year:

üìå *2200+ Applications Received*
üìå *1300+ Idea Submissions*
üìå *170 Finalists Competing On-Site*
üìå *15+ Industry Expert Mentors*
üìå *‚Çπ1,50,000+ Total Prize Pool*
üìå *National-Level Exposure & Networking*


*Flexible Problem Statements*



Participants have the freedom to propose and work on their own problem
statements, fostering creativity and originality in their solutions.

*NMIT Hacks 2025* promises an unparalleled learning experience, where
participants will engage with cutting-edge technologies, tackle impactful
challenges, and showcase their talents to potential recruiters and
investors.
*Registration & More Information*



For event details, problem statements, and registration, please visit our
official website or register directly at https://nmithacks25.devfolio.co/.



For any inquiries, please feel free to contact us:
üìß *hackathon@nmit.ac.in*



We look forward to welcoming participants from your institution to *NMIT
Hacks 2025*!



*Warm Regards,*
*Team NMIT Hacks*


*Visit Website* <https://nmithacks.com/>

<https://www.linkedin.com/company/nmit-hacks/posts/?feedView=all>

subject: Cyber Security Fundamental Session: 8th March
snippet: Dear all Greetings! U & PU. Patel Department of Computer Engineering - Cyber Security Club is going to organize the first session in workshop offline mode on 8th March Saturday from 9:30 AM to 2:00
content:
Dear all
Greetings!

U & PU. Patel Department of Computer Engineering - Cyber Security Club is
going  to organize the first session in workshop offline mode on *8th March
Saturday from 9:30 AM to 2:00 PM.*

The session is specifically desired for first year students to give
fundamentals and practical exposure of networking and cyber
security domains.

*Contents:*

   - Networking Fundamentals: IP, Port, DNS, Local Hosting of Web Page
   - Cyber Security: Fundamentals, Tools, Ethical Hacking

subject: Welcome to the CodeChef community
snippet: Hey shreeja vaishnani, I am really happy to know that you have joined CodeChef. CodeChef is on a mission to help you learn and practice computer science in the most fun and engaging way. A lot of
content:
Hey shreeja vaishnani,

I am really happy to know that you have joined CodeChef.

CodeChef is on a mission to help you learn and practice computer science in the most fun and engaging way.

A lot of students ask me for advice on how to use CodeChef or learn programming in general.

At CodeChef, we always had an opinionated view on this. We think that you learn best by applying what you have learned. Most students I see keep taking one course or another but can never actually retain the content after the course is over.

On CodeChef you will find less theory and a lot of practice, so that you never forget what you learn.

If you don't know programming start with any programming language course, because that is the first step. Then go on to learn logic building, data structures, algorithms, etc.


You can find all our courses here - https://www.codechef.com/learn


All of these courses are free to preview, but you have to buy Pro to complete the course and gain a certificate. We have put a lot of hard work in building these courses, and hope you will love them.


Regards,

Aniruddh

Product Head - CodeChef


You are receiving this email as you are active on CodeChef. If you do not want to receive such emails you can unsubscribe here.

snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to introduce the first edition of TECHNOVA, the biannual newsletter of the U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering. This newsletter showcases the
content:
*Dear Students, *

We are excited to introduce the first edition of *TECHNOVA*, the biannual
newsletter of the *U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering*. This
newsletter showcases the achievements, events, and progress of our students
and faculty, reflecting our department‚Äôs growth.

A big thank you to our editorial team *Dr. Sneha Padhiar* along with *Prachi
Desai (22CE025), Jay Khetani (23CE057), Satyam Charola (22CE016)* for their
hard work in compiling and designing this edition.

The growth of any department or institute is driven by the *hard work,
dedication, and sincerity* of its students. We sincerely appreciate each
one of you for your contributions to our department‚Äôs progress.

*Together, we grow and achieve more!*

We look forward to your continued support and cooperation in the future.

snippet: Dear All!! I hope this message finds you well. As part of our Women's Day celebrations, we are excited to announce that we are organizing a marathon for all CHARUSAT family members. This event aims
content:
Dear All!!

I hope this message finds you well. As part of our Women‚Äôs Day
celebrations, we are excited to announce that we are organizing a marathon
for all CHARUSAT family members. This event aims to promote health,
celebrate women‚Äôs empowerment, and foster community spirit.

 Here are the details:



   -  *Date* : 8th March 2025 (i.e. Saturday)


   -  *Location*: CHARUSAT University to Changa Village


This is a great opportunity to engage with the community and inspire each
other. Your participation will contribute to a meaningful celebration of
women‚Äôs day. We will  give an exciting gift to the winner and participation
certificate to both category participants.


Together, we can ensure a memorable experience for everyone involved.


Registration is compulsory on below link till  27th Feb 2025  :

subject: Fwd: „Äê2 days left„ÄëRegister for Hack the Future 2025 ‚Äì Hackathon for Solving Real-World Challenges with AI & Data
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Gayatri Patel <gayatripatel.ph@charusat.ac.in> Date: Wed, 26 Feb 2025 at 20:12 Subject: Fwd: „Äê2 days left„ÄëRegister for Hack the Future 2025 ‚Äì
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Gayatri Patel <gayatripatel.ph@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, 26 Feb 2025 at 20:12
Subject: Fwd: „Äê2 days left„ÄëRegister for Hack the Future 2025 ‚Äì Hackathon
for Solving Real-World Challenges with AI & Data

This is for your information and further action.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: IIEC IIT Gandhinagar <iiec@iitgn.ac.in>
Date: Wed, 26 Feb, 2025, 19:50
Subject: „Äê2 days left„ÄëRegister for Hack the Future 2025 ‚Äì Hackathon for
Solving Real-World Challenges with AI & Data
To:


Dear friends and Innovators,


Greetings from the IIT Gandhinagar Innovation and Entrepreneurship Center
(IIEC)!


We are thrilled to invite you to *Hack the Future 2025: Innovating
Intelligent Data Insights*, a national-level hackathon organized by IIEC,
IIT Gandhinagar, in collaboration with the *Ministry of Statistics and
Programme Implementation (MoSPI), Government of India*.


This *36-hour immersive challenge*, scheduled for *March 21‚Äì23, 2025*, at
IIEC, IIT Gandhinagar, will bring together developers, designers,
innovators, and students to leverage *AI and data science* in addressing
critical socio-economic and development challenges using publicly available
data.



*Why Participate?*

‚úÖ *Solve Real-World Problems:* Tackle challenges curated by MoSPI,
Government of India, and contribute to meaningful solutions.
üèÜ *Win Exciting Prizes:*

   - *1st Place:* ‚Çπ2,50,000
   - *2nd Place:* ‚Çπ1,50,000
   - *3rd Place:* ‚Çπ1,00,000
   - *2 Special Mentions:* ‚Çπ35,000 each
   üöÄ *Incubation & Piloting Opportunities:* Selected projects may be
   incubated at IIEC, IIT Gandhinagar, and piloted in collaboration with MoSPI.
   üöÄ *Network & Learn:* Connect with industry experts, policymakers, and
   fellow innovators to expand your horizons.


*Key Dates*

üìÖ *Application Window:* February 7‚Äì28, 2025
üì¢ *Shortlisted Participants Announced:* March 5, 2025
üí° *Hackathon & Pitching Event:* March 21‚Äì23, 2025


If you are passionate about *AI, data science, and innovation*, this is
your opportunity to showcase your skills, collaborate with like-minded
individuals, and create a lasting impact.


*Take the First Step*

üîó *Apply Now <https://form.jotform.com/250342766778468>*
üì© *For inquiries:* iiec@iitgn.ac.in | *Visit Us
<https://chat.deepseek.com/a/chat/s/127f9456-4fc6-47ab-bf6e-760519fe586c>*


We can‚Äôt wait to see your groundbreaking ideas at *Hack the Future 2025*!



Warm regards,
*Team IIEC*


-- 
Prof. Ritesh Patel, Ph.D.
Professor CE Dept, CSPIT, CHARUSAT
Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC
Contact Number: 02697-265353

https://sites.google.com/charusat.ac.in/e-governance

https://sites.google.com/charusat.ac.in/riteshpatel/

Dear All,

*The Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Department at Charotar
University of Science and Technology is pleased to invite you to
participate in our upcoming Equal Opportunity Cell (EOC) Activity on the
theme "**AI for Social Good ‚Äì Solving Real-World Issues**"*
Date: 7th March 2025
Timing: 12:00 to 2:00 pm
Registration Link: https://forms.gle/4dnzcafVqqNKr8cd9
Rules:

   -

   Students may present AI-based solutions for improving daily life,
   supporting disabled individuals, enhancing healthcare, or addressing social
   causes.
   -

   Students may submit their ideas in a group of up to 3 members.
   -

   Poster Presentation size: A2 *(presentation format is attached
   herewith.)*
   -

   The poster presentation must be in hard copy.

*Exciting Prizes:*

*1st Prize: ‚Çπ1500/-*

*2nd Prize: ‚Çπ1000/-*
*3rd Prize: ‚Çπ500/-*

   - All participants will receive an e-Certificate of Participation.

We request your kind cooperation and adherence to the above rules to ensure
the smooth conduct of the event.



-


*Thanks and Regards,*


*Gaurang A. Patel*

*Assistant Professor*

Department of Mechanical Engineering

Functional Dept: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning

Charotar University of Science & Technology

Accredited *Grade A+* by NAAC

subject: Arthyantra Recruitment ‚Äì Apply Now for Board Member Positions
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Students, Arthyantra, the Economics Club of CHARUSAT, is now accepting applications for new team members. This is an opportunity to gain experience in content creation, social media
content:
Dear CHARUSAT Students,

Arthyantra, the Economics Club of CHARUSAT, is now accepting applications
for new team members. This is an opportunity to gain experience in content
creation, social media management, finance, research, and event
coordination while contributing to the club‚Äôs initiatives.

Interested students are required to fill out the Google Form
<https://forms.gle/Aw6fUvSJvebp82tp8> by March 1st. Shortlisted candidates
will be invited for in-person interviews as the next stage of selection.

subject: Don‚Äôt Miss Out: Join Us for the UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University! üåç
snippet: Dear All, We're excited to announce the upcoming UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University on February 28th ‚Äì a must-attend event for students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú® Here's
content:
Dear All,

We‚Äôre excited to announce the upcoming *UniExplore 2.0 International Fair*
 at *Charusat University* on *February 28th* ‚Äì a must-attend event for
students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú®

*Here‚Äôs what you can look forward to:*

   1.

   *On-the-Spot Counseling*
   Direct guidance from university representatives, answering all your
   study abroad questions.
   2.

   *Complete Guidance for Education Loans*
   Get a clear understanding of the documentation and loan process
   step-by-step.
   3.

   *Exclusive Scholarships*
   Discover scholarship opportunities for studying in top destinations like
   the *USA, UK, Canada, NZ, Australia*, and *Germany*.
   4.

   *One-to-One Profile Evaluation*
   After pre-counseling, meet university reps tailored to your profile for
   more personalized advice.

This event is a your *gateway to transforming their future* and gaining
clarity about your educational journey.

*üìå Don‚Äôt miss out!*
Mark your calendars for *February 28th*, and take your first step toward
international education.

*To register, click the link below*:
*Register Now* <https://arisoverseas.com/uniexplore/>
*Venue: Central Lawn, CHARUSAT*
*Time: 10.00 A.M to 03.00 P.M*
*Date: 28 FEB 2025*

We look forward to seeing you there and helping you take the next big step
in students academic journey!

*Thanks & Regards,**Career Development and Placement Cell (CDPC)*
*Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT) *
AT: Changa, Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat
(T) 02697-265213

--

subject: Fwd: Students' active participation in 6th Edition - Smart Gujarat Hackathon
snippet: Dear students, Find the deatiled emaiil regarding Smart Gujarat Hackathon. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Student Start-up and Innovation Policy (GoG- Education Dept.) <ssip@gujarat.
content:
Dear students,

Find the deatiled emaiil regarding Smart Gujarat Hackathon.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Student Start-up and Innovation Policy (GoG- Education Dept.) <
ssip@gujarat.gov.in>
Date: Sat, 22 Feb 2025, 07:40
Subject: Students' active participation in 6th Edition - Smart Gujarat
Hackathon

Dear,

The Education Department, Gujarat has been doing persistent efforts to
institutionalize the Innovation & Startup Ecosystem in the State through
policy, platform, and processes. To augment the support system for
nurturing student Start-ups in the State, second edition of Student
Start-up and Innovation Policy (SSIP 2.0) was launched on 05 January 2022.

Under the Policy, various flagship initiatives have been envisaged through
which youth can get adequate opportunities to harness their creative
potential. We have pioneered various Open Innovation Programmes like
hackathon and executed them at a large-scale.

The 6th Edition *of ‚ÄúSmart Gujarat Hackathon‚Äù with special focus on
Artificial Intelligence* will be a step forward towards building smart and
sustainable solutions to complex challenges. In this edition of hackathon
around 15,000 students are expected to participate and work on problem
statements. Challenges from various departments of the State Government,
Public Sector Undertakings, Municipal Corporations, District Collectorate,
District Panchayats and industries will be broadcasted to students across
universities, institutes, and schools.

The program will feature problem statements from various sectors providing
students with ample opportunities to engage in *Artificial Intelligence and
other emerging technology-based solution- oriented *projects. Moreover,
winning teams will not only receive cash prizes but also invaluable
mentorship support from nodal officers of government departments and
benefits from education department of Government of Gujarat, further
encouraging their pursuit of innovation and excellence.

We request all students from your institute to actively participate in 6th
edition of ‚ÄúSmart Gujarat Hackathon‚Äù. This event presents a fantastic
opportunity for students to showcase their problem-solving skills and
innovative thinking. To get more details and further update regarding
registration process and list of sectors students can visit the following
link: https://ssipgujarat.in/hackathon. Teams must select a problem
statement online after registration and login in the portal.

Last date for Team registration is *10th March 2025* and synopsis
Submission is *14th March 2025*.

Kindly share this with all your students and faculty members so that they
can participate in this event. For any query, please revert us at
ssipgujarat@gmail.com


*Team Hackathon*


Student Start-up and Innovation Policy

Education Department, Government of Gujarat

3rd Floor, Block No:2 ,Karmayogi Bhavan

Sector 10-A 382010

This message contains confidential information and is intended only
for the individual named. If you are not the named addressee you
should not disseminate, distribute or copy this e-mail. Please notify
the sender immediately by e-mail if you have received this e-mail by
mistake and delete this e-mail from your system. E-mail transmission
cannot be guaranteed to be secure or error-free as information could
be intercepted, corrupted, lost, destroyed, arrive late or incomplete,
or contain viruses. The sender therefore does not accept liability for
any error or omissions in the contents of this message, which arise as
a result of e-mail transmission.



-- 
*Regards*

*Trusha R. Patel*
Assistant Professor
Institutional Coordinator of *CSIC *, *IQAC *, *OBE* , *Central Students
Council*
Computer Engineering Department, CSPIT, CHARUSAT, Changa, Anand, Gujarat,
India

*Contact :* (O) 02697-265325

subject: Fwd: üìÖ Don‚Äôt Miss Out: Join Us for the UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University! üåç
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: CDPC CHARUSAT <cdpc@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, Feb 20, 2025 at 2:31 PM Subject: üìÖ Don't Miss Out: Join Us for the UniExplore 2.0 International
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: CDPC CHARUSAT <cdpc@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Feb 20, 2025 at 2:31‚ÄØPM
Subject: üìÖ Don‚Äôt Miss Out: Join Us for the UniExplore 2.0 International
Fair at Charusat University! üåç



Dear All,

We‚Äôre excited to announce the upcoming *UniExplore 2.0 International Fair*
 at *Charusat University* on *February 28th* ‚Äì a must-attend event for
students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú®

*Here‚Äôs what you can look forward to:*

   1.

   *On-the-Spot Counseling*
   Direct guidance from university representatives, answering all your
   study abroad questions.
   2.

   *Complete Guidance for Education Loans*
   Get a clear understanding of the documentation and loan process
   step-by-step.
   3.

   *Exclusive Scholarships*
   Discover scholarship opportunities for studying in top destinations like
   the *USA, UK, Canada, NZ, Australia*, and *Germany*.
   4.

   *One-to-One Profile Evaluation*
   After pre-counseling, meet university reps tailored to your profile for
   more personalized advice.

This event is a your *gateway to transforming their future* and gaining
clarity about your educational journey.

*üìå Don‚Äôt miss out!*
Mark your calendars for *February 28th*, and take your first step toward
international education.

*To register, click the link below*:
*Register Now* <https://arisoverseas.com/uniexplore/>
*Venue: Central Lawn, CHARUSAT*
*Time: 10.00 A.M to 03.00 P.M*
*Date: 28 FEB 2025*

We look forward to seeing you there and helping you take the next big step
in students academic journey!

also, Please Forward this to all year Students and encourage them to
Participate!

*Thanks & Regards,*
*Career Development and Placement Cell (CDPC)*
*Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT) *
AT: Changa, Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat
(T) 02697-265213

subject: INFO_STUDENT NOTICE
snippet: Dear Student of ‚Äé‚ÄéCHARUSAT University, This is an exclusive opportunity to elevate your skills and jumpstart your career with the LaunchED 2-Month Training + Internship Program, in collaboration with
content:
Dear Student of  ‚Äé‚Äé*CHARUSAT University*,

This is an exclusive opportunity to elevate your skills and jumpstart your
career with the LaunchED 2-Month Training + Internship Program, in
collaboration with Wipro Dice ID AICTE Certification.
üöÄ  *Application Deadline: 12:00 PM [23-02-2025]*
------------------------------

*üìã Application Form : *  https://forms.gle/dGvdjim8GEmwHrSD8
*‚úÖReferral ID:*‚Äé*CHARUSAT**_DICE ID  (FOR*‚Äé *CHARUSAT* *STUDENTS ONLY)*
------------------------------

*What You‚Äôll Gain:*

   1.

   *Comprehensive Training & Mentorship*
   - *Month 1*: Interactive, live sessions with industry leaders through
      your personalized learning portal.
      - *Month 2*: Real-world internship projects, providing you with the
      guidance of industry experts.
   2.

   *Industry-Recognized Certifications*
   - *Course Completion Certificate* from Lanched Global .
      - *Internship Certificate* from top MNCs, verified by Wipro DICE ID.
   3.

   *Professional Skill Development*
   - Master cutting-edge technologies such as *Generative AI*, *Prompt
      Engineering*, and *Low/No-Code Applications*.
      - Attend exclusive guest lectures from leaders at *Microsoft* and
      *Meta*.
   4.

   *Exclusive Benefits*
   - *6-month access* to a comprehensive LMS portal with personalized
      learning options.
      - *Placement Assistance* through a dedicated growth community.
      - *24/7 personalized mentorship* and live doubt-clearing sessions to
      ensure you are on track.

This program is designed to provide you with an invaluable opportunity to
gain practical knowledge and industry credentials that will set you apart
in today‚Äôs competitive job market.
*Why You Should Apply Now:*

   - Gain unparalleled mentorship and guidance from top industry leaders.
   - Improve your employability with certifications that are globally
   recognized.
   - Access exclusive internship opportunities that can lead to exciting
   career prospects.

* Apply before the deadline to secure your place.*

For students who are already enrolled, please disregard this message.

Best regards,
*LaunchED Global*

subject: Seating Arrangement : Internal Examination (Sessional - 1) March 2025
snippet: Dear Students, Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in the email attachment. Students are required to uphold decorum in the examination hall. Mobile phones, smartwatches,
content:
Dear Students,

Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in the
email attachment. Students are required to uphold decorum in
the examination hall. Mobile phones, smartwatches, or any other electronic
devices are strictly prohibited within the exam hall. Bags must be left
outside, and it is mandatory to wear an ID card. Students have to take
their seat in the exam hall at least 15 minutes prior to the exam time. At
10:15 AM the entry gate will be closed and after 10:20 AM no one will be
allowed to enter the examination hall.


*The exam will take place in Exam Hall 201 (first floor) and 301 (second
floor) of Multi Utility Complex.*


Thanks and regards,
Dhaval Bhoi
Assistant Professor,
U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT, Changa.
Ta-Petlad Dist.Anand
PIN-388421 GUJARAT, INDIA

--

Dear All,

Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR), FTE,
CHARUSAT has organized a talk on *"Web Application Security: Identifying
and Mitigating Vulnerabilities"*  with an objective to equip students with
skills to secure web applications from various kinds of vulnerabilities.

The expert of the talk is* Mr. Gatin Shah, Application Security Specialist,
UBS, Pune.*

You may refer to his profile on: https://www.linkedin.com/in/gatinshah/

The session will be held online, and registered participants will receive a
joining link ahead of the scheduled talk.

*Event Details:*

    Day & Date: Saturday, March 01, 2025
    Time: 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM

To register, please click on the following link:
https://forms.gle/zuYfbpV8rEJF8z8r8

to dive into this rapidly evolving domain.

2. Dr. Khushi Patel: +917698617608 | khushipatel.ce@charusat.ac.in

--

*Dr. Premal J. Patel,*

*DEPSTAR (CE).*

subject: Summer Internship Enrollment For CHARUSAT Students
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Props! on being shortlisted for the Internship Program! As mentioned above, Launched Global, in collaboration with MNCs and Emerging Startup, is organizing a Two-Month Training
content:
Dear  *CHARUSAT*  Student, Props! on being shortlisted for the Internship
Program!

As mentioned above, *Launched Global*, in collaboration with MNCs and
Emerging Startup, is organizing a Two-Month Training and internship
program designed by MNC mentors.

*Interested students fill out the form, if you get shortlisted you will get
a call from our HR Team;*
MAKE SURE TO FILL THE GOOGLE FORM

*Application:*
*https://forms.gle/S28cPpz7RYEzw5L79 <https://forms.gle/S28cPpz7RYEzw5L79>*
*Whatsapp: **https://chat.whatsapp.com/KO3e082trNW85gTYdSZKLe
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/KO3e082trNW85gTYdSZKLe>*


*Top Preferred Courses: *
‚úÖ



*Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine Learning.‚úÖ Cloud
Computing.*
*‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.*

*Here is an outline of the program's structure.*

*First month: *During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the form of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will have access to your own *LMS Portal*,
where you can interact with the trainers and fellow students. Login
credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project**: *The minor project is an individual project, where
students will work on projects related to each topic they are learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE): *The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with all the required
data and materials for the project.


*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :*
‚úÖ
*Program completion certificate issued by the Launched Global‚úÖ Co-Branded
Internship certificate verified by the WIPRO DICE ID.*
*‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation from Company.*
*‚úÖ Access to a growth community.*
*‚úÖ A certificate that is valid to show in Placement.*

content:
Dear Students,
As I have observed, there are many duplicate entries in the Projects
selections even in the same division, i*t is not allowed (including in both
the division). *so all have to fill up the google form using the following
link.

https://forms.gle/ZFuSt2YLWbWdGRmz8

You can check the Project taken by students using below link.
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1hDqbW-e-DNoe5f8ynDyumZ1N1c_QBNKOpnA70-dPMLM/edit?usp=sharing

Duplicate entry is not allowed. so check the spread sheet and once a
project is taken by any group, you must have to select other project.

All are requested to select different title not necessary very complex, but
it must be hardware based only.
Last date is 20-2-25.

subject: LaunchED Global TRAINING & INTERNSHIP for CHARUSAT Students
snippet: DEAR CHARUSAT STUDENT [Internship program with LaunchED Global KSHITIJ IIT KHARAGPUR] [WIPRO DICE ID CERTIFICATION] LaunchED in Collaboration with KSHITIJ IIT KHARAGPUR is organizing a 2 Months
content:
DEAR* CHARUSAT *STUDENT


*[Internship program with LaunchED Global KSHITIJ IIT KHARAGPUR] [WIPRO
DICE ID CERTIFICATION]*


*LaunchED in Collaboration with KSHITIJ IIT KHARAGPUR is organizing a 2
Months Training + Internship program. We are enrolling only LIMITED
STUDENTS in the program*
*APPLICATION:-* *https://forms.gle/HdLDJbWdPSA7nRdQ9*
<https://forms.gle/HdLDJbWdPSA7nRdQ9>

*JOIN HERE:*-*https://chat.whatsapp.com/FoCH2ksmzC31ogZEhbaMTy*
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/FoCH2ksmzC31ogZEhbaMTy>


*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*
*First month:* IIT training has been designed in the form of Live lectures
along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will be giving students experience
in solving real-world problems.

*Project 1:- *10 individual projects assigned to each intern which they
have to complete with their mentor .

*Project 2:- * Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a group
of 15 interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them
they have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

*Here are two types of Classes we are providing:*

*1. Blended Program/Recorded classes:* You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear it in live doubt clearing sessions
which will be organized every weekend.

*2. Mentor-led/Live classes: *You will be having live Zoom classes at 6:30
PM  for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well
LMS(Learning Management System) portal which you will have access to for 6
months.

After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a:

‚úÖProgram completion certificate issued by IIT KHARAGPUR.
‚úÖCo-Branded Internship certificate from Top MNCs.
‚úÖAccess to a growing community.

*The students must fill out the form to get this opportunity:*
*https://forms.gle/HdLDJbWdPSA7nRdQ9 <https://forms.gle/HdLDJbWdPSA7nRdQ9>*

Date: Mon, Feb 17, 2025 at 2:37‚ÄØPM
Subject: Register for Hack the Future 2025 ‚Äì Hackathon for Solving
Real-World Challenges with AI & Data
To:


Dear Innovator,


Greetings from the IIT Gandhinagar Innovation and Entrepreneurship Center
(IIEC)!


We are thrilled to invite you to *Hack the Future 2025: Innovating
Intelligent Data Insights*, a national-level hackathon organized by IIEC,
IIT Gandhinagar, in collaboration with the *Ministry of Statistics and
Programme Implementation (MoSPI), Government of India*.


This *36-hour immersive challenge*, scheduled for *March 21‚Äì23, 2025*, at
IIEC, IIT Gandhinagar, will bring together developers, designers,
innovators, and students to leverage *AI and data science* in addressing
critical socio-economic and development challenges using publicly available
data.



*Why Participate?*

‚úÖ *Solve Real-World Problems:* Tackle challenges curated by MoSPI,
Government of India, and contribute to meaningful solutions.
üèÜ *Win Exciting Prizes:*

   - *1st Place:* ‚Çπ2,50,000
   - *2nd Place:* ‚Çπ1,50,000
   - *3rd Place:* ‚Çπ1,00,000
   - *2 Special Mentions:* ‚Çπ35,000 each
   üöÄ *Incubation & Piloting Opportunities:* Selected projects may be
   incubated at IIEC, IIT Gandhinagar, and piloted in collaboration with MoSPI.
   üöÄ *Network & Learn:* Connect with industry experts, policymakers, and
   fellow innovators to expand your horizons.


*Key Dates*

üìÖ *Application Window:* February 7‚Äì28, 2025
üì¢ *Shortlisted Participants Announced:* March 5, 2025
üí° *Hackathon & Pitching Event:* March 21‚Äì23, 2025


If you are passionate about *AI, data science, and innovation*, this is
your opportunity to showcase your skills, collaborate with like-minded
individuals, and create a lasting impact.


*Take the First Step*

üîó *Apply Now <https://form.jotform.com/250342766778468>*
üì© *For inquiries:* iiec@iitgn.ac.in | *Visit Us
<https://chat.deepseek.com/a/chat/s/127f9456-4fc6-47ab-bf6e-760519fe586c>*


We can‚Äôt wait to see your groundbreaking ideas at *Hack the Future 2025*!



Warm regards,
*Team IIEC*


-- 
*Regards,*

*Nirav Bhatt*

subject: CHARUSAT | FoH | Story Narrating Competition
snippet: Foundation Day 2025 Story Narrating Competition 2025 Jointly organized by Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management [IIIM] & Faculty of Humanities [FoH] "Unleash Your Imagination, Let Your
content:
[Foundation Day 2025]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ba137rl8rs736/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/20986db598676eb1ed549684c002d31f5728889c]


STORY NARRATING COMPETITION 2025

 Jointly organized by 

INDUKAKA IPCOWALA INSTITUTE OF MANAGEMENT [IIIM]
&
FACULTY OF HUMANITIES [FOH]

"Unleash Your Imagination, Let Your Story Shine!"

"Storytelling is an age-old art that captivates audiences, stimulates
imagination, and preserves cultural heritage. Join us in this exciting
event where stories come to life, imagination knows no bounds, and
voices create unforgettable experiences!" 

üåü ABOUT THE EVENT

STORY NARRATING COMPETITION 2025, organized under the theme
INDIAN KNOWLEDGE SYSTEM, is here to celebrate creativity, culture, and
storytelling!

üìÖ DATE & TIME: February 21, 2025 | 10:30 AM onwards 

üé≠ REGISTRATION DETAILS

 	* REGISTER BY: February 20, 2025
 	* STORY THEME: Folk Tales, Inspirational Stories, Mythological
Tales, or Fictional Narratives

Register Now
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ba137rl8rs736/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/deffdbff2458022a5a6fc21a81761850f8a7161d]


üèÜ AWARDS & CERTIFICATIONS

 	* üèÖ WINNER & RUNNER-UP: Trophy
 	* üìú ALL PARTICIPANTS: Participation Certificate
 	* EVENT CONVENORS: Dr. Binit Patel | Dr. Bhaskar Pandya
 	* EVENT COORDINATOR: Dr. Kinjal Bhatia
 	* CONTACT INFORMATION: +91 9033395935
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ba137rl8rs736/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/309b22b6c6cc4f64be972de0ba0d4daab6df6da8]

üì¢ GENERAL RULES

 	* The competition is open to all registered students. Participants
must confirm their registration before the event.
 	* The narration must be in English.
 	* Each participant will have a 3 to 5-minute time slot for their
narration. Exceeding the limit may result in a penalty.
 	* Minimal use of handheld props is allowed, but the focus should
remain on narration. Visual presentations are not permitted.
 	* The storytelling should be engaging, expressive, and creative.
Unique presentation styles are encouraged.
 	* Participants must narrate their stories from memory. Reading
directly from a script is not allowed.

üîπ JUDGING CRITERIA

 	* üìñ Content & Creativity
 	* üé§ Expression & Voice Modulation
 	* üíÉ Body Language & Presentation
 	* ‚è≥ Time Management
 	* üåü Overall Impact

üîπ ADDITIONAL GUILDELINES

 	* DRESS CODE: Participants should dress appropriately for their
narration. Costumes are optional but should not overpower the
storytelling.
 	* PUNCTUALITY: Participants must arrive at least 30 minutes before
their scheduled slot.

üé§ We can't wait to hear your stories! See you there! üé≠

-------------------------

With best Regards,
MR. KRUTEN PATEL
Executive Officer - Corporate Communications

Subject: Invitation to Participate in ‚ÄúYOUTH SAMVAD‚Äù a Power-Packed
Motivational Event
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>


Dear All,

We are delighted to inform you about ‚Äú*Youth* ‡™∏‡™Ç‡™µ‡™æ‡™¶‚Äù an event dedicated to
awakening young minds, organized by Maa Shakti Charitable Trust, Nadiad.
This is a wonderful opportunity for staff and students to gain insights,
engage with thought leaders, and be part of an enriching experience.


To participate, please *click here* <https://forms.gle/FZidw9iVKRKuSwRQA> and
register yourself.

We request *all principals to circulate this information among your
students and encourage them to register before 19th February 2025.* Based
on the registrations, we will request free passes from the organizers for
distribution among registered participants.

With regards,

*Dr. Atul Patel*

*Registrar*





Accredited Grade ‚ÄúA+‚Äù by NAAC


www.charusat.ac.in

subject: MSUD102-Reading Material, Assignment, and Practice Examples for Unit 2 & Unit 5
snippet: Dear Students, I have attached the reading material for Unit 2 and Unit 5, along with assignment questions and practice examples for both units. Once you complete Unit 1 and Unit 4, the assignment
content:
Dear Students,

I have attached the reading material for *Unit 2 and Unit 5*, along with
assignment questions and practice examples for both units.

Once you complete *Unit 1 and Unit 4*, the assignment evaluation will
begin. Therefore, please ensure that you write your assignments regularly.

If you have any queries or concerns, feel free to meet me in *Room 309,
CSPIT*, or communicate via email. I will be happy to assist you.

Best regards,
*Dr. Bina Patel*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences *
*PDPIAS, CHARUSAT, Changa-388421*
*Accredited Grade A+ by NAAC*

*Mob. No: **+91-9427777856  *

subject: Registration for RHCSA(Redhat Certified System Administrator)
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to announce the Red Hat Certified System Administrator (RHCSA) Course, an excellent opportunity for you to gain hands-on expertise in Linux system administration and boost
content:
Dear Students,

We are excited to announce the *Red Hat Certified System Administrator
(RHCSA) Course*, an excellent opportunity for you to gain hands-on
expertise in *Linux system administration* and boost your career in the IT
industry.

*Why Get RHCSA Certified?*

The RHCSA certification is *globally recognized* and highly valued by
employers seeking skilled professionals in *Linux administration, cloud
computing, cybersecurity, and DevOps*. With Linux being the backbone of
modern IT infrastructure, this certification will set you apart in the job
market.
*Career Opportunities & Benefits:*

‚úÖ *High Demand* ‚Äì Linux professionals are in high demand across industries,
including IT services, cloud computing, and financial sectors.
‚úÖ *Better Job Prospects* ‚Äì Opens doors to roles like *Linux System
Administrator, DevOps Engineer, Cloud Engineer, and Security Administrator*.
‚úÖ *Hands-on Learning* ‚Äì Gain practical experience with real-world scenarios
and system troubleshooting skills.

*Course Highlights:*

üìå Comprehensive training covering Linux administration fundamentals
üìå Hands-on labs on LMS
üìå Expert guidance from certified instructors
üìå Assistance in exam preparation and career support

*Before Registering to course, go through the course outline:*


   - http://redhat.com/en/services/certification/rhcsa
   -
   https://www.redhat.com/en/services/training/rh124-red-hat-system-administration-i
   -
   https://www.redhat.com/en/services/training/rh134-red-hat-system-administration-ii

Don‚Äôt miss this opportunity to *enhance your skills and accelerate your
career*!

üìÖ *Registration Deadline:* 18th Feb, 2025
üìç *Course Start Date:* 22nd Feb, 2025
üîó *Register Here:* Click Here
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfplAUffZLxLq5hCe109csMK8AgbNQGPfEKkTpO9IQubeWmIQ/viewform?usp=header>


For any queries, contact

Prof. Sarita Thummar(CSPIT-CE) (Staff room no 523)

Prof. Rikita Chokshi(CSPIT-CE) (Staff room no 502)

Prof. Hemang Thakkar(CSPIT-CSE)(Staff room no 514)

--

subject: Workshop on Docker Foundations: A Practical Guide to Containers
snippet: AIML CLUB & IEEE CSPIT SB Presents üöÄ Workshop on Docker Foundations: A Practical Guide to Containers We are excited to introduce "Docker Foundations: A Practical Guide to Containers", the
content:
AIML CLUB & IEEE CSPIT SB Presents üöÄ Workshop on Docker Foundations: A
Practical Guide to Containers
We are excited to introduce *"Docker Foundations: A Practical Guide to
Containers"*, the first workshop in our recurring series. Gain hands-on
experience with Docker and explore its fundamentals, real-world
applications, and best practices!
üìÖ Session Details

   - *üìÜ Date:* 15th February, 2025
   - *‚è∞ Time:* 6:00 to 8:00 PM
   - *üñ• Mode:* Online

üìå Workshop Agenda

   - üöÄ Running & Managing Containers ‚Äì Explore Docker Hub, work with
   predefined images, and run containers.
   - üõ† Writing Dockerfiles ‚Äì Learn Dockerfile syntax, structure, and best
   practices.
   - üê≥ Building & Debugging Containers ‚Äì Understand container builds, port
   mappings, environment variables, and debugging techniques.
   - üåê Networking & Data Persistence ‚Äì Configure container networking and
   manage persistent data using volumes.
   - üí¨ Q&A & Wrap-Up ‚Äì Open discussion, troubleshooting, and resources for
   further learning.

üõ† Prerequisites

To ensure a smooth learning experience, please review the following
resources before attending:

üìå *Introduction to Docker (Video):* Watch Here
<https://youtu.be/H8Lyj2D_cWo?feature=shared>

üìå *Docker Commands (Beginner to Advanced):* Read Here
<https://dev.to/prodevopsguytech/docker-commands-from-beginner-to-advanced-for-devops-engineers-bb3>

üìå *Installing Docker on Windows:* Installation Guide
<https://youtu.be/WDEdRmTCSs8?feature=shared>
üìå Registration

To attend this workshop, please register using the link below:
üê≥ Register Now <https://forms.gle/jDxiHbdQRPsJCind9>

üí° Don't miss out‚Äîkickstart your Docker journey with us!

For any queries, feel free to contact *AIML Club Team* or *IEEE CSPIT SB*.
[image: Docker Workshop Poster]

Organized by AIML Club & IEEE CSPIT SB

*Dear all,*

*In today‚Äôs world, personal safety and self-defense skills are essential
for everyone, especially for girls and women. *

*With rising concerns about safety and personal security, it is imperative
to equip young women with the skills and knowledge to protect themselves in
various situations.*

*CMPICA is organizing Interactive and hands-on self-defense training
session for female students and staff members of CHARUSAT, under EOC on 6th
March, 2025, 10:00AM to 12:00PM by **Sensei Chetan Fumakiya, Pratibha
Academy, Under the Project of Pratibha Self Defense Foundation.*

*All the interested female students and staff members are requested to
register using below link on or before 25/2/25:*
https://forms.gle/FHRA2WXU6t7zX2YZ6

*** The venue will be communicated soon.*

*****EOC Department Coordinators are requested to encourage students to
participate and please forward this mail to students of your department.*

Dr. Mittal Desai,
Assistant Professor, MCA Department, CMPICA.
Officer on Special Duty - Charusat Innovation Venture Fund (CIVF)
CHARUSAT Campus,
At. & Post:- Changa, Tal: Petlad, Dist: Anand
Gujarat-388 421, India

snippet: Dear Students, As a part of Lab components in Digital Electronics subject, Everyone has to make a project in a group of 2 or maximum 3. At the end of semester we can have an exhibition for the Digital
content:
Dear Students,
As a part of Lab components in Digital Electronics subject, Everyone has to
make a project in a group of 2 or maximum 3.
At the end of semester we can have an exhibition for the Digital
Electronics Project for CE Div 1 and Div 2 students. So you need to select
a project accordingly.
A sample list of projects is attached with this mail, you can also select
your own project other than mentioned in the list.
You need to finalize the group and title of the project till 17-2-2025.
You can contact me for any query.

*Thanks & Regards,*
*Asifiqbal Thakor*
Assistant Professor,
U & P U Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,

subject: Launched Global & KSHITIJ IIT-KGP TRAINING & INTERNSHIP NOW AVAILABLE for CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY Students
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT student, we warmly invite you to participate in the Launched Global Collaboration with the KSHITIJ IIT KHARAGPUR Industrial Learning and Certification Program. To learn more about you,
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT* student,
we warmly invite you to participate in the *Launched Global*
<https://launchedglobal.in/> Collaboration with the *KSHITIJ IIT KHARAGPUR*
<https://ktj.in/sponsors> *Industrial Learning and Certification Program.*

*To learn more about you, please fill out the application form.*

Click here to Submit <https://forms.gle/CoW2kzegN8K5gPih9>


*IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT: Once You filled out the form kindly share the form
to your friends and make sure everyone fills out the form*

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

*https://chat.whatsapp.com/FoCH2ksmzC31ogZEhbaMTy
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/FoCH2ksmzC31ogZEhbaMTy>*



*Preferred Slots:- MARCH to JUNE*
*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*

*First month: Industrial training has been designed in the form of Live
lectures along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)*

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.


*Project 1:- *10 individual projects are assigned to each intern, which
they must complete with their mentor.

*Project 2:-  Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to 15
interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them, and they
have to work on it.*
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

*Here are two types of Classes we are providing:*

*1. Blended Program/Recorded classes: *You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear them in live doubt-clearing sessions
organized every weekend.

*2. Mentor-led/Live classes: *You will have live Zoom classes at 6:30 PM 2
to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well
You will have access to the LMS(Learning Management System) portal for 6
months.

*Program Highlights:*

: India's First - offering programs with low-code and no-code tools, with a
promise of 100% outcome-driven results
: Certifications from *LaunchEd - KSHITIJ IIT KGP* verified through Wipro
Dice ID
: Learn from tech-giant mentors and industry leaders
: Cutting-edge curriculum including generative AI and prompt engineering
: Exclusive masterclasses with students, founders, and CXos from top global
companies
Personalized instructors for comprehensive guidance from start to finish

*Secure your spot now to pave the way for a successful career journey with
LaunchED Academy!*

*YOUR SUCCESS AWAITS! Don't miss the chance to supercharge your career with
our Upskilling Career Program. Limited slots are available, so act now to
secure your spot and gain a competitive edge in the dynamic job market.*

*üöÄ Embark on Your Journey to Success with LaunchED Academy. Your Future
starts here!*

subject: Fwd: Invitation for Participation in ‚Äú3rd Urja Shakti‚Äù: National Level Online Write-Up Competition RGIPT, Jais
snippet: Please participate. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal CSPIT <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in> Date: Wed, Feb 5, 2025, 7:58 PM Subject: Fwd: Invitation for Participation in ‚Äú
content:
Please participate.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal CSPIT <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Feb 5, 2025, 7:58 PM
Subject: Fwd: Invitation for Participation in ‚Äú3rd Urja Shakti‚Äù: National
Level Online Write-Up Competition RGIPT, Jais
To: HOD Group <hod@charusat.ac.in>


The prize money for the event is fair. We may forward this to appropriate
student groups...

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Urja Shakti <urjashakti@rgipt.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Feb 5, 2025 at 3:42‚ÄØPM
Subject: Invitation for Participation in ‚Äú3rd Urja Shakti‚Äù: National Level
Online Write-Up Competition RGIPT, Jais
To: <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>




Dear Sir/Madam,



Greetings from Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Petroleum Technology (RGIPT)!



I am writing this email to invite your institute/college/university to
participate in 3rd ‚ÄúUrja Shakti 2025‚Äù, a national level write-up
competition for female Undergraduate Engineering and Postgraduate
Engineering students. Yes, this year the contest is also open for female PG
Engineering students in a separate PG category.  *The winners will be
getting prizes worth Lakhs. Also, UG category winners will have a chance to
win internship at a subject of their choice*. We have scheduled this
competition from 1st February 2025 to 3rd March 2025. As your esteemed
institute is one of the premier organizations working and contributing to
energy sector; we are expecting significant participation that shall bring
out more female innovators and engineers in our society.

A candidate can participate under the following themes:

√ò    AI, ML, IoT application in Petroleum industry/ Cyber Security in
Energy Sector /Automation in Energy Sector

√ò    Unconventional / Renewable Energy Sources

√ò    Waste to Energy/ Zero waste energy

√ò    Energy Storage & Utilization/ Grid Modernization

√ò    Energy Policies & Climate Changes

√ò    Emerging Energy Technologies/ Strategies for CO2 capture and
utilization/ Hydrogen Energy/ Nuclear Energy



*PG category:* 1st: ‚Çπ40000/-, 2nd: ‚Çπ30000/- and 3rd: ‚Çπ20000/-

*UG Category:* 1st : ‚Çπ30000/-, 2nd : ‚Çπ20000/- and 3rd : ‚Çπ10000/-

*Two Consolation Prizes for each category: *‚Çπ5000/-



It is an excellent opportunity for participants to share their novel and
innovative ideas in front of experts in the field.



Along with awarding cash prizes for winners, Urja Shakti is also taking
this opportunity to honor one female working professional in the Energy
Sector with ‚ÄúUrjashakti Lifetime Achievement Award‚Äù.



Let us all be united and contribute towards encouraging the daughters of
India, for a brighter tomorrow.



We will wait for your response and shall be obliged if you honour our
invitation.



For more information, please find the brochure and check website:
https://rgipt.ac.in/urjashakti25/.



Regards

Team Urja Shakti 2025

Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Petroleum Technology, Jais, Amethi

An Institute of National Importance established under the act of Parliament

www.rgipt.ac.in




-- 
Dr. Trushit Upadhyaya
Professor & I/c Principal
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology

subject: Invitation to Red Hat Academy Orientation Session ‚Äì Explore Career Opportunities
snippet: Dear Students, We are pleased to announce an Orientation Session for Red Hat Academy Courses, where you will gain valuable insights into industry-recognized Red Hat certifications and the career
content:
Dear Students,

We are pleased to announce an *Orientation Session for Red Hat Academy
Courses*, where you will gain valuable insights into *industry-recognized
Red Hat certifications* and the *career opportunities* they offer in the
field of open-source technologies.
*Session Details:*

üìÖ *Date:* 13th Feb, 2025
‚è∞ *Time:* 10am to 12pm
üìç *Venue:* Seminar Hall, 2nd Floor, A6 Building
*Why Attend?*

‚úÖ Learn about Red Hat Academy courses and certifications
‚úÖ Understand how Red Hat skills are in demand in the IT industry
‚úÖ Explore exciting career opportunities in Linux, Cloud, DevOps, and
Automation
‚úÖ Get guidance on how these courses can boost your job prospects

This is a great opportunity to kickstart your journey toward a rewarding
career in the open-source domain. Don‚Äôt miss out!

Interested students for awareness session are requested to register using
below given link:

*Register now <https://forms.gle/fjjhjSffq3TF1GcV9>*

*Deadline for registration: 9th Feb, 2025*

For any queries, feel free to contact:

Prof. Sarita Thummar (CSPIT-CE) - saritathummar.ce@charusat.ac.in

Prof. Rikita Chokshi (CSPIT-CE) - rikitachokshi.ce@charusat.ac.in

Looking forward to your participation!

--

subject: Fwd: Fw: Online SSIP Sensitization Session for Students - Session Details for Charotar University of Science and Technology (Charusat)
snippet: Dear all, Read the trailing mail for an online session of SSIP. Please join as per your convenience. Regards. From: Nikhil Sharma(GoG-Education Dept.) Sent: Tuesday, January 21, 2025 6:12 PM To:
content:
Dear all,

Read the trailing mail for an online session of SSIP. Please join as per
your convenience.

Regards.

------------------------------
*From:* Nikhil Sharma(GoG-Education Dept.)
*Sent:* Tuesday, January 21, 2025 6:12 PM
*To:* pranavdesai.mba@charusat.ac.in; jaiminundavia.mca@charusat.ac.in
*Cc:* ssipgujarat@gmail.com; janaki.joshi@in.gt.com; provost@charusat.ac.in
*Subject:* Online SSIP Sensitization Session for Students - Session Details
for Charotar University of Science and Technology (Charusat)


Dear SSIP Grantee,

Thank you for providing your preferred dates for the online SSIP
Sensitization session. We appreciate your prompt response.

We are pleased to inform you that we have allocated a session based on your
preferences. Here are the session details:

- Session Name: Innovation, Startups & SSIP 2.0 for Students
- Date: 3rd February 2025
- Time: 02: 00 PM Onwards
-  Link to Join the Session:
https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_NDZhZDBkYTctOGI2My00ZjExLTg3NjAtOTA3NjJjNzI1MzZi%40thread.v2/0?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%2205b5fe2e-db2c-48e5-bfd8-778b75cb0f8e%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%225a944030-a39c-4aa6-ba4b-b718834fd228%22%7d


Meeting ID: 439 865 590 833

Passcode: ou9Vn9L5

Important Points to Note:

1. To facilitate a smooth session, students can be assembled in an
auditorium or classroom, and the online session will be projected for their
viewing.
2. Alternatively, links can be provided to students to join the session
directly.
3. Please note that this session is considered an "SSIP Sensitization
Session" event for your institution. Therefore, you are required to upload
event details, including pictures and attendance sheets, on the SSIP MIS
portal.
4. We encourage you to announce an IDEA competition immediately after the
session to encourage students to submit their innovative ideas. This will
enable us to fund a good number of Proof of Concepts (POCs) under this
policy.
5.  All the faculties are requested to join the session for better
understanding about the policy.

If you have any queries or concerns, please feel free to reach out to us.

Thank you again for your cooperation.

Regards,

SSIP -2.0, State PMU

subject: Opportunity to Join Blockchain Discussion on Bharat Blockchain Network
snippet: Dear Students, I hope you are doing well. We are excited to invite you to participate in an engaging Blockchain Discussion hosted on the Bharat Blockchain Network Discord Community. This is a great
content:
Dear Students,

I hope you are doing well.

We are excited to invite you to participate in an engaging *Blockchain
Discussion* hosted on the *Bharat Blockchain Network Discord Community*.
This is a great opportunity for blockchain enthusiasts to expand their
knowledge, interact with like-minded individuals, and showcase their
expertise.
*Discussion Details:*

   - *Format:* A structured discussion (not a formal debate) on a relevant
   blockchain topic.
   - *Topic:* Will be shared upon confirmation of participation.
   - *Preparation Time:* 3 days after topic announcement.
   - *Team Requirement:* 2 teams of at least 4 members each.
   - *Prizes:* Exciting rewards for outstanding contributions!

*Why Participate?*

   - Gain insights into the latest blockchain trends.
   - Engage in meaningful discussions with industry professionals.
   - Enhance your knowledge and critical thinking skills in blockchain
   technology.
   - A chance to win prizes for demonstrating exceptional understanding and
   ideas.

*How to Confirm Your Participation?*

To confirm your participation, please *reply to this email* with your team
details, including:

   - *Team Member Names*
   - *ID Numbers*
   - *Contact Numbers*

We look forward to your participation and an insightful discussion!

Best Regards,

*Shrey Lakhtaria**Dhairya Kanabar*
*Campus Ambassador, IDS/BBN*

-- 


Shrey Lakhtaria

Computer Science Engineering, CSPIT.

<https://github.com/shreylakhtaria>
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/shrey-lakhataria/>
<https://www.instagram.com/shrey7120/>

snippet: Dear All, Please inform students to register. On Sat, 25 Jan 2025, 1:11 pm Dhaval Bhoi, <dhavalbhoi.ce@charusat.ac.in> wrote: Dear All, U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
content:

wrote:

>
>
>
> U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering, CSPIT organizes the

>
>
>

> SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE "
>
>
>
> Guidelines:
>
>
>
> 1.    Students may submit their creative working project ideas on

subject: INVITATION FOR INTERNSHIP
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to announce an AICTE-approved internship program in collaboration with Launch Ed in collaboration with KSHITIJ IIT Kharagpur Fill out the application below: https://forms.
content:
Dear Students,

 We are excited to announce an *AICTE-approved internship program* in
collaboration with Launch Ed in collaboration with  *KSHITIJ*
* IIT Kharagpur*

Fill out the application below:
https://forms.gle/4vX4t3JU6kdB8vfh9
<https://forms.gle/X8RnVzu4swhxCVe19>*About the Program:*

This program provides a *2-month Training + Internship* program, and we
accept a particular* number of students*.

*Program Overview:*

   - *First Month:* Live lectures delivered by *industry professionals*.
   You will receive login credentials after registration.
   - *Second Month:* Internship with live project mentorship. Gain
   experience solving *real-world problems*.

*Projects:*

   - *Individual Projects:* Each intern will be assigned *10 projects* to
   complete with mentor guidance.
   - *Capstone Project:* A collaborative group project where each intern is
   responsible for specific tasks.

necessary *resources* and *materials* will be provided.

*Learning Options:*

   1. *Blended Program (Recorded Classes):* entrance to recorded sessions
   with weekend *live doubt-clearing sessions*.
   2. *Mentor-Led Program (Live Classes):* *Live classes* via Zoom, *2-3
   days a week* at *6:30 PM*, with visibility to recordings and a *Learning
   Management System (LMS)* for 6 months.

*Upon Completion, You Will Receive:*

   - *Certificate of completion* from Cognizance IIT   Kharagpur  .
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - *Co-branded internship certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *Placement support*.
   - Entry to our *growing professional community*.
   - Hands-on experience with *low-code and no-code tools*.
   - Expertise in *Generative AI* and *Prompt Engineering*.
   - *Exclusive Masterclasses* from industry leaders.
   - *Personalized guidance* throughout the program.


- Fill out the application below:
https://forms.gle/4vX4t3JU6kdB8vfh9




*Thanks & Regards!!kamepalli naveen kamepalli.naveen@launched.org.in
<kamepalli.naveen@launched.org.in>6360008742Team Launch Ed*

subject: Industrial Training & Academic Internship Internship Program Organized For CHARUSAT University Students
snippet: Dear Students of CHARUSAT ( 1st yr ) [ IMPORTANT] Salutations! We are in collaboration with IITs and are organizing a 2 Months Training + Internship program with certifications from CISCO, META[
content:
*Dear Students of CHARUSAT*
*( 1st yr )*
*[ IMPORTANT]*

*Salutations!*

We are in collaboration with *IITs  *and are organizing a 2 Months Training
+ Internship program with certifications from *CISCO, META[FACEBOOK], IBM* &
various other MNCs' s in technical and non-technical domains. We are
enrolling *SHORTLISTED STUDENTS *in the program for Charusat

*Note: If any of your batchmates are missed or haven't received
the notification, recipients are allowed to send this mail to them.*
*Registrations closing in 12 Hours.*

*https://forms.gle/og9XrYBWH4VBmFnXA* <https://forms.gle/og9XrYBWH4VBmFnXA>

*Students must submit their application. After getting shortlisted, you
will be getting a response from our HR Team:*




*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*
*First month:* IIT training has been designed in the form of Live lectures
along with live mentorship from industry professionals. (Login credentials
will be provided to students after registration)

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.

*Project 1:-* 10 individual projects assigned to each intern which they
have to complete with their mentor.

*Project 2:-*  Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a group
of 15 interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them
they have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

*Two types of Classes, we are providing:*

*1. Blended Program:* You will receive recorded sessions, whatever doubts
you have you can clear it in live doubt-clearing sessions which will be
organized every weekend.

*2. Mentor-led:* You will be having live Zoom classes at 6:30 PM  for 2 to
3 days a week. You will receive your recorded sessions as well
LMS(Learning Management System) portal which you will have admittance to
for 6 months.


*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a:*
‚úÖ *Program completion certificate* issued by IITs.
‚úÖ *Certificates verified* through *Wipro* Dice ID.
‚úÖ Co-Branded *Internship certificate from Top MNCs.*
‚úÖ *100 percent Placement Assistance.*
‚úÖ Admittance to a *growing community*.
‚úÖ Program Offering with *Low-Code and No-Code Tools. *
‚úÖ *100 percent Outcome Driven Result.*
‚úÖ The curriculum includes *Generative AI and Prompt Engineering.*
‚úÖ *Exclusive Masterclasses* with *Founders and CXOs of Top Global
Companies.*
‚úÖ *Personalized Instructors* for proper guidance.

*[THIS NOTIFICATION FOR THE ENROLLMENT OF  FEB-MARCH, MARCH-APRIL &
APRIL-MAY BATCHES FOR STUDENTS WHO HAVEN'T BEEN ABLE TO ACCEPT THE
SCHOLARSHIP SLOT FOR THE SAME.]*

subject: Fwd: 3030 Eklavya Weekly Online Program- IIT Gandhinagar
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply9@aicte-india.org> Date: Thu, Jan 30, 2025 at 9:56 AM Subject: 3030 Eklavya Weekly Online Program- IIT Gandhinagar Respected
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply9@aicte-india.org>
Date: Thu, Jan 30, 2025 at 9:56‚ÄØAM
Subject: 3030 Eklavya Weekly Online Program- IIT Gandhinagar

Respected Madam/Sir,

We would like to inform you that 3030 EKLAVYA is a program for teachers,
students and parents.

The 1st episode, Computing with Soap:
https://www.youtube.com/live/A3-PpOYzXps?si=d7nybVbTAuWEA8AW received 75K
views, 10K assignment submission, 19 min avg watch time.

*Contains solving computational problems - optimum metro-rail network,
Fastest descent problem posed by Galileo, analysed by Newton, Fermat  -
Calculus of Variations, Numerical Methods, optimization and nature of the
universe, cell structures & divisions using bubbles.*

The link of the Next Episode: *History of Time & Clock (2 Feb, Sunday 4
PM): *https://www.youtube.com/live/S6RR7sYtLzE?si=XWq3W-z9EQSiwKfA

*Link for Registration:* https://eklavya.iitgandhinagar.ac.in/

We request you to please disseminate the link among your team and also
encourage your team of faculty, students to watch the innovative programme.

*Regards*

*Dr. Amit Dutta, *
*Director,*
*Policy & Academic Planning Bureau*
*All India Council for Technical Education,*
*Nelson Mandela Marg, Vasant Kunj,**New Delhi- 110070, Ph : 011-29581117*

-- 
*Regards,*

*Nirav Bhatt*

subject: Kanubhai and Kamlakshi Patel Scholarship for the Students for the Academic year (2024-25) Undergraduate Program of CSPIT
snippet: Dear Students, We would like to inform you all that CHARUSAT will offer a new Merit-cum-Means Scholarship namely ‚ÄúKanubhai and Kamlakshi Patel Scholarship'' for the undergraduate students of
content:
Dear Students,



We would like to inform you all that CHARUSAT will offer a new
Merit-cum-Means Scholarship namely ‚ÄúKanubhai and Kamlakshi Patel
Scholarship'' for the undergraduate students of  Faculty of Engineering and
Technology (B.Tech., CSPIT) for the academic year 2024-25.


Please find notice and application form for your ready reference.



 Eligibility Criteria to get Scholarship for the Academic Year 2024-25:



v  *The Scholarship is available for **Charotar Moti Sattavis Patidar Samaj
Student Only.*

v  The Students of whose results are more than 75 Percentile in 12th
Standard (for First Year Student) and 7.5 CGPA without Backlog (for 2nd, 3rd &
4th year student) whose yearly family income is not more than Rs. 6.5 lacs
will be eligible to apply

v  *The Scholarship will be awarded to :*



*Program*

*Scholarship Amount in Rs. (per year)*

*No. of Students who will get benefit every year*

*First Year*

*Second Year*

*Third Year*

*Fourth Year*

*CSPIT (B.Tech.)*

*35000*

*3*

*2*

*3*

*0*



v  To continue to be eligible for availing Scholarship, the Student has to
secure 7.50 CGPA or above at the end of every Year without a backlog.



v  In case, a student will not score a minimum 7.50 CGPA in a consecutive
Year, then a scholarship will be awarded to another eligible student.



v  Students receiving two or more scholarships (e.g. MYSY) and Students
admitted under Tuition Fees waiver Scheme (TFWS) are not eligible to apply.




*The filled forms for the scholarship submitted to : **Mr. Yatin Talati,
Building A6 , Room No.101, CSPIT  Admin Office.*


*Last* *Date of Submission of Form: 15.02.2025*



 **Note: No Form will be accepted after the last date. *

--
Thanks,
*Yatin Talati*

Accredited Grade ‚ÄúA+‚Äù by NAAC, GOI

Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Off. Nadiad - Petlad Highway, Changa, Gujarat, INDIA 388421
www.charusat.ac.in

--

subject: Regarding first year result - KYA
snippet: Dear Students, The results have been declared. If you are not satisfied with your grades in any subject, you can apply for Know Your Answer Sheet (KYA) within 3 working days, with the last date to
content:
Dear Students,

The results have been declared. If you are not satisfied with your grades
in any subject, you can apply for *Know Your Answer Sheet (KYA) *within 3
working days, with the last date to apply being *February 3.*

Please note that KYA is only applicable for the Theory University Exam and
not for internal or practical exams.

You can apply for KYA through e-Governance, either on campus or from
outside the campus. *The fee for KYA is ‚Çπ500 per subject*. After applying
for KYA, you will receive a call as well as an email from the exam section
to inform you of the date on which you need to visit with your parents to
review your answer sheet.

Students who wish to apply for KYA and have a backlog must contact ayushi
mam or mayuri mam for any query. Additionally, *Supplementary Exam 1* will
be conducted 15 days after the result declaration.
Dhaval Bhoi
Assistant Professor,
U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT, Changa.
Ta-Petlad Dist.Anand
PIN-388421 GUJARAT, INDIA
