subject: Fwd: Invitation | Raisina Hackathon | 19 February 2025 | Vadodara
snippet: Dear Students, Inrerested students are requested to participate. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal CSPIT <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in> Date: Wed, Jan 29, 2025, 10:50 AM
content:
Dear Students,

Inrerested students are requested to participate.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal CSPIT <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Jan 29, 2025, 10:50 AM
Subject: Fwd: Invitation | Raisina Hackathon | 19 February 2025 | Vadodara
To: Parth Shah <parthshah.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Amit Thakkar <
amitthakkar.it@charusat.ac.in>, Nirav Bhatt <niravbhatt.it@charusat.ac.in>,
Nikita Bhatt <nikitabhatt.ce@charusat.ac.in>


Please see if anyone is interested to participate...

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Anusha Kesarkar Gavankar <anusha.gavankar@orfonline.org>
Date: Wed, 29 Jan 2025, 10:43
Subject: Invitation | Raisina Hackathon | 19 February 2025 | Vadodara
To: <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Dharmil Doshi <dharmil.doshi@orfonline.org>, Tanya Aggarwal <
tanya.aggarwal@orfonline.org>


Dear Dr. Trushit Upadhyaya,

Greetings from the Observer Research Foundation (ORF)!

ORF is delighted to invite your students to contribute to and attend
the *Raisina
Hackathon* in Vadodara on *Wednesday,** 19 February 2025* being held in
partnership with Sigma University, Vadodara.

As the *Raisina Dialogue
<https://www.orfonline.org/forums/raisina-dialogue>*, India's flagship
international convening on global governance hosted by ORF in partnership
with the *Ministry of External Affairs*, enters a new decade, this
*Hackathon* aims to amplify the voice of India‚Äôs youth by showcasing their
aspirations and vision. It encourages young minds to lead critical
conversations, shape future agendas, and drive innovation as India plays a
central role in shaping a better world.

The three *session themes* at the Raisina Hackathon are:

1.     Foreign Policy and Security

2.     Climate Change and Sustainability

3.     Digital Futures


The details are as follows:

*Date*: Wednesday, 19 February, 2025

*Time*: 9.30 am to 2.00 pm

*Venue*: Pandit Deendayal Upadhyay Nagar Gruh, Vadodara (Maps:
https://g.co/kgs/NBG14gN)



*I. CALL FOR NOMINATIONS TO CONTRIBUTE*

We request you to nominate students to contribute their ideas spread across
the three themes outlined in the *attached concept *note, while ensuring
gender parity in the nominations.

All contributing students shall receive a *Certificate* acknowledging their
contribution.

Each nominated student will have *two minutes* to share their ideas. Due to
time constraints, we will not be able to accommodate any formal
presentations.

Please send in your *theme-wise student nomination*s for Contributions at
the earliest, using the *Excel format* below:



No.

Theme chosen (from attached concept note)

Title

Name of student

Department

College/ University

Year of Study

Email

Phone (WhatsApp)





Ms./Mr./Dr.

















*II. TO OBSERVE AND PARTICIPATE*

In addition to receiving the nominations as mentioned above, we are
delighted to invite your *faculty and students* to* observe and
attend* the Raisina
Hackathon.

*Registration is mandatory* for all interested in attending the Hackathon.
Please have your faculty and students register their interest via the
following link:https://forms.gle/2bYDTeJsBZ6AiyTA9. A confirmation email
will be sent to them shortly.

Needless to say, all conference meals shall be provided.



**Please note that students being nominated for contributing their
ideas need not register at the given attendance registration link.*



*A detailed concept note is attached for your reference*.

We look forward to hosting your faculty and students at the Raisina
Hackathon in Vadodara on Wednesday, 19 February, 2025.

Please feel free to reach out to me for any further information.

Thank you very much for your support.

Warm regards,
Anusha
-- 
[image: ORF | ORF]
Dr. Anusha Kesarkar-Gavankar
<https://www.orfonline.org/people-expert/anusha-kesarkar-gavankar/>
Senior Fellow | Centre for Economy and Growth
Observer Research Foundation <http://www.orfonline.org>
+91 98208 38561
anusha.gavankar@orfonline.org

--

subject: Wipro Authorized Training and Internship & Placement Program
snippet: Dear Student, [Referral Code:- KS15] Greetings from Krutanic Solutions! As part of the ongoing Wipro Training and Internship Campaign on your campus, we want to remind you that today is the last day to
content:
*Dear Student,*

*[Referral Code:- KS15]*

Greetings from Krutanic Solutions!

As part of the ongoing Wipro Training and Internship Campaign on your
campus, we want to remind you that *today is the last day to register*.

We are thrilled to collaborate with top multinational companies,
including *IBM,
Microsoft, Wipro, Deloitte, Cognizant, Infosys, Oracle, TCS, PwC, J.P.
Morgan, Amazon, Accenture, HCL Technologies, Tech Mahindra,* and many more.

This program offers a *3-month online Training, Internship, and Placement
Assistance Program*, guided by industry experts with 10+ years of
experience.

*Why Join?*

   - Comprehensive training with live interactive sessions.
   - Hands-on projects to apply your knowledge.
   - Placement assistance, including mock interviews and resume-building
   guidance.
   - Certification of completion and Letter of Recommendation (LOR) for job
   references.

*Register Here:* https://forms.gle/H2hN3btxRdBCLQv4A

üîπ *Month 1: Training & Learning*

   - Theoretical sessions delivered by industry experts.
   - Live interactive classes, with one-on-one doubt-clearing sessions.
   - Weekly sessions (Monday‚ÄìFriday) via Zoom or Google Meet.

üîπ *Month 2: Internship & Projects*

   - Gain real-world experience through hands-on projects.
   - Minor Project (7 days) and Major Project (23 days) with expert
   guidance.

üîπ *Month 3: Placement Assistance*

   - Mock interviews, group discussions, and resume-building sessions.
   - Focused personality development and communication skill enhancement.

*Certificates Provided*
‚úî Internship Certificate (AICTE & ISO Certified).
‚úî Training Completion Certificate.
‚úî Letter of Recommendation (LOR) from MNCs.
‚úî Excellence Certificate for top performers.

*Additional Benefits*

   - Guidance from professionals working in reputed organizations like IBM,
   Microsoft, TCS, and more.
   - Access to real-time projects to strengthen your resume.
   - Placement support and opportunities to connect with leading recruiters.

*Contact Information*

subject: EOC Activity by CSPIT[CE] CREATIVE PROJECT IDEAS FOR IMPROVING THE LIVES OF SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE
snippet: Dear All, U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering, CSPIT organizes the following Event in step towards helping people having disabilities or Physically Challenged. Title of the Event:
content:
Dear All,



U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering, CSPIT organizes the
following Event in step towards helping people having disabilities or
Physically Challenged.



*Title of the Event:* " CREATIVE PROJECT IDEAS FOR IMPROVING THE LIVES OF
SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE "



Guidelines:



1.    Students may submit their creative working project ideas on
a drawing sheet of paper/PPT/PDF.


Submission Link: https://forms.gle/GUHRx6sLvhYPatmx7


These can be further modified on the day of presentation [*15/02/2025*].

2.    Last *Extended Date* of Entry Submission: *8th** February, 2025* [Ideas
through online shared google form]. Each student has to make a separate
entry using the shared google form link.

3.    Students may use a pen, pencil, sketch pen or any other tools
[Computer Software/Hardware] to depict their ideas on the day of
presentation [Date: 15/02/2025, Venue: MAC LAB (601), A7 Building].
Participants must remain present in MAC LAB (601) [A7 Building] from 09:15
am to 12:00 pm on 15/02/2025, Saturday to present their project ideas.
Students may use presentations and poster to demonstrate
their project ideas.

4.    Students may show Project Implementation

5.    Students may submit their ideas in a group of a maximum 3 students.

6.    Best of the THREE Innovative Ideas will be awarded prize money &
certificate *(First prize 1500 Rs/-, Second Prize 1000 Rs/-, Third Prize
500 Rs/-)*. Others will receive a certificate of participation.



*EOC Department Coordinators are requested to encourage students for
participation and please forward this mail to students of your department.*


*For any further query you may please contact student coordinators (**23CE022
- Devam Bhaveshbhai Ghodasara *and *23CE115 - Priya Babubhai Pedhadiya* *).*
Dhaval Bhoi
Assistant Professor,
U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT, Changa.
Ta-Petlad Dist.Anand
PIN-388421 GUJARAT, INDIA

--

Dear Students,

We are excited to invite you to attend the *Project Showcase* featuring an
array of innovative and thought-provoking projects presented in the form of
poster displays. This event is an excellent opportunity to explore creative
ideas, gain inspiration, and engage with the hard work and dedication of
your fellow students.

*Event Details:*

   - *Date:* 25/01/2025
   - *Time:* 10:00 AM Onwards
   - *Venue:* Second Floor, A7 Building

The showcase highlights the diverse talent and research within our student
community. Your presence and feedback will encourage participants and make
this event more meaningful.

subject: Hands-on Workshop on Embedded Machine Learning with NVIDIA Jetson Nano
snippet: AIML CLUB & IEEE CSPIT SB Presents Hands-on Workshop on Embedded Machine Learning with NVIDIA Jetson Nano Dear All, We are excited to announce the One day Workshop on Embedded Machine Learning with
content:
AIML CLUB & IEEE CSPIT SB Presents
Hands-on Workshop on Embedded Machine Learning with NVIDIA Jetson Nano

Dear All,

We are excited to announce the One day Workshop on *Embedded Machine
Learning with Nvidia Jetson Nano*. This Workshop aims to provide hands-on
experience and deep insights into various aspects of machine learning on
embedded systems.

Hands-On Topics to be Covered:

   - Introduction to setting up NVIDIA Jetson Nano
   - Solving classification problems
   - Object Detection
   - Image Segmentation
   - Pose Estimation
   - Action Recognition

Workshop Details:

   - *Date:* 24th January 2025
   - *Time:* 9:30 AM to 2:30 PM
   - *Venue: *Lab no. 324D, A6 - Building, CSPIT.
   - *Presenter:* Asst. Prof. Harshul Yagnik

Note: Only 38 seats are available. Register soon to secure your spot!

Registration is exclusively for those who are interested in embedded
machine learning.

E-certificates will be provided to all participants who complete the entire
series along with necessary requirements.
Register Now <https://forms.gle/dq8oWBs814HbvvHA9>
[image: Workshop Poster] <https://ibb.co/KWZs6Js>
Organized by AIML Club & IEEE CSPIT SB

snippet: Dear Participant, We are excited to welcome you to Ignite 2025 on 24-January-2025...!!! Venue: CMPICA - CHARUSAT Please take note of the registration details: Time: 9:15 AM to 10:00 AM Important:
content:
Dear Participant,

We are excited to welcome you to *Ignite 2025 on 24-January-2025...*!!!

*Venue:* CMPICA - CHARUSAT

Please take note of the registration details:

   - *Time:* 9:15 AM to 10:00 AM

Please complete your registration on time. Late entries will not be allowed.

We look forward to seeing you at Ignite 2025...!!!

*Smt. Chandaben Mohanbhai Patel Institute of Computer Applications*

*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT),*
*Changa, Gujarat, India.*

*Hello Dear Students,*

*Greetings from Navikshaa!*
     We are collaboration with Top MNCs Companies [*IBM ,MICROSOFT,
DELOITTE, EY, CISCO, COGNIZANT, BARCLAYS, INFOSYS, GENPACT, ORACLE, TCS,
PWC, J.P. MORGAN, AMAZON, ACCENTURE, HCL Technologies, Tech Mahindra, ETC]* And
organizing a* Training ,Internship And Placement Assistance program* on
multiple domains.
*  This is a 3-month completely online Training ,Internship And Placement *
*Assistance** Program with industrial experts Mentor with 10+ years of
experience!!*

*[ NOTE:- TRAINING FEES ARE APPLICABLE  ]*

  *1st Month [ Training/ Learning]*

   - *Theoretical learning from Basic to Advance with Industrial Experts.*
   -  Live interactive sessions.
   - *One to one Doubt clearing sessions*.
   - Weekly *Monday-Friday* sessions via Zoom App or Google Meet.
   - Weekly *Evaluation Tests*.

*2nd Month **[Internship/ Projects ]*

   -  Application of concepts learned in the first month.
   -  *Real-time /Hands-on Projects* with proper mentor assistance, to
   build an attractive resume.
   -  Industry Simulated Project - Group (30 days).

* 3rd Month ** [**Placement Assistance/ Pre-placement Preparation ]*

   - *Placement* *Assistance **[**Multiple sessions of Mock
   Interview, Group Discussion, Resume building, Enhancing the Communication
   Skills and Personality Development, Placement Assistance will be given to
   you, which will make you stand out in the placement procedure.]*

*Certificates :-*

   1. Wipro Certified Internship Completion Certificate.
   2. Course Completion Certificate from Navikshaa And ISO Certified .

subject: Fwd: Open-up before the Opportunity Ends!! AIESEC in VVN Recs 25.1
snippet: Do you want to be in the TOP 1%? The AIESEC Influence! Huge companies recognize the AIESEC Experience. Monk Entertainment (Founded by Ranveer Allahbadia and Viraj Sheth) tweeted about AIESEC. DHL Group
content:
[image: image]



[image: image]



Do you want to be in the TOP 1%?



[image: image]
The AIESEC Influence!

Huge companies recognize the AIESEC Experience.

Monk Entertainment (Founded by Ranveer Allahbadia and Viraj Sheth) tweeted
about AIESEC.
[image: image]
DHL Group
and many more...

Become an AIESEC Vice President, and get eligible for a full-time
internship at DHL Group with a stipend of Rs.40,000/month.
[image: image]
Affiliated Universities

Get a fee waiver in top colleges affiliated with AIESEC, if you have AIESEC
Experience.


REGISTER HERE!
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1aBmnYrR-fc8HpzhP-uQL5b5SkxOQ6LOlxjtI9PLZIXg/viewform?fbclid=PAZXh0bgNhZW0CMTEAAabn-zcJJca8WIfuMSz3pwgOJRch2VeQdbLDD3WK_-TJishQWKhkYn2YFtU_aem_kXgAVlNeVB5il_z87jKZaw&edit_requested=true&pli=1>



[image: image]
Looking for Life Changing Experiences ?? Wanna boost your CV ??

Become an AIESEC Member!! Numerous LIFE-CHANGING EXPERIENCES and an LOE to
strengthen your resume!
Watch this Video
<https://www.instagram.com/p/BsaicuVl6HQ/?igsh=MXRkODJzemRpMmpoMA%3D%3D&img_index=1>



Here are your Interests!



[image: image]
Outgoing Exchanges

Help us get the Exchange Participant have the smoothest experience! Let's
foster Global Connections!
[image: image]
Marketing

Let's generate the finest leads! Learn more about marketing and improve
your public speaking skills!
[image: image]
Business Development

Let's generate the finest leads! Learn more about marketing and improve
your public speaking skills!


REGISTER HERE!
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1aBmnYrR-fc8HpzhP-uQL5b5SkxOQ6LOlxjtI9PLZIXg/viewform?fbclid=PAZXh0bgNhZW0CMTEAAabn-zcJJca8WIfuMSz3pwgOJRch2VeQdbLDD3WK_-TJishQWKhkYn2YFtU_aem_kXgAVlNeVB5il_z87jKZaw&edit_requested=true&pli=1>



[image: image]
<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1u-74sc4IIs>



Why AIESEC?

AIESEC is more than an organisation‚Äîit's a global movement of young leaders
driving impactful change. Through leadership development and cross-cultural
exchanges, AIESEC empowers you to unlock your potential, gain life-changing
experiences, and make a difference in the world. Join us to lead, grow, and
shape a better future!


REGISTER HERE!
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1aBmnYrR-fc8HpzhP-uQL5b5SkxOQ6LOlxjtI9PLZIXg/viewform?fbclid=PAZXh0bgNhZW0CMTEAAabn-zcJJca8WIfuMSz3pwgOJRch2VeQdbLDD3WK_-TJishQWKhkYn2YFtU_aem_kXgAVlNeVB5il_z87jKZaw&edit_requested=true&pli=1>



[image: image]

DON‚ÄôT WAIT for opportunities‚ÄîCREATE them and LEAD today!

For doubts and queries contact:

Krisha Akbari

Core Committee President

Phone No: +91 7046359029
Email:  krishaakbari@aiesec.net

subject: Join India‚Äôs Biggest Study Abroad Expo ‚Äì Register Now!
snippet: Dear Students We are excited to invite you to India's Biggest Study Abroad Expo, an exclusive opportunity for aspiring international students to interact directly with university representatives
content:
Dear Students

We are excited to invite you to *India‚Äôs Biggest Study Abroad Expo*, an
exclusive opportunity for aspiring international students to interact
directly with university representatives from *Australia* and *Canada*.

*Event Details:*
üìÖ *Date:* Monday, 20th January
‚è∞ *Time:* 11:00 AM ‚Äì 4:00 PM
üìç *Venue:* Grand Mercure, Vadodara

*Why You Should Attend:*

   - *Direct Access to World-Class Institutions*: Meet representatives
from *130+
   universities* to explore your academic options and scholarships.
   - *Scholarship Opportunities*: Learn how 11,000+ students secured
   scholarships last year and how *you* could be next.
   - *On-the-Spot IELTS Booking*: Book your IELTS test and receive access
   to free preparation materials.
   - *Education Loan Assistance*: Get guidance on securing education loans
   up to ‚Çπ3 crore and save up to ‚Çπ1 lakh.

We understand you may have commitments to sports or cultural events, so we
kindly request that you register only if you can ensure your confirmed
participation.

*How to Register:*
Scan the QR code on the poster or click here
<https://forms.gle/8qRf6dHQNqLTBfe39> to secure your spot. Spaces are
limited, and registrations open till 4:00 PM today.)
[image: adobe-express-qr-code (7).png]

We look forward to helping you take the first step toward your global
education journey. Please feel free to reach out to us at +91 9998380041 if
you have any questions.

Warm regards,

*Kruten Patel*
*Executive Officer (Corporate Communications)*

subject: LAUNCHED AVENUES IIT BOMBAY INTERNSHIP (BOOTCAMP) EXCLUSIVE OPPURTUNITY ALERT
snippet: DEAR STUDENTS OF CHARUSAT Warm Greetings! We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with IIT BOMBAY's AVENUES: a 2-Month Training and Internship Program featuring
content:
*DEAR STUDENTS*


*OF*
*CHARUSAT Warm Greetings!*

We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with *IIT
BOMBAY's AVENUES*: a *2-Month Training and Internship Program* featuring
certifications from prestigious leading multinational organizations across
various fields.

*Who Can Apply?*
We invite applications from shortlisted students in all departments. If any
of your classmates haven't received this information, please feel free to
forward this email to them.

*It is Important for Interested Students to submit their application, if
shortlisted you will receive a response from our HR Team:*

Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/Xrob2CDaSfzZ74XAA>


*Program Overview:*

*First Month: Training*

   - Participate in live lectures and receive guidance from industry
   professionals.
   - You will receive login details after the Registration Process.

*Second Month: Internship*

   - Engage in real-world projects with professional mentorship.
   - *Project Details:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete 10 unique projects with your
      mentor.
      - *Group Capstone Project:* Collaborate in teams on a capstone
      project, with specific roles assigned to each intern. All necessary
      resources will be provided by the company.

*Class Formats:*

   1. *Blended Learning:*
      - Access recorded sessions and join live doubt-clearing sessions
      every weekend.
   2. *Live Mentor-led Classes:*
      - Attend live Zoom sessions 2-3 times per week after 6:30 PM, with
      recorded sessions available for later review. You will also have
access to
      our Learning Management System (LMS) for six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon completion, students will receive:

   - A *Certificate of Completion* in alliance with Avenues IIT BOMBAY
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and entry to a growing professional
   network.
   - Training on *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - Curriculum focused on *Generative AI and Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with industry leaders.
   - Personalized mentorship for tailored guidance.



*Don‚Äôt miss out on this valuable opportunity!*
*Interested students should submit their applications to be part of this
transformative experience.*


Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/Xrob2CDaSfzZ74XAA>



*Best regards,*

*AKASH KAPOOR*
*Senior Academic *
*CounselorLaunchED Avenues IIT BOMBAY*

subject: Important Reminder for CESD Workshop Attendance
snippet: Reminder Email for CESD workshop presence Dear Students, Greetings from CESD Course fromCHARUSAT! This is a gentle reminder regarding your attendance in the Community Engagement and Sustainable
content:
*Reminder Email for CESD workshop presence*


Dear Students,

*Greetings from CESD Course fromCHARUSAT!*

This is a gentle reminder regarding your attendance in the *Community
Engagement and Sustainable Development (CESD) - CUUV101* course in Workshop
Mode, scheduled from *January 16th to 22nd, 2025*, from *9:00 AM to 4:30 PM*
daily.

It has come to our attention that some students did not attend the sessions
on *Day 1*. If you were absent, kindly ensure you attend the workshop
starting *tomorrow*, along with a *valid reason* for your absence today.
Your attendance and active participation are *mandatory*, as this is a
*two-credit
course* opted for during the academic year 2024-25. Please note that *no
post-workshop remedies will be provided*.

( *Those who have attended today please ignore for you* but encourage /
motivate your friends who have opted CESD to attend it to morrow onwards)

Here is a reminder of the key details:

*Workshop Schedule:*

*Morning Sessions:* 9:00 AM ‚Äì 12:00 PM

   - On-campus interactive discussions and activities.

*Lunch Break:* 12:00 PM ‚Äì 1:00 PM

*Afternoon Sessions:* 1:00 PM ‚Äì 4:30 PM

   - Field visits to Laval Village for hands-on community engagement
   activities.

*Key Information:*

   - *Dates:* January 16‚Äì22, 2025
   - *Time:* 9:00 AM ‚Äì 4:30 PM
   - *Morning Venue:* RPCP Auditorium, First Floor, Ramanbhai Patel College
   of Pharmacy
   - *Field Visit Location:* Laval Village, Ta- Matar, Dist-Kheda
   - *Transportation for Field Visits:* Arranged by CHARUSAT
      - Assemble at *Central Lawn, CHARUSAT campus* by *1:00 PM* daily to
      board the bus.

This workshop provides a unique opportunity to gain practical experience
and knowledge about community challenges and sustainable practices. Please
ensure your participation in both the *on-campus sessions* and the *field
visits* to successfully complete this program and earn your credits.

For any queries reach out to me at *9825293046*.

Looking forward to seeing you all tomorrow, without FAIL!


*Dr. Dilip Gosai*
Course Coordinator, CESD
*CHARUSAT*
*Dr. Dilip Gosai*
Head
CREDP ( Charusat Rural Education Development Program)
Charotar University of Science & Technology
Accredited *Grade A+* by NAAC

Charotar University of Science & Technology
CHARUSAT Campus - Changa
Off Nadiad-Petlad Highway,
PIN-388421 GUJARAT, INDIA
Ph +91-2697-265160 Cell No.+91-98252-93046
Web: www.charusat.ac.in

<http://www.charusat.ac.in/>

subject: Course Information and Evaluation Details for Engineering Mathematics-II (Course Code: MSUD102)
snippet: Dear Students, I hope you are doing well. I am Dr. Bina Patel, the subject coordinator for Engineering Mathematics-II (Course Code: MSUD102). I would like to share with you the course evaluation
content:
Dear Students,

I hope you are doing well. I am Dr. Bina Patel, the subject
coordinator for *Engineering
Mathematics-II (Course Code: MSUD102)*. I would like to share with you the
course evaluation structure and important dates.
*Course Evaluation Structure*

The total marks for the course are *100*, divided as follows:

   -

   *50 Marks ‚Äì Internal Examination*
   - *20 Marks* for mid-term exams
      - *10 Marks* for two online quizzes (*5 marks each*)
      - *10 Marks* for assignments
      - *10 Marks* for class tests
   -

   *50 Marks ‚Äì External Examination *

*Important Dates (Tentative)*

   1. *First Quiz:* 10th March 2025
   2. *Second Quiz:* 1st May 2025
   3. *Class Test:* Last week of April 2025

I am attaching the following materials to help you prepare for the course:

   - Reading materials for *Unit 1* and *Unit 4*
   - Assignment examples for  *Unit 1* and *Unit 4*
   - Practice examples   *Unit 1* and *Unit 4*
   - Complete classwork examples

If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact me via email.

Enjoy your mini vacation, and I look forward to seeing you in class!

Best regards,

*Dr. Bina Patel*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences *
*PDPIAS, CHARUSAT, Changa-388421*
*Accredited Grade A+ by NAAC*

*Mob. No: **+91-9427777856  *
*‡§µ‡§∏‡•Å‡§ß‡•à‡§µ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§ü‡•Å‡§Æ‡•ç‡§¨‡§ï‡§Æ*

subject: LaunchED AVENUES IIT BOMBAY CERTIFICATIONS & Industrial Internships For First Year IIITDMJ Students
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Students, I trust this message finds you in good health and spirits. It is with great pleasure that we announce a remarkable opportunity brought to you in partnership with IIT
content:
*Dear CHARUSAT Students,*

I trust this message finds you in good health and spirits.

It is with great pleasure that we announce a remarkable opportunity brought
to you in partnership with *IIT Bombay's Avenues*: a *two-month Training
and Internship Program*. This distinguished program will grant certificates
from reputable multinational organizations in a variety of fields, further
enhancing your academic and professional credentials.



Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/Xrob2CDaSfzZ74XAA>


*Eligibility and Application:*

We extend an invitation to *shortlisted students* from all departments to
apply for this esteemed program. Should any of your fellow students not
have received this communication, we kindly ask that you forward it to them.

Those who wish to participate are required to submit their applications at
the earliest convenience. Should you be shortlisted, a member of our
esteemed HR team will reach out to you directly.

*Submit Your Application*
*Program Details:**Month 1: Training*

   - Participate in live, expert-led sessions and lectures.
   - Login details shall be provided subsequent to your registration.

*Month 2: Internship*

   - Embark upon a hands-on internship, where you shall work on live
   projects under the tutelage of seasoned professionals.
   - *Project Breakdown:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete ten distinct assignments under
      the guidance of your mentor.
      - *Capstone Group Project:* Collaborate with fellow interns on a
      capstone project, with each member assuming a specific role. All required
      resources shall be furnished by the organization.

*Learning Structure:*

   - *Blended Learning:* You will have access to recorded sessions and the
   opportunity to attend live sessions for doubt resolution every weekend.
   - *Live Mentor-Led Sessions:* Engage in live Zoom classes, held two to
   three times a week after 6:30 PM. These sessions will be recorded for
   future reference. Furthermore, you shall have access to our *Learning
   Management System (LMS)* for a period of six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon successful completion of the program, students will be awarded:

   - A *Certificate of Completion*, in association with *Avenues IIT Bombay*
   .
   - *Verified Certificates* via Wipro Dice ID.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from renowned multinational
   companies.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and access to a growing professional
   network.
   - Specialized training in *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - A curriculum centered on *Generative AI* and *Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with distinguished industry leaders.
   - *Personalized Mentorship*, designed to guide and support you
   throughout your career journey.

*A Notable Opportunity Awaits:*

This is indeed an exceptional opportunity for those who wish to broaden
their knowledge and enhance their professional expertise. We encourage all
interested students to submit their applications promptly to secure a
position in this distinguished program.


Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/Xrob2CDaSfzZ74XAA>



*Program Overview:*


With warm regards and best wishes for your continued success,
*Akash Kapoor*
Senior Academic Counselor
*LaunchED Avenues IIT Bombay*

snippet: Dear Students, Greetings from CHARUSAT! We are excited to welcome you to the Community Engagement and Sustainable Development (CESD) - CUUV101- course in Workshop Mode, scheduled to be held from
content:
Dear Students,

Greetings from CHARUSAT!

We are excited to welcome you to the *Community Engagement and Sustainable
Development (CESD) -* CUUV101- course in *Workshop Mode*, scheduled to be
held from *January 16th to 22nd, 2025*, from *9:00 AM to 4:30 PM daily*. As
a two-credit course you opted for at the beginning of the academic year
2024-25 (in lieu of Sports and Physical Training), *your attendance and
active participation in this program are compulsory. Please note that no
post-workshop remedies will be provided.*

*Workshop Schedule:*

   - *Morning Sessions (9:00 AM - 12:00 PM)*
   On-campus interactive discussions, knowledge-sharing, and engaging
   activities.
   - *Lunch Break (12:00 Noon - 1:00 PM)*
   - *Afternoon Sessions (1:00 PM - 4:30 PM)*
   Field visits to nearby villages for hands-on exposure to community
   engagement and sustainable development activities.

*Key Details:*

   - *Dates*: January 16‚Äì22, 2025
   - *Time*: 9:00 AM ‚Äì 4:30 PM
      - *Morning Session*: 9:00 AM ‚Äì 12:00 PM
      - *Lunch Break*: 12:00 PM ‚Äì 1:00 PM
      - *Afternoon Field Visit*: 1:00 PM ‚Äì 4:30 PM
   - *Venue*: RPCP Auditorium, First Floor, Ramanbhai Patel College of
   Pharmacy (Morning Sessions)
   - *Field Visit Location*: Laval Village, Ta- Matar, dist-Kheda
   -  *Transportation for field visits will be arranged by CHARUSAT. *
   - *Please ensure you are present at the Central Lawn on the CHARUSAT
   campus by 1:00 PM each day of the workshop to board the bus.*

This program is designed to provide a *blend of theoretical knowledge and
practical experience*, enabling you to gain a deeper understanding of
community challenges and sustainable practices. We encourage you to
actively participate in both on-campus and field activities to maximize
your learning and contribute meaningfully to the communities you engage
with. *Upon successful completion of this workshop, you will be awarded two
credits on your mark sheet.*

For any questions or further clarification, feel free to contact us at
*9825293046*.

Looking forward to your enthusiastic participation!

*Dr. Dilip Gosai*

*Course Coordinator,**CESD*

*CHARUSAT*


*Dr. Dilip Gosai*
Head
CREDP ( Charusat Rural Education Development Program)
Charotar University of Science & Technology
Accredited *Grade A+* by NAAC

Charotar University of Science & Technology
CHARUSAT Campus - Changa
Off Nadiad-Petlad Highway,
PIN-388421 GUJARAT, INDIA
Ph +91-2697-265160 Cell No.+91-98252-93046
Web: www.charusat.ac.in

<http://www.charusat.ac.in/>

subject: The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles | Volume 10 - Issue 1
snippet: Welcome to Quill The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles Greetings from CHARUSAT! In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we are delighted to introduce Quill ‚Äî the official
content:
[Welcome to Quill]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/wx675d1tcad9c/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/a31db465432dd089f9e892e8753dafb6c5467911]


THE QUILL: CHARUSAT CHRONICLES

Greetings from CHARUSAT!

In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we
are delighted to introduce QUILL ‚Äî the official newsletter of
CHARUSAT. True to its name, Quill embodies the spirit of creativity,
intellect, and expression that defines our vibrant community.

WHAT‚ÄôS INSIDE QUILL?

 	* ACCOLADES: CHARUSAT'S EXCELLENCE ‚Äì Celebrating extraordinary
accomplishments of our students, faculty, and alumni.
 	* RESEARCH PUBLICATIONS: THE EDGE OF EXPLORATION ‚Äì Showcasing
groundbreaking discoveries.
 	* EMINENT SPEAKERS: UNVEILING NEW PERCEPTIONS ‚Äì Dive into engaging
conversations and transformative ideas.
 	* CAMPUS BUZZ: CELEBRATING CAMPUS LIFE ‚Äì Experience the energy and
excitement of campus life.
 	* FACULTY SPOTLIGHT: ACADEMIC EXCELLENCE ‚Äì Highlighting the
brilliance of our faculty.
 	* STUDENT SPOTLIGHT: RISING STARS ‚Äì Inspiring stories of our
student community.

Quill is more than just a newsletter; it is a chronicle of our shared
vision, growth, and success. Join us in celebrating the milestones and
moments that make CHARUSAT a hub of inspiration and innovation.

[Quill Cover Page]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/wx675d1tcad9c/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/acc0b593868118ea4029db7c89d967632bd3964b]

Warm regards,
THE EDITORIAL TEAM
CHARUSAT

subject: Subject: Upload Skill Improvement Certificates
snippet: Dear Students, I hope this email finds you well. Kindly upload the certificates you have earned for skill improvement that are not part of your academic curriculum. Please note that NPTEL certificates
content:
Dear Students,

I hope this email finds you well.

Kindly upload the certificates you have earned for skill improvement that
are not part of your academic curriculum. Please note that *NPTEL
certificates are not to be included*.
Instructions:

   - Ensure the uploaded certificates are from the *last semester only*.
   - *6th semester students*: Do not upload MongoDB certificates.
   - Rename your certificate file as your *Student ID* before uploading.

Deadline:

The final date for submission is *10/01/2025*.

Please use the following Google Form link to upload your certificates:
*Google Form Link <https://forms.gle/i62NYgjs8h6f4qjm7>*

Please treat this request seriously and ensure timely compliance.

Thank you for your cooperation.

If you have any questions or concerns, kindly contact me.

-- 
*Thanks & Regards *
*-----------------------------------*

*Ronak R Patel,*

*Assistant Professor,*
*U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,*
*Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,*
*CHARUSAT, Changa, Gujarat - 388421*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC*

--

subject: Live Streaming of 14·µó ∞ Convocation Ceremony | CHARUSAT
snippet: Convocation 2025 Dear All, We are happy to inform you that the 14th Convocation Ceremony of CHARUSAT will be live-streamed on YouTube. This year's convocation is a special milestone as we celebrate
content:
[Convocation 2025]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ek299l8d7yebf/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/e45138cac2fcb313e48f69d8e518170e93b8d030]


DEAR ALL,

We are happy to inform you that the 14TH CONVOCATION CEREMONY OF
CHARUSAT will be live-streamed on YouTube. This year's convocation is
a special milestone as we celebrate 25 GLORIOUS YEARS OF ACADEMIC
EXCELLENCE.

Click here to Watch the Ceremony Live
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ek299l8d7yebf/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/280d7aa3c6ab2dce0e4b5ea1d43afda06924cd1e]
DATE: January 4, 2025 | TIME: 5 pm onwards
We invite you to join us virtually and participate in this momentous
occasion. The ceremony will feature the conferment of degrees, awards,
and recognition of our students' outstandingvements.

Please feel free to share the link with your family and friends who
may be interested in watching the ceremony.

We look forward to your virtual presence!

[CHARUSAT Full-Length Image]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ek299l8d7yebf/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/e45138cac2fcb313e48f69d8e518170e93b8d030]

subject: Department Sports Coordinator & Volunteer Team
snippet: Dear all students, We are pleased to announce the appointment of our new Sports Coordinator and the formation of our Volunteer Team for the upcoming Spoural'25. üèÖ Sports Coordinator: Darshan Bhuva
content:
Dear all students,

We are pleased to announce the appointment of our new Sports Coordinator
and the formation of our Volunteer Team for the upcoming Spoural'25.

*üèÖ Sports Coordinator:*
Darshan Bhuva - 22CE013
Palak Nandapara - 22CE072
Dhairya Shah - 23CE130

*ü§ù Sport Volunteer Team:*
Devam Ghodasara - 23CE022
Meet Mulani - 23CE075
Mirat Sadrani - 23CE125
Gabani dharm - 24CE030
Rahul Rangani - 24CE102
Dhairya Tanna - 24CE124


This enthusiastic team will lead and organize sports events, encourage
participation, and ensure that our department thrives in both competitive
and recreational sports activities. We are confident that their dedication
and teamwork will bring great energy to our events!

If you have any queries regarding to Spoural'25 sports activities, feel
free to reach out to them directly.


-- 
*Kaushal Bhanderi*
University Student Council, Student Representative of Computer Engineering

snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Pritesh Patel <priteshpatel.sports@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, Jan 2, 2025 at 4:19 PM Subject: Fwd: Reschedule exam of Physical education and sports
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Pritesh Patel <priteshpatel.sports@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Jan 2, 2025 at 4:19‚ÄØPM
Subject: Fwd: Reschedule exam of Physical education and sports CUVV102
To: Head Electrical CHARUSAT <hod.ee@charusat.ac.in>, Head CE CHARUSAT <
hod.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Head Mechanical CHARUSAT <hod.me@charusat.ac.in>,
Head IT CHARUSAT <hod.it@charusat.ac.in>, Head Civil CHARUSAT <
hod.cv@charusat.ac.in>, Head CSE <hod.cse@charusat.ac.in>, Head EC CHARUSAT
<hod.ec@charusat.ac.in>, Principal PDPIAS CHARUSAT <
principal.pdpias@charusat.ac.in>, Principal CMPICA CHARUSAT <
principal.cmpica@charusat.ac.in>, Principal IIIM - CHARUSAT <
principal.iiim@charusat.ac.in>, Head CSE Depstar <hod.csds@charusat.ac.in>,

hod.itds@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Dean FCA CHARUSAT <dean.fca@charusat.ac.in>, Dean FTE CHARUSAT <
dean.fte@charusat.ac.in>, Dean FAS CHARUSAT <dean.fas@charusat.ac.in>, Dean
FMS CHARUSAT <dean.fms@charusat.ac.in>



Respcted sir/ Madam ,

This email is to inform you that several students were absent from the
Physical Education and Sports CUVV102 exam held on . A list of the absent
students is attached for your reference.

In light of this, we have decided to reschedule the exam for *January 9,
2025, at 10:00 AM* in the morning.

We kindly request all Heads of Departments to inform their respective
students about this rescheduling.

For any further information or clarification, please do not hesitate to
contact the Sports Office

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

*Sincerely,*


-- 

*Dr.Pritesh Patel*
*Assistant Director of Physical Education and Sports*

subject: Fwd: Whistle Blower Policy
snippet: Dear All, Please find the attached policy. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Registrar CHARUSAT <registrar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Wed, Jan 1, 2025 at 10:09 AM Subject: Whistle Blower
content:
Dear All,
Please find the attached policy.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Registrar CHARUSAT <registrar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Jan 1, 2025 at 10:09‚ÄØAM
Subject: Whistle Blower Policy
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Provost CHARUSAT <provost@charusat.ac.in>


To,
All CHARUSAT Family members,

The CHARUSAT university believes in upholding high standards of integrity
and ethical behaviour and strives to confirm in all its actions to this
core value. The university is engaged with several stakeholders, each being
critical in helping the university to achieve its vision and mission.
Employees are expected to observe high morals by following right conduct
with honesty and that too without any fear.



In view that a policy for ‚ÄúWhistle Blower‚Äù is prepared and circulated for
the information of all the employees, students and stakeholders of the
university.



The purpose of the Whistle Blowing is to correct something wrong or illegal
and not to serve any personal advancement i.e it has to be done in good
faith and for the betterment of the functioning of the university (i.e
academic and administrative).



The Whistle Blower policy is attached herewith for information of all the
CHARUSAT family members.


*[Note : all the Dean and Principal are hereby informed to circulate this
policy amongst all the students]*


Regards,


*Dr. Atul Patel*

*Registrar*






Accredited Grade ‚ÄúA+‚Äù by NAAC


www.charusat.ac.in

--

subject: STEP TALK on Revolutionizing the Future: The Role of Embedded Systems and IoT in Smart Technologies
snippet: We are excited to invite you to an engaging STEP TALK session, organized by IEEE CSPIT SB in collaboration with the IEEE Gujarat Section. Join us to explore the transformative potential of Embedded
content:
We are excited to invite you to an engaging STEP TALK session,
organized by *IEEE
CSPIT SB* in collaboration with the *IEEE Gujarat Section*. Join us to
explore the transformative potential of Embedded Systems and IoT in driving
smart technologies.


*Event Details:*

‚Ä¢ *Topic:* Revolutionizing the Future: The Role of Embedded Systems and IoT
in Smart Technologies

‚Ä¢ *Speaker:* Dr. Rutu Parekh, Associate Professor at DA-IICT

‚Ä¢ *Date:* Friday, 27 December

‚Ä¢ *Time:* 12:10 PM - 2:10 PM

‚Ä¢ *Venue:* A6 EC/EE Building, Seminar Hall (2nd Floor)


*Session Highlights:*

‚Ä¢ Introduction to Embedded Systems and IoT: Definitions, key concepts, and
evolution.

‚Ä¢ Key Components: Microcontrollers, sensors, actuators, and IoT platforms.

‚Ä¢ Emerging Applications: Smart homes, IIoT, healthcare, and environmental
monitoring.

‚Ä¢ Design Challenges: Low-power designs, real-time performance, security,
and scalability.

‚Ä¢ Role of AI: Enhancing IoT functionalities through AI and case studies.

‚Ä¢ Future Trends: 5G, edge computing, and sustainable IoT technologies.



*About the Speaker:*

*Dr. Rutu Parekh* has extensive expertise in Micro/Nanoelectronics,
Embedded Systems, and IoT. With academic achievements from Concordia
University, Universit√© de Sherbrooke, and IIT Bombay, she has contributed
significantly to military and space application research. She is a
published author, a technical advisor, and the founder and chair of the
IEEE NTC Chapter.


We encourage you to attend this insightful session and engage with a leader
in the field.


*Fill out the google form to book your seat :*

https://forms.gle/k47fR279xJtD2vtn9


Looking forward to your presence!

IEEE CSPIT Student Branch

subject: Offer for the CHARUSAT Girl Students to watch 31st (2024) Gujarati Movie for free
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Family Members, Recently a Gujarati movie entitled '31st (2024)" has been released in theatres. The movie is based on a real life incident, which happened to a girl in Ahmedabad.
content:
Dear CHARUSAT Family Members,



Recently a Gujarati movie entitled '*31st (2024)*" has been released in
theatres. The movie is based on a real life incident, which happened to a
girl in Ahmedabad. You can get more information about the film from online
sources.



The producer of the movie has extended the Free Movie Review for *CHARUSAT
Girl Students*. The girl students currently pursuing their studies at
CHARUSAT will get a *free entry in the theatres* after showing her student
I-Card, issued by CHARUSAT, at the ticket counter of the theatre.



Girl students and Lady Faculty members can avail the offer at *Shaan Cinema
‚Äì Anand* and *Lux Cinema - Petlad* till December 28, 2024. The offer is
limited to the scheduled shows of the film. The entry is subject to the
availability of seats. One ticket will be issued for one I-card. The offer
is limited for the film viewing only, other facilities are not the part of
this scheme.



We wish the maximum number of students to avail this offer.



Thank you.




PS: The right of the entry is reserved by the cinema owner.


With regards,
Regards,
Convener/ Co-convener,
ULSC-CHARUSAT.

--

snippet: Dear Student, This is your chance to secure a place in Teachnook's prestigious 1-2 Month Training + Internship Program in collaboration with Cognizance IIT Roorkee. Certifications will be approved
content:
Dear Student,

This is your *chance* to secure a place in Teachnook's prestigious *1-2
Month Training + Internship Program* in collaboration with Cognizance* IIT
Roorkee*. Certifications will be approved by *AICTE *and verified by* WIPRO
DICE ID*.
*STUDENT WILL RECEIVE:*

   1. *Comprehensive Training & Mentorship*
      - *Month 1:* Live interactive sessions with industry leaders using
      your personalized learning portal.
      - *Month 2:* Real-world internship projects under the guidance of
      experts.

      - Internship Certificate from *top MNCs* verified by Wipro Dice ID.

AI*, *Prompt
      Engineering*, and *Low/No-Code Applications*.
      - Exclusive guest lectures from leaders at *Microsoft* and *Meta*.

*Exclusive Benefits:*

   - A* 6-month *access to an* LMS portal* with personalized options.

To secure your participation in this prestigious program, kindly complete
the *application form & join the official group *at your earliest

Best regards,

*Cognizance IIT Roorkee*

subject: Canada Day by IDP ‚Äì A Unique Study Abroad Opportunity
snippet: Dear Students, We are delighted to inform you about an exciting opportunity to gain valuable insights into studying in Canada through the upcoming "Canada Day by IDP" event, exclusively
content:
Dear Students,



We are delighted to inform you about an exciting opportunity to gain
valuable insights into studying in Canada through the upcoming *"Canada Day
by IDP"* event, exclusively hosted for you at CHARUSAT University in
collaboration with IDP Education.



This event is designed to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of
the opportunities that await in Canada and address common misconceptions
about studying there. Highlights of the event include:



¬∑  *Expert Talk:* "Breaking the Myths about the Present Scenario of
Studying in Canada and Fact-Checking the Enormous Opportunities Awaiting in
Canada."



¬∑  *One-on-One Counseling:* Get personalized guidance and profile
assessments from IDP's Canada team experts.



¬∑  *On-the-Spot Solutions:* Address your queries directly with experienced
counselors.



*Event Details:*

¬∑  *Date:* Tuesday, December 31, 2024

¬∑  *Time:* 11:00 AM ‚Äì 4:00 PM

¬∑  *Venue:* IIIM Auditorium, CHARUSAT University Campus

¬∑  *Registration Link:* Register Here
<https://forms.gle/sNBS7gZavGohxxtG8> (Please
use your CHARUSAT email ID to register.)



This is a remarkable opportunity to explore the possibilities of studying
in Canada and receive tailored advice for the academic journey. We
encourage you to register and make the most of this exclusive event.



Seats are limited, so please register as soon as you can to secure your
participation.



If you have any questions, please get in touch with Dr. Vijay Makwana at
+91 99983 80041.




Thanks & Regards,

*Executive Officer (Corporate Communications)*

subject: Successful Blood Donation Camp ‚Äì A Heartfelt Thank You to the CHARUSAT Family
snippet: Successful Blood Donation Camp ‚Äì A Heartfelt Thank You to the CHARUSAT Family Dear CHARUSAT Family, We are pleased to share the remarkable success of the Blood Donation Camp held on December 20th, 2024
content:
* Successful Blood Donation Camp ‚Äì A Heartfelt Thank You to the CHARUSAT
Family*

Dear CHARUSAT Family,

We are pleased to share the remarkable success of the Blood Donation Camp
held on December 20th, 2024. This event was made possible thanks to the
unwavering dedication of our entire CHARUSAT Family.

A special mention goes to *the student team*, whose active participation
and enthusiasm played a pivotal role in making this life-saving initiative
a reality. Their commitment to service and compassion truly reflects the
core values of our university.

For your reference, we have attached *the list of student participants *along
with *some glimpses of the event*.

Such events are a testament to the strong spirit of collaboration at
CHARUSAT. Your encouragement and involvement are key to inspiring us to
organize more impactful activities in the future.

We are grateful for your continued support and look forward to your
participation in future endeavors.

Together, let‚Äôs continue to make a meaningful difference in society and
strengthen our commitment to community service.


---Thanks & Regards---
Mr. Kishan Patel
Program Coordinator
CHARUSAT NSS Unit
CHARUSAT, Changa 388421

--

subject: [IMPORTANT]IIT CERTIFICATIONS & AICTE Approved Industrial Internships For First Year CHARUSAT Students
snippet: DEAR STUDENTS OF CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY (GUJRAT) Warm Greetings! We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with IIT Roorkee's Cognizance: a 2-Month Training and Internship
content:
*DEAR STUDENTS*


*OF*

*CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY(GUJRAT)Warm Greetings!*

We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with *IIT
Roorkee's Cognizance*: a *2-Month Training and Internship Program* featuring
certifications from prestigious companies including *Cisco, Meta
(Facebook), IBM*, and other leading multinational organizations across
various fields.

*Who Can Apply?*
We invite applications from shortlisted students in all departments. If any
of your classmates haven't received this information, please feel free to
forward this email to them.

*It is Important for Interested Students to submit their application, if
you get shortlisted you will be getting a response from our HR Team:*

Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>




*STUDENTS ENROLLED UNDER SCHOLARSHIP :*
NAME YEAR DOMAIN COLLEGE

CHARUSAT

CHARUSAT

Ritik Kumar  1 st Year ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CHARUSAT

Dhruv Pawar 1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Utsav Dave 1 st Year EMBEDDED SYSTEM CHARUSAT
Suhanee Yadav 1 st Year AUTOCAD CHARUSAT
Patel Kashish Rakeshkumar  1 st Year AUTOCAD CHARUSAT
Rudra Panchal  1 st Year CYBER SECURITY (CISCO VERIFIED CERTIFICATE)
CHARUSAT
Sutariya Shreyansh Vikaskumar 1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Preya Dhangar  2 nd Year WEB DEVELOPMENT CHARUSAT
Tolat Mahek Rajeshbhai 3 rd Year Android App Development CHARUSAT
* Program Overview:*

*First Month: Training*

   - Participate in live lectures and receive guidance from industry
   professionals.
   - You will receive login details after registering.

*Second Month: Internship*

   - Engage in real-world projects with professional mentorship.
   - *Project Details:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete 10 unique projects with your
      mentor.
      - *Group Capstone Project:* Collaborate in teams on a capstone
      project, with specific roles assigned to each intern. All necessary
      resources will be provided by the company.

*Class Formats:*

   1. *Blended Learning:*
      - Access recorded sessions and join live doubt-clearing sessions
      every weekend.
   2. *Live Mentor-led Classes:*
      - Attend live Zoom sessions 2-3 times per week at 6:30 PM, with
      recorded sessions available for later review. You will also have
access to
      our Learning Management System (LMS) for six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon completion, students will receive:

   - A *Certificate of Completion* from Cognizance IIT Roorkee.
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and entry to a growing professional
   network.
   - Training on *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - Curriculum focused on *Generative AI and Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with industry leaders.
   - Personalized mentorship for tailored guidance.



*Don‚Äôt miss out on this valuable opportunity!*
*Interested students should submit their applications to be part of this
transformative experience.*


Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>



*Best regards,*

*AKASH KAPOOR*
*Senior Academic **Counselor*
*HR MANAGER'S TNK*

snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Family Members, Greetings We are pleased to announce that the 10th Blood Donation Camp in Memory of Mangla Baa (‡™Æ‡™Ç‡™ó‡™≤‡™æ ‡™¨‡™æ ‡™®‡´Ä ‡™™‡´Å‡™£‡´ç‡™Ø‡™§‡™ø‡™•‡™ø ‡™®‡™ø‡™Æ‡™ø‡™§‡´á) is scheduled to be held on 20th December 2024
content:
*Dear CHARUSAT Family Members,*

Greetings

We are pleased to announce that the *10th Blood Donation Camp in Memory of
Mangla Baa (*‡™Æ‡™Ç‡™ó‡™≤‡™æ ‡™¨‡™æ ‡™®‡´Ä ‡™™‡´Å‡™£‡´ç‡™Ø‡™§‡™ø‡™•‡™ø ‡™®‡™ø‡™Æ‡™ø‡™§‡´á) is scheduled to be held on *20th
December 2024*, from *08:00 AM to 04:00 PM* at *"AASTHA," Indukaka Marg,
Vallabh Vidyanagar*.

To ensure the success of this noble cause, we humbly request All Faculty
Members, Staff Members and Students For kind support in Blood Donation.
Kindly *fill out the attached Registration form* to confirm participation.
We are expecting a Participation of at least * Minimum 10 Members per
department/Institute* to make this event a success.

Registration Link:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeK3xjEBzWG-Op23zkYgo6d8fNl-Mv9AC7FCApND6Ble1-AuQ/viewform?usp=sf_link

   - Reporting Time at Central Lawn on 20/12/2024 : 09:10 AM on Sharp


   - Transportation Will Provided by CHARUSAT.
   - Refreshment will Provided by the Organizer.

Your small act of kindness can make a big difference in saving lives. Let‚Äôs
unite and *be heroes* by promoting the spirit of donation and service.

*P.S.: @Counselors Please Pass this Information to Students Via **WhatsApp*
*Group.*

Thank you for your cooperation and support!

--

Warm Regards,
Kishan Patel
Program Coordinator
CHARUSAT NSS Unit.

*Provost (Vice-Chancellor),*

Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: President, AIU <president@aiu.ac.in>
Date: Mon, Dec 16, 2024 at 5:26‚ÄØPM
Subject: Invitation to Join Hackathon Event Organized by IIT Kanpur
To: <provost@charusat.ac.in>


*Invitation to Join Hackathon Event Organized by IIT Kanpur*


Dear Vice Chancellor/ Director


*Greetings from the Association of Indian Universities (AIU).*


I am delighted to extend an invitation to your esteemed university to
participate in the upcoming Hackathon Event organized by IIT Kanpur. As
India's leading cybersecurity innovation hub, C3iHub, IIT Kanpur aims to
nurture talent and drive innovation by tackling real-world cybersecurity
challenges. This hackathon offers an exciting platform for students and
researchers to engage with industry experts, showcase their skills, and
contribute to solving critical cybersecurity issues.


I would like to invite your esteemed university to encourage participation
through your students and alumni in the cybersecurity challenges.

For more details, please visit the event website at
https://hackathon.iitk.ac.in
<https://754s0.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/6rqJfgq8dINmNjUh0N2jnWjHZVU/Dctd-RS46UWc>



*The main goal of this hackathon is to raise awareness about cybersecurity
among young people.*



*Expectations from Universities:*

*Promotional Support:*

Sharing event details with students and faculty through internal
communication channels.

Prominent display of hackathon materials on campus and social platforms.

*Participation:*

Encouraging active participation from your student community.

Facilitating faculty involvement in hackathon activities.

*Benefits for Participants:*

Hackathon challenges will resemble real-world scenarios, allowing
participants to develop expertise as they progress through them.

Participants will learn how to stay cyber-safe against modern cyberattacks
and crimes.

Hackathon winners will receive cash awards, cloud credits, and
opportunities for internships or jobs with C3iHub.

Hackathon winners will also get startup incubation opportunities with SIIC
at IIT Kanpur under the guidance of C3iHub.


We believe that your university's participation will significantly
contribute to the success of this event, while also providing valuable
learning and growth opportunities for your students and faculty.


I appreciate your support and we look forward to your active participation.


Warm regards,

Prof. Vinay Kumar Pathak
President, Association of Indian Universities, New Delhi
& VC, CSJM University, Kanpur












If you wish to unsubscribe from our newsletter, click here

subject: Invitation to Become a Coordinator/Volunteer for Spoural'25
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to announce an opportunity for you to be a Coordinator/Volunteer for Spoural'25, our annual cultural and sports event, celebrating 25 years of excellence at CHARUSAT
content:
*Dear Students,*

We are excited to announce an opportunity for you to be a
*Coordinator/Volunteer* for *Spoural'25*, our annual cultural and sports
event, celebrating 25 years of excellence at CHARUSAT University.

As a coordinator, you will play a key role in organizing and managing
various activities, ensuring the event‚Äôs success. This is a great chance to
develop leadership skills, work in a team, and contribute to this historic
celebration!

To register your interest as a coordinator, please fill out the form below:
https://forms.gle/oDueeQgxJnDVMuf77 <https://forms.gle/PweMzhKuDj71hHqi6>

üìÖ *Submission Deadline:* 20th December 2024

Your contribution will help make Spoural'25 a truly memorable event for
everyone. Don‚Äôt miss this opportunity to lead and showcase your
organizational abilities!

For any queries, feel free to reach out.

*Warm regards,*

--
*Pooja Ramani*
University Level Student Council, Student Representative of Computer
Engineering
[image: phone-icon]  22ce106@charusat.edu.in <22ce005@charusat.edu.in>
 [image: phone-icon]  7046135619

subject: Invitation to Participate in Spoural'25 - Annual Cultural Event
snippet: Dear All Students, We are delighted to invite you to Spoural'25, our annual cultural event held on 29th december to 31st december, celebrating 25 years of excellence at CHARUSAT University. This
content:
*Dear All Students,*

We are delighted to invite you to *Spoural'25*, our annual cultural event
held on 29th december to 31st december, celebrating 25 years of excellence
at CHARUSAT University. This landmark occasion promises to be an
extraordinary celebration filled with vibrant performances, creativity, and
artistic brilliance!

It‚Äôs your chance to represent your department, showcase your talents, and
be part of this historic milestone. Whether you love music, dance, drama,
art, or other cultural activities, there‚Äôs a place for you to shine!

To register your interest and select your preferred cultural activities,
please fill out the form below:
https://forms.gle/5L7xLZmmqTHNFh5u5

üìÖ *Submission Deadline:* 20th December 2024
üé≠ *Audition Process:*
The selection process will commence on *next week onwards*. Details
regarding the exact dates and venues for auditions will be shared soon, so
stay tuned!

Your participation and passion will make this event a grand success. Don‚Äôt
miss this opportunity to contribute to the vibrant cultural spirit of
CHARUSAT. Let‚Äôs come together to celebrate creativity and our university‚Äôs
legacy!

For any queries, feel free to reach out.

*Warm regards,*
--
*Pooja Ramani*
University Level Student Council, Student Representative of Computer
Engineering
[image: phone-icon]  22ce106@charusat.edu.in <22ce005@charusat.edu.in>
 [image: phone-icon]  7046135619

subject: TNK COGNIZANCE IIT ROORKEE AICTE APPROVED INTERNSHIP FOR CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY STUDENTS [CISCO & META CERTIFICATION]
snippet: DEAR CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY STUDENT [AICTE approved internship program with TNK COGNIZANCE IIT ROORKEE] [CISCO AND META INTERNSHIP CERTIFICATION] It is MANDATORY for the interested students to fill out
content:
DEAR* CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY *STUDENT
*[AICTE approved internship program with TNK COGNIZANCE IIT ROORKEE] **[CISCO
AND META INTERNSHIP CERTIFICATION]*

*It is MANDATORY for the interested students to fill out the form to get
this opportunity:*
*https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc6cIpZ6lNj4RKTgLZiF4h7I8U-t95PnYfoq9e-pWvT1dmpzQ/viewform*
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc6cIpZ6lNj4RKTgLZiF4h7I8U-t95PnYfoq9e-pWvT1dmpzQ/viewform>


*TNK in Collaboration with COGNIZANCE IIT ROORKEE* *is organizing a 2
Months Training + Internship program. We are enrolling only LIMITED
STUDENTS in the program*


*To know more information join in WhatsApp group:*
*https://chat.whatsapp.com/KTyPeg4qerdG7t9iq57TpP*
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/KTyPeg4qerdG7t9iq57TpP>

*PHASE-1 & 2 REGISTRATION LIST OF STUDENTS*
NAME DOMAIN YEAR UNIVERSITY NAME
Meet Darji UI/UX 1 YEAR Charotar University of science and technology
Prit Patel Cyber Security 1 YEAR Charusat
Harsh Suthar Digital Marketing 1 YEAR CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY
Foram kanani Data Science 1 YEAR Charusat university
Amiben Bhaveshkumar Gohel Web Development 1 YEAR Charusat university, CMPICA
Jivani Ruchit Jayprakash Web Development 1 YEAR Charotar University of
Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Prince Patel Cyber Security 1 YEAR Charusat University
Vidhi Panarkar Human Resource 1 YEAR Charusat university
PATEL DIVYKUMAR BHAVESHBHAI Data Science 1 YEAR CHANDUBHAI S PATEL INSTITUT
OF TECHNOLOGY
DHOLAKIYA PRUTHVI JIGNESHBHAI Data Science 1 YEAR Charusat university
MAKWANA YASH DINESHBHAI Web Development 1 YEAR Charusat university
PAREKH SHUBAHM ASHOKKUMAR Stock Marketing 1 YEAR CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY


*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*
First month: IIT training has been designed in the form of Live lectures
along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)

Second month: Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will be giving students experience
in solving real-world problems.

Project 1:- 10 individual projects assigned to each intern which they have
to complete with their mentor .

Project 2:-  Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a group of
15 interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them they
have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

Here are two types of Classes we are providing:

1. Blended Program/Recorded classes: You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear it in live doubt clearing sessions
which will be organized every weekend.

2. Mentor-led/Live classes: You will be having live Zoom classes at 6:30
PM  for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well
LMS(Learning Management System) portal which you will have access to for 6
months.

After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a:

‚úÖ Program completion certificate issued by COGNIZANCE IIT ROORKEE.
‚úÖ Co-Branded Internship certificate from Top MNCs.
‚úÖ 100% Placement Assistance.
‚úÖ Access to a growing community.

*The students must fill out the form to get this opportunity:*
*https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc6cIpZ6lNj4RKTgLZiF4h7I8U-t95PnYfoq9e-pWvT1dmpzQ/viewform*
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc6cIpZ6lNj4RKTgLZiF4h7I8U-t95PnYfoq9e-pWvT1dmpzQ/viewform>

--

*Thanks & Regards!!*

*SAGAR PATEL*
*TRAINING  DEPT. *
*(TEACHNOOK IN COLLABORATION WITH  COGNIZANCE IIT ROORKEE) *

subject: Poster making Competition for Students & Staff of CHARUSAT
snippet: Dear Students, Energy Conservation Cell-CHARUSAT has organized a hand-drawn poster-making competition for students and staff of CHARUSAT on the occasion of "National Energy Conservation Day: 14th
content:
Dear Students,
Energy Conservation Cell-CHARUSAT has organized a hand-drawn poster-making
competition for students and staff of CHARUSAT on the occasion of "National
Energy Conservation Day: 14th December 2024."

The theme of the poster is "Innovations in Energy Saving."  The participant
has to submit an *A3 size hand-drawn pencil sketch poster *to the Head,
Electrical Engineering Department, CSPIT (Room No. 136, A6 Building,
CAPIT) before 6 January 2025, 04.30 pm.

First three winners will be awarded prize money.
No Entry Fee.
E-certificate will be provided to all participants.
For more details, contact: Head, Electrical Engineering Dept., CSPIT.

Regards,
[image: Innovations in Energy Saving.jpg]

-- 
Dr. Nilaykumar A. Patel
Associate professor & Head,
Electrical Engineering Dept.
Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,
Changa. 388421
Ta: Petlad.
Phone:02697 265041

My Web Page: https://sites.google.com/charusat.ac.in/nilaypatel/home

--

subject: Participate in Spoural'25 Sport Selection
snippet: Dear All Students, We are thrilled to invite you to be part of Spoural'25, our annual sports event, marking 25 years of excellence at CHARUSAT University. This milestone event promises to be bigger
content:
Dear All Students,
We are thrilled to invite you to be part of *Spoural'25*, our annual sports
event, marking *25 years of excellence* at CHARUSAT University. This
milestone event promises to be bigger and better, with exciting
competitions across various sports. It's your chance to represent your
department, showcase your athletic skills, and be a part of this historic
celebration!

To register your interest and select your preferred sports, please fill out
the form below:
https://forms.gle/zsSPayCxaMGYoFHy6

üìÖ *Submission Deadline*: 13th December 2024
üèÖ *Selection Process *:
The selection process will commence from *16th December 2024*. The exact
dates and venue for selections will be shared in the coming days, so stay
tuned!

Your enthusiasm and energy will make this event a grand success. Don‚Äôt miss
out on this opportunity to contribute to the vibrant spirit of CHARUSAT.
Let‚Äôs come together to celebrate our university‚Äôs legacy through the joy of
sports!

For any queries, feel free to reach out.

-- 
*Kaushal Bhanderi*
University Level Student Council, Student Representative of Computer
Engineering
[image: phone-icon]  22ce005@charusat.edu.in
 [image: phone-icon]  9313628370

subject: Submission Guidelines for ICT Practical Work.
snippet: Dear Students, You are requested to complete your submission on or before 15th December 2024 to the respective lab faculties. Below are the detailed guidelines for submitting your ICT practical work:
content:
Dear Students,

You are requested to complete your submission on or before *15th December
2024* to the respective lab faculties. Below are the detailed guidelines
for submitting your ICT practical work:
*Submission Guidelines for Each Practical*

   1.

   *Practical 1 and 2:*
   - Write the conclusion and observation.
   2.

   *Practical 3 and 4:*
   - Attach snapshots of 20 commands.
      - Write the conclusion and observation.
   3.

   *Practical 5 and 6:*
   - Submit a course certificate and quiz marks( Google Form).
      - Write the conclusion and observation.
   4.

   *Practical 7 and 8:*
   - Edit the attached word and submit.
   5.

   *Practical 9 and 10:*
   - Attach the code.
      - Write the conclusion and observation.
   6.

   *Practical 11:*
   - Attach a snapshot of the app created.
      - Write the conclusion and observation.
   7.

   *Practical 12 and 13:*
   - Write the conclusion and observation.
   8.

   *Practical 14:*
   - Write the observation and conclusion.

*Common Guidelines:*

   1. Each practical should start on a new page.
   2. You can print on both sides of the pages.
   3. The conclusion and observation sections can be typed.
   4. Ensure that the *Index and Certificate* are attached (specific dates
   for these will be provided soon).

Please adhere to these guidelines to ensure your submission is complete and
organized. If you have any queries, feel free to reach out to the lab
faculties.

Please find attached a sample file for your reference.
*--*
*Thanks & Regards,*
*Muskan Dave*
*Assistant professor *
*Department of Computer Engineering.*
*Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology *
*CHARUSAT University, Changa.*

--

subject: Seating Arrangement of External Exam of BTECH CE - 1st
snippet: Dear Students, Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in the email attachment. Students are required to uphold decorum in the examination hall. Mobile phones, smartwatches,
content:
Dear Students,

Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in the
email attachment. Students are required to uphold decorum in the
examination hall. Mobile phones, smartwatches, or any other electronic
devices are strictly prohibited within the exam hall. Bags must be left
outside, and it is mandatory to wear an ID card. Students have to take
their seat in the exam hall at least 15 minute prior to the exam time.


The exam will take place in Exam Hall 1 and Exam Hall 2  of Multi Utility
Building & IIIM Institute. I have included details here in the seating
arrangement.


*A) **Exam Venue*:

The examination will be conducted in the following locations:

   - *Exam Hall 201*: Located on the first floor of the Multi-Utility
   Building.
   - *Exam Hall 301*: Located on the second floor of the Multi-Utility
   Building.
   - The Multi-Utility Building is situated *behind the MBA Building*.

*B) Exam Venue*:
The examination will take place at the following locations in the *IIIM
Institute*:

   - *Ground Floor*: Room Nos. IT1 to IT8
   - *First Floor*: Room Nos. 204, 205, 208, 214, 215, and 216

All students are required to enter the campus through the Karoli Gate and
follow the signboards to reach the Multi-Utility Building.


The Multi-Utility Building is located behind the MBA building. Exam Hall 1
is situated on the first floor, and Exam Hall 2 is on the second floor of
this building.


All students are required to enter the campus through the Karoli Gate and
follow the signboards to reach the Multi-Utility Building. A Detailed
seating plan is also attached herewith.

Thanks & Regards,
Dhaval Bhoi
Assistant Professor,
U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT, Changa.
Ta-Petlad Dist.Anand
PIN-388421 GUJARAT, INDIA

content:

internal quiz have been released. Additionally, the list of students marked

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dr.Yagneshnath Vyas <yagnesh.bisagn@digitalindia.gov.in>
Date: Fri, Nov 29, 2024 at 11:00‚ÄØAM
Subject: ONLINE APPLICATIONS ARE INVITED FROM ANY GRADUATE ENGINEERS FROM
THE SCHEDULE TRIBE (ST) CANDIDATES OF GUJARAT STATE FOR ADMISSION IN THE
FINISHING SCHOOL PROGRAMME: Opportunity for YoP (2022, 2023 and 2024)
(Registration is open till 21-DEC-2024 time till 5:00 PM)
To:


Gentle Reminder for Registrations in the Finishing School Programme for
D-SAG.

Dear Principal/Head/Training & Placement Officers,

This is to inform you that the online registration is OPEN for admission to
the Finishing School Programme.

The purpose of the Finishing School Programme is to develop employability
skills into Computer Programming Languages and IT Skillsets as per the
industry needs.

Currently, online applications are invited from ANY GRADUATE ENGINEERS from
the Schedule Tribe (ST) candidates of Gujarat State.

Please share the below link with your alumni from Batch YoP (2022, 2023 and
2024) and encourage them to register. Registration is open till 21-DEC-2024
till 5:00 PM.

For Registration Visit:

https://dsagsahay.gujarat.gov.in/
<https://mail.mgovcloud.in/zm/reUrlCheck.do?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdsagsahay.gujarat.gov.in%2F&>

Registration Link:
https://dsagsahay.gujarat.gov.in/CitizenPortal/instruction


Thanking You

Dr. Yagnesh Vyas
Project Director - Finishing School Programme
Bhaskaracharya National Institute for Space Applications and Geo-informatics
Gandhinagar, Gujarat.
MeitY, Government of India

-----

subject: D2D students : Year 2024-25 MYSY Fresh registration is open
snippet: Dear CSPIT Students, We are pleased to inform you that MYSY documents submission / verification start for D2D students admitted in the year 2024-25 at CSPIT EE/EC Building ‚Äì CSPIT ADMIN OFFICE Room No
content:
Dear CSPIT Students,

We are pleased to inform you that MYSY documents submission /
verification start for
D2D students admitted in the year 2024-25 *at CSPIT EE/EC Building ‚Äì CSPIT
ADMIN OFFICE Room No 101.*

*Please take a note of the following points before submitting
the documents:*

A.  Lock the Application and take printout of form. *P**rint out of
Application form from the WhatsApp image is not acceptable. *

B.  All uploaded scan documents *must be clearly visible**.*

C.  Submit the application form with photocopies of all uploaded
documents *(except
IT Form).*

D. Please upload a fee receipt which contains *Revenue Stamp and sign by
the Account Section of CHARUSAT. *

E. Student must write *Enrolment Number (ID No.) in the MYSY form.*

F. Upload Sahay renewal certificate *(Will get through your e governance
login) *from head of institute *in original with sign of Principal Sir (Not
blank).*

*G. **Write barcode ID at the top of the form* which will help us to
retrieve the data immediately.

*H. No need of Photograph with the Application.*


*Special Note:*

1.      Students are requested to *just drop the application in the tray
placed at said office.*

2.      To save time, *there is no need to stay at said office, timely
appropriate action will be taken by us.*


      *REFER MYSY SITE FOR MORE INFO. (**http://mysy.guj.nic.in
<http://mysy.guj.nic.in/>**)*

-- 
Thanks,
*Yatin Talati*

Accredited Grade ‚ÄúA+‚Äù by NAAC, GOI

Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Off. Nadiad - Petlad Highway, Changa, Gujarat, INDIA 388421
www.charusat.ac.in

--

subject: Last Day to Apply for Wipro Training, Internship, and Placement
snippet: Dear Students of CHARUS, Greetings from Krutanic Solutions! We are wrapping up our Scholarship Campaign today, and this is your final chance to apply. We have partnered with top MNCs such as IBM,
content:
Dear Students of CHARUS,

Greetings from Krutanic Solutions!

We are wrapping up our Scholarship Campaign today, and this is your final
chance to apply. We have partnered with top MNCs such as IBM, Microsoft,
Deloitte, Cognizant, Barclays, Infosys, Genpact, Oracle, TCS, PwC, J.P.
Morgan, Amazon, Accenture, HCL Technologies, Tech Mahindra, and more to
offer a comprehensive Training, Internship, and Placement Assistance
Program.

*Program Highlights:*

   - *Duration*: 2-3 months (completely online)
   - *1st Month (Training & Learning)*: Theoretical learning, live
   interactive sessions, and one-on-one doubt-clearing.
   - *2nd Month (Internship & Projects)*: Hands-on experience with
   real-time projects and mentorship, including a minor and major group
   project.
   - *3rd Month (Placement Assistance)*: Mock interviews, group
   discussions, resume building, and personality development to enhance your
   job prospects.

*Note*: Training fees are applicable.

*Certificates Provided*:

   - Wipro Certified Internship Completion Certificate
   - Course Completion Certificate from Krutanic, AICTE, & ISO Certified
   - Letter of Recommendation (LOR) from MNCs
   - Excellence Certificate for top performers

*Hurry! Only 5 seats are remaining for your class.*

*APPLY NOW: https://forms.gle/zcTYy9oYmdkpipEX7
<https://forms.gle/zcTYy9oYmdkpipEX7>*

*Referral Code*: KRT40

If you're ready to kickstart your career with industry experts, apply now!
Feel free to reach out for any queries.

We look forward to helping you achieve your dream job!

Best regards,
Divyansh
Krutanic Solutions

content:
Dear Students,

Please find the final internal evaluation (out of 50 marks) attached.

Students who have scored less than *18 marks* are required to meet me
immediately within the next *two days*.

If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact me.

With regards,

subject: Schedule for Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz + Foundation Course Quiz
snippet: Dear Students, We hope you're doing well. Please note the schedule for the upcoming Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz + Foundation Course Quiz as part of your evaluation process: Quiz 1: Foundation
content:
Dear Students,

We hope you're doing well. Please note the schedule for the upcoming
Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz + Foundation Course Quiz as part of your
evaluation process:

Quiz 1: Foundation Course (External Exam Quiz)
Date: 07/12/2024
Time: 3:00 to 3:30 PM
Format: Online (25 Marks)


Quiz 2: Engineering Physics - 1 (2nd Internal Quiz)
Date:   07/12/2024
Time:   3:30 to 4:00 PM
Format: Online (20 Marks)

Both quizzes are mandatory and the Google form link will be shared closer
to the date.


Best regards,
Sanni

-- 
*Thanks,*



*Sanni, Ph.D.Assistant professorDepartment of Physical Sciences
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/PDPIAS/people/>Faculty of Applied SciencesP D
Patel Institute of Applied Sciences,CHARUSAT

subject: Fwd: Important Instruction for staff and students for Parking during 29-30, November 2024
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Deputy Registrar (HR and General Admin.) CHARUSAT <dy.registrar.hrd@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, Nov 28, 2024 at 4:46 PM Subject: Important Instruction
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Deputy Registrar (HR and General Admin.) CHARUSAT <
dy.registrar.hrd@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Nov 28, 2024 at 4:46‚ÄØPM
Subject: Important Instruction for staff and students for Parking during
29-30, November 2024
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>


Dear All,


There will be a University function on 30-11-2024. In context to that, *All
are requested to follow the following parking arrangements during
29-11-2024 (Friday) and 30-11-2024 (Saturday) : *

   1. Four-wheel vehicles shall be parked in the plot behind the PDPIAS
   building.
   2. Two-wheel vehicles shall be parked at CHARUSAT Hospital Parking Area,
   Opp. Karoli Road Gate.



All are requested to please cooperate with security personnel.  Also,
convey the message to students for the same.



Thanks and Regards.



Rajendra Solanki

I/c. Dy. Registrar (HR & General Admin)

Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
CHARUSAT Campus, Changa -388 421

Contact : +91-2697-265011, 265021,

Ext.- 5004

Mobile: +91-9924020897



Accredited Grade A+ by NAAC
