subject: Mandatory Safety Reminder for CHARUSAT family: Helmet & Seat Belt Compliance ‚Äì NSS Initiative
snippet: Dear Charusat Family Members, Greetings From Charusat NSS Unit We would like to inform you that it is now mandatory for all Students,Staff and faculty Members to: Wear helmets while riding two-wheelers
content:
Dear  Charusat Family Members,

Greetings From Charusat NSS Unit

We would like to inform you that it is now *mandatory* for all
Students,Staff and faculty Members to:

   - *Wear helmets* while riding two-wheelers.
   - *Fasten seat belts* when driving or traveling in a car.

To ensure adherence, *NSS Volunteers* *will be stationed at both university
gates to monitor compliance and raise awareness.* We kindly ask everyone to
be *polite and cooperative* with them, as they are working to safeguard
your safety.

This initiative is *compulsory* and has been implemented to maintain a safe
environment for all members of the CHARUSAT community.

Your cooperation is crucial to the success of this initiative. Let‚Äôs work
together to make our campus safer.

Thank you for your Valuable support and understanding .


--
Regards,
Kishan Patel
NSS Program Coordinator
CHARUSAT NSS UNIT

--

subject: water level final code
Day 9: Break it Down with Recursion
snippet: Day 9 of 30 Days of Code Hi Patel, Welcome to Day 9. Let's break it down! We're splitting one big problem into two easy pieces with recursion. You'll learn how to write a recursive function

subject: Fwd: Revised circular on providing Financial assistance to U.G, P.G students and Research Scholar for presenting Research paper in National / International Conference / Symposium
snippet: Dear Students, Please refer to the circular on providing Financial assistance to UG, PG students and Research Scholar for presenting Research papers in National / International Conference / Symposium
content:
Dear Students,
Please refer to the circular on providing Financial assistance to U.G, P.G
students and Research Scholar for presenting Research papers in National /
International Conference / Symposium in the trailing mail.


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal CSPIT <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Mon, Nov 25, 2024 at 3:51‚ÄØPM
Subject: Fwd: Revised circular on providing Financial assistance to U.G,
P.G students and Research Scholar for presenting Research paper in National
/ International Conference / Symposium
To: HOD Group <hod@charusat.ac.in>


For information please..

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Registrar CHARUSAT <registrar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Mon, Nov 25, 2024 at 3:19‚ÄØPM
Subject: Revised circular on providing Financial assistance to U.G, P.G
students and Research Scholar for presenting Research paper in National /
International Conference / Symposium
To: Dean CHARUSAT <dean@charusat.ac.in>, Principal <principal@charusat.ac.in
>
Cc: Provost CHARUSAT <provost@charusat.ac.in>, Nisha Dave <
nishadave.adm@charusat.ac.in>, Shahnawaj Pathan <
shahnawaj.adm@charusat.ac.in>, Rajendra Solanki <
rajendrasolanki.adm@charusat.ac.in>, Shailesh Khant <
shaileshkhant.mca@charusat.ac.in>, Coordinator IQAC CHARUSAT <
coordinator.iqac@charusat.ac.in>


Sir/Madam,

Please note that the authority of the university has framed and revised the
existing circular on providing Financial Assistance to U.G, P.G Students by
inclusion of provision for Research scholar for presenting Research paper
in National / International Conference / Symposium.

You are hereby informed to circulate the same among all the students (U.G &
P.G) and Research Scholar for information.

Regards,


*Dr. Atul Patel*

*Registrar*


Accredited Grade ‚ÄúA+‚Äù by NAAC

www.charusat.ac.in





-- 
Dr. Trushit Upadhyaya
Professor & I/c Principal
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology
Faculty of Technology & Engineering

Petlad, Anand, Gujarat, India.

subject: "Level Up Your Startup Journey ‚Äì Join CIVF Acceleration 2.0 Today!"
snippet: üöÄ Calling All Start-up Founders! Charusat Innovative Ventures Foundation (CIVF), recognized as a Nodal Institute by the Industries Commissionerate, Govt. of Gujarat, is here to supercharge your
content:
üöÄ *Calling All Start-up Founders!*

Charusat Innovative Ventures Foundation (CIVF), recognized as a *Nodal
Institute* by the *Industries Commissionerate, Govt. of Gujarat*, is here
to supercharge your entrepreneurial journey!

üåü *What We Offer: *An opportunity to apply for -

üí∞ Seed support of up to *‚Çπ30 lakhs* for innovative startups as Grant and
Equity investment of *‚Çπ**1.25 Cr. *

üíº Sustenance allowance: ‚Çπ20,000/month for men-led startups & ‚Çπ25,000/month
for *women-led startups* (for 1 year).
üí° Additional support of *‚Çπ10 lakhs* for startups creating a *significant
societal impact* (total seed support up to ‚Çπ40 lakhs).
üõ†Ô∏è Training assistance: Up to *‚Çπ1 lakh per startup* for soft skills
reimbursement.
üåç Acceleration program funding: Up to *‚Çπ3 lakhs* for
national/international programs.
üìà MSME support: *1% interest subsidy* on term loans (up to 9%).


üåê *Why Choose CIVF?*
We‚Äôre an accelerator backed by a robust network of *Industrial Mentors*, *Angel
Investors*, and *VC firms*.

   - *CIVF Acceleration Program 1.0* highlights:
   ‚úÖ 32 start-ups admitted
   ‚úÖ 20+ investor calls
   ‚úÖ 120+ mentorship sessions
   ‚úÖ Recruitment drives, exhibitions, award ceremonies, and more!


‚úÖ *If you are already associated with CIVF*, kindly complete the *Seed
Support Form* üìÑ [refer to *Annexure-1*, Pages *9-12*, Points *2.3, 2.4,
and 2.5*].

üöÄ *If you are not yet associated with CIVF*, we invite you to join
our *Acceleration
Program 2.0* üåü. Upon successful completion of the program, you will become
eligible to apply for *seed funding of ‚Çπ30-40 lakhs* üí∞, as outlined
in the *Industries
Commissionerate Guidelines* üìú [refer to *Annexure-1*, Page *5*, Point *2.1*,
Sub-point *8*].

üéØ *Join the CIVF Acceleration Program 2.0! *
Be part of *Cohort 2.0*, designed to scale your startup and deliver
tangible outcomes. (Find the Brochure attached as Ann-2)

üëâ *Apply Now:* Fill out the form here
<https://civf.co.in/acceleration-program#form>.

üåê *Learn More:* Visit our website <https://civf.co.in/>.
*Also Note the Deadline is extended till 30th Nov, 2024 4:30 PM. *

--

subject: Submission Deadline for Journal and Lab Manual ‚Äì Engineering Physics-I
snippet: Dear Students, This is a reminder regarding submitting your Journal and Lab Manual for the subject Engineering Physics-I. Please note the following details: Submission Deadline: on/before 30th November
content:
Dear Students,

This is a reminder regarding submitting your *Journal* and *Lab Manual* for
the subject *Engineering Physics-I*. Please note the following details:

   - *Submission Deadline:* on/before 30th November 2024
   - *Where to Submit:* Respective lab-in-charge
   - *Requirements:* Ensure all experiments are completed, signed, and
   properly documented in the journal and lab manual. Moreover, Journals must
   be certified. *(Signed on certificate/first page)*

Timely submission is mandatory, No submissions will be accepted after the
above-mentioned deadline.

Best regards,
Sanni

-- 
*Thanks,*



*Sanni, Ph.D.Assistant professorDepartment of Physical Sciences
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/PDPIAS/people/>Faculty of Applied SciencesP D
Patel Institute of Applied Sciences,CHARUSAT
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/>, Changa. - 388 421, India*

*            sunkapatel@gmail.com <sunkapatel@gmail.com>*
*Phone: (M) +91 - 9978577009*

subject: Regarding_FY Practical Exam Schedule_Changes_FYCE-2
snippet: This email is only for FYCE-2 students: Dear FYCE-2 Students, This is to inform you that your practical exam is shifted for CEUC101:CCP subject on 24th December 2024 from 16th December 2024 due to the
content:
This email is only for FYCE-2 students:

Dear FYCE-2 Students,

This is to inform you that your practical exam is shifted for
*CEUC101:CCP* subject
on *24th December 2024* from 16th December 2024 due to the
unavailability of an external examiner on 16th  Dec. 2024. Here, on 24th
Dec. 2024_9:00 am to 11:30 am, those students have practical exam of
*CUUV102 physical
education & sports*, they have to attempt it first before proceeding to
practical exam of *CEUC101:CCP.*

You can submit your skill augmentation documents for FTUC101 Skill
Augmentation on *16th December 2024 *to your respective counselor instead of*
24th December. 2024*.

Please take note of above and plan accordingly.

Please contact me or Aayushi madam if you have any queries/changes.
---
With Regards,

*Dr. Sagar Chokshi,*
Associate Professor,
Department of Mechanical Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology
Faculty of Technology & Engineering,
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT),
ACCREDITED WITH ‚ÄúA+‚Äù GRADE BY NAAC
Education Campus Changa -388421
At. & Post Changa-388421, Ta: Petlad, Dist: Anand, (Gujarat) India.
Ph.No. +91-2697-265329; Mob. No. +91-9726622007.

subject: Announcement: SPOURAL'25 - A Celebration of Sports and Cultural!
snippet: Greetings from the University Level Central Student Council! We are thrilled to announce that *SPOURAL'25*, our much-anticipated annual sports and cultural extravaganza, will take place from *6th
content:
Greetings from the University Level Central Student Council!



We are thrilled to announce that *SPOURAL'25*, our much-anticipated annual
sports and cultural extravaganza, will take place from **6th January to
31st January 2025*.* Mark your calendars for a month of energy, enthusiasm,
and excellence!



Event Schedule:



**Sports Competitions: 6th January to 28th January,2025**



**Cultural Events: 29th January to 31st January,2025**



This year, we are excited to expand our sports categories with the
*addition of Handball and Ultimate Frisbee* for students and Chess and
Table Tennis for Faculty, bringing fresh opportunities for athletes to
shine. With these new additions, *SPOURAL'25 promises to be bigger and
better than ever!*



**Important Note:**



This is a general announcement for all Institutes/Departments. We encourage
you to start your team selection and gear up for the exciting competitions
ahead. Let‚Äôs showcase our collective talent, teamwork, and enthusiasm!



Stay tuned for further details regarding registrations, event line-ups, and
schedules. Together, let‚Äôs make SPOURAL'25 an unforgettable celebration of
sportsmanship and culture.





Warm regards,


*Convener,*


*University Level Central Students Council (ULSC).*

*CHARUSAT.*

--

subject: Reminder MSUD101 Quiz II(22/11/2024 at 11:15)
snippet: Dear Students Good Morning Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google Forms on 22/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25. The link will be shared on your institute mail ID. Make
content:
Dear Students
Good Morning
Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google
Forms on 22/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25.
The link will be shared on your institute mail ID.
*Make sure you have your institute email ID (________@charusat.edu.in
<https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=________%40charusat.edu.in&authuser=0>)
and Password of account otherwise, you will not be able to take the exam.*

*Syllabus of the exam : *
Unit 2
Infinite Series*(Only infinite series and complex number is not included)*
Tests of convergence of series viz., comparison test, ratio test, root
test, Leibnitz test

Unit 4 Partial differentiation
Partial derivative and geometrical interpretation, Euler‚Äôs theorem with
corollaries and their
applications, Chain rule, Implicit functions, Total differentials

Unit 5 Applications of Partial Differentiations*(Half of the Unit)*
Maclaurin‚Äôs and Taylor‚Äôs series expansion in two variables, Tangent plane
and normal line to a surface, Maxima and Minima of the function of two
variables
During the quiz, if you face any problem, then consult me in room no 309,
2nd floor, Ec Ee building CSPIT.
Re-quiz will not be taken in case you remain absent.


*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*

subject: INFO_STUDENT NOTICE
snippet: Dear Students of Charotar University of Science and Technology FINAL CALL FOR DECEMBER AND JANUARY BATCH Teachnook, in collaboration with Cognizance IIT Roorkee, is offering a 2-month Training +
content:
Dear Students of

*Charotar University of Science and TechnologyFINAL CALL FOR DECEMBER AND
JANUARY BATCH*

Teachnook, in collaboration with Cognizance *IIT Roorkee*, is offering a
2-month Training + Internship program. This opportunity is available for
every department with fixed slots. We invite you to complete the
application form to secure your spot.

Congratulations to all who have successfully enrolled in the Industrial
Training & Internship Program. We hope you found the* Induction Session*
 valuable.

*Application Deadline: 12:00 PM [19-11-2024]*

*  Application Form  *


*https://forms.gle/GZsgfg9ggp8wnMpk9 <https://forms.gle/GZsgfg9ggp8wnMpk9>*
*REFERRAL ID: DICE CSAT *(For CHARUSAT College Students only)



*PROGRAM DETAILS*
*- First Month: Training includes live lectures and mentorship from
industry professionals. Login credentials will be provided upon
registration.*

*- Second Month: Internship with live mentorship on projects from
professionals. Experience real-world problems through:*

  *- Project 1:* 10 individual projects to be completed with your mentor.
  *- Project 2:* Capstone Group Project with specific tasks assigned to
each intern.

*Benefits:*

- Program Completion Certificate from IIT Roorkee Cognizance.
- Internship Certificate from Top MNCs with Wipro Dice ID verification.
- 6-month LMS portal access.
- Growth Community pass with placement assistance.
- 24/7 personalized mentorship.
- Complimentary sessions on Gen AI & Prompt Engineering.
- Guidance on Low Code & No Code applications.
- Live & doubt-clearing sessions conducted by industrial experts.
- Guest lectures from Microsoft & Meta.

To enroll in this program, please complete the application form at your
earliest convenience.




*STUDENTS WHO ARE ALREADY ENROLLED, IGNORE THIS MAIL.*
Warm regards,
*Teachnook*
*Cognizance IIT Roorkee*

subject: Regarding Miniproject of CEUC101 CCP
snippet: Dear students, Greetings of the day! I hope everyone is ready with their mini projects. The submissions for the mini projects will begin from 25th November, 2024 in your respective lab hours. You will
content:
Dear students,
Greetings of the day! I hope everyone is ready with their mini projects.
The submissions for the mini projects will begin from 25th November, 2024
in your respective lab hours. You will need to represent the project to
your lab faculty in the form of a presentation.
*Presentation should include the following:*

   - The purpose of chosen project
   - Its applicability in real world
   - Code
   - Output
   - Your learnings from project
   - Conclusion

*--*
*Thanks & Regards,*
*Aayushi Chaudhari | PhD*
Assistant Professor,
U & P U Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,Changa,Anand-388421.
www.charusat.ac.in

--

subject: AICTE TRAINING & INTERNSHIP PROGRAM WITH CERTIFICATION & PLACEMENT ASSISTANCE
snippet: Dear Student, We are pleased to inform you that you have been shortlisted for the AICTE-approved Internship Program offered in collaboration with Cognizance, IIT Roorkee. This opportunity is for the
content:
Dear Student,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been *shortlisted* for the
AICTE-approved Internship Program offered in collaboration with
Cognizance, *IIT
Roorkee*. This opportunity is for the *December-January Batch*, and we
encourage you to secure your spot as soon as possible.

*Program Overview*
The program is a comprehensive *1-2 month Training + Internship* designed
to provide hands-on experience and professional mentorship. It is open to
all departments, though availability is limited.

*Program Structure*

   -

   *First Month:*
   Training includes live lectures and mentorship from industry
   professionals. Upon registration, you will receive login credentials to
   access the learning platform.

   - *Project 1:* Complete 10 individual projects under the supervision of
      your mentor.
   -

   *Second Month:*
   A fully mentored internship focusing on real-world projects with
   guidance from professionals:
   - *Project 2:* Engage in a Capstone Group Project with specific roles
      assigned to each intern.

*Program Benefits*

   - Certificate of Completion verified by DICE ID powered by WIPRO and *IIT
   Roorkee Cognizance*.
   - Internship Certificate from top MNCs with *Wipro Dice ID verification*.
   - 6-month access to the *Learning Management System (LMS)*.
   - Membership to the *Growth Community* with placement assistance.
   - 24/7 personalized mentorship.
   - Complimentary sessions on *Generative AI & Prompt Engineering*.
   - Guidance on *Low Code & No Code applications*.
   - Live doubt-clearing sessions with industry experts.
   - Guest lectures featuring professionals from *Microsoft & Meta*.

To secure your participation in this prestigious program, kindly complete
the *APPLICATION FORM** & JOIN THE OFFICIAL GROUP *at your earliest
convenience.

*APPLY NOW* - https://forms.gle/FWTo89EBiGNRa2vm7

*GROUP LINK - *https://chat.whatsapp.com/Cbb2RRTzVnZ9mgAGCsdE7k

We look forward to your participation in this exciting opportunity.

Warm regards,
*Teachnook*
In Collaboration with *IIT Roorkee Cognizance*

 Hi Patel,  
    
Thanks for joining us for 30 Days of Code! Each day, you‚Äôll get a new challenge and a corresponding tutorial to help you learn. The tutorials are Java-based, but you can submit solutions in a number of popular languages.  
    
To help you stay on track, we‚Äôll send you a quick reminder email each day. Let‚Äôs start by saying Hello, World.

30 Days of Code

|

 |

|
 
 
 Hi Patel,  
    
Ready to become a better coder? Practicing for a programming job interview?  
    
Join thousands of other HackerRank members who are learning to code or brushing up on fundamentals. Each day, you‚Äôll get a new code challenge and a corresponding video tutorial to help you learn.  
    
You‚Äôll be surprised at how much you can learn by coding for 30 days straight. Learn more details [here](http://email.postmaster.hackerrankmail.com/c/eJx0zUuO4yAQgOHT4F0sXoZkwWKkyNdANVCMUQJYPGLN7Vtu9SJSd-9KVZ_-8uamFPAJDdOC6UUorabNeKr9wm4BldKgNFMUFhfkFWHRC0WYouGUS8aYYlQypmbpRAiKYbh6-dctgki6l9YTtI513sA9sFbIjwTxObuSpqfZet8bEX8IXwlfj-N4YychfPUlQcyN8LWPXmqE5zkLevHwv11KuLjikYh1s5WIO55xwtVmX0TcBbWnsiXYU9mMB-Fq9GQdpB3iv_wDciX3mEcZ7csm9HGkt_i5bGVUh0Tc91pSsZ-nqRouHRJJ3QZ1NOgz-jHHPHXz-xf7XvgOMx7Ty_CPAAAA__-AJY5G). subject: Re: MSUD101 Continuous Evaluation Test and Assignment-2 Checking Schedule
snippet: DDear Students, Please find the attached question paper for the Continuous Evaluation Test of MSUD101. It has come to my attention that there was an error in the first multiple-choice question. The
content:
DDear Students,

Please find the attached question paper for the Continuous Evaluation Test
of MSUD101.

It has come to my attention that there was an error in the first
multiple-choice question. The correct answer is 15, and students who
attempted this question will be credited with 1 mark. This correction will
be discussed in our next class.

For those who were unable to appear in the test, they can appear in
test which is scheduled for *20th November 2024 at 2:30 PM*.

 This will be the final opportunity to take the test, and no further test
will be offered.

Best regards,



On Wed, Nov 13, 2024 at 4:18‚ÄØPM Dr. Krunal Kachhia <
krunalkachhia.maths@charusat.ac.in> wrote:

> Dear Students,
>
> This is to inform you that the Continuous Evaluation Test for MSUD101, for
> those attending the upcoming tech fest, will be held on Wednesday, 20th
> November 2024, from 2:30 PM to 3:10 PM.
>
> Best regards,
>
> On Mon, Nov 11, 2024 at 2:41‚ÄØPM Dr. Krunal Kachhia <
> krunalkachhia.maths@charusat.ac.in> wrote:
>
>> Dear Students,
>>
>> Please find below the syllabus for the upcoming class test, scheduled for *16th
>> November 2024 (Saturday) at 10:00 AM*:
>>
>> *Unit 2*
>>
>>    - Tests of convergence of series: comparison test, ratio test, root
>>    test, Leibnitz test
>>    - Complex numbers and their geometric representation
>>    - Complex numbers in polar and exponential forms
>>    - De Moivre's theorem and its applications
>>    - Exponential, logarithmic, trigonometric, and hyperbolic functions
>>
>> *Unit 4*
>>
>>    - Euler‚Äôs theorem with corollaries and applications
>>    - Chain rule
>>    - Implicit functions
>>    - Total differentials
>>
>> *Unit 5*
>>
>>    - Maclaurin‚Äôs and Taylor‚Äôs series expansion in two variables
>>    - Maxima and minima of functions of two variables
>>    - Lagrange‚Äôs method of undetermined multipliers
>>    - Jacobian
>>
>> For students attending the tech fest at PDEU, a separate test will be
>> scheduled for next week, with a date to be announced soon.
>>
>> With regards,
>>
>> On Sat, Oct 19, 2024 at 5:49‚ÄØPM Dr. Krunal Kachhia <
>> krunalkachhia.maths@charusat.ac.in> wrote:
>>
>>> *Dear Students,*
>>>
>>> This is to inform you that the Continuous Evaluation Test for MSUD101
>>> (Engineering Mathematics-I) will be held on *16th November 2024
>>> (Saturday) from 10:00 AM to 10:40 AM*.
>>>
>>> Please note that no additional test will be conducted, and your
>>> attendance is *mandatory*. All students must be present for the test
>>> without fail.
>>>
>>> Additionally, the checking of Assignment-2 will follow the schedule
>>> below:
>>>
>>>    - *13th November 2024* (CE-I) (Wednesday): 2:20 PM onwards in
>>>    Classroom No. 310
>>>    - *15th November 2024* (CE-II) (Friday): 3:20 PM onwards in
>>>    Classroom No. 310
>>>
>>> Thank you for your cooperation.
>>> *Best regards,*
>>>
>>>  --
>>>
>>>
>>> ************************************************************************************
>>> * Dr. Krunal B. Kachhia*
>>> *  Head, Department of Mathematical Sciences,*
>>>

subject: Re: Regarding First Semester Midterm Examination, Nov. 2024
snippet: Dear First Year Students (Late admitted students & absent students in the first midterm exam), Please find the Seating Arrangement (Day Wise) for the Midterm Examination, Nov. 2024 in the
content:
Dear First Year Students (Late admitted students & absent students in the
first midterm exam),

Please find the *Seating Arrangement (Day Wise) for the Midterm
Examination, Nov. 2024* in the attachment.
*Attachments:*
*1. Seating Arrangement for Day-1: 18/11/2024 & 11:10 am to 12:10 pm*
*2. Seating Arrangement for Day-2: 19/11/2024 & 11:10 am to 12:10 pm*
*3. Seating Arrangement for Day-3: 20/11/2024 & 11:10 am to 12:10 pm*

The teaching will be continued during these three days (18/11/2024 to
20/11/2024). Please take note of it.

Feel free to reach out to me if you have any questions. (Room No. 425, A7
Building & +91-9726622007)
---
Regards,

*Dr. Sagar Chokshi,*
Associate Professor,
Department of Mechanical Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology
Faculty of Technology & Engineering,
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT),

Ph.No. +91-2697-265329; Mob. No. +91-9726622007.

subject: Re: MSUD101 Continuous Evaluation Test and Assignment-2 Checking Schedule
snippet: Dear Students, This is to inform you that the Continuous Evaluation Test for MSUD101, for those attending the upcoming tech fest, will be held on Wednesday, 20th November 2024, from 2:30 PM to 3:10 PM.
content:
Dear Students,

This is to inform you that the Continuous Evaluation Test for MSUD101, for
those attending the upcoming tech fest, will be held on Wednesday, 20th
November 2024, from 2:30 PM to 3:10 PM.

Best regards,

On Mon, Nov 11, 2024 at 2:41‚ÄØPM Dr. Krunal Kachhia <
krunalkachhia.maths@charusat.ac.in> wrote:

> Dear Students,
>
> Please find below the syllabus for the upcoming class test, scheduled for *16th
> November 2024 (Saturday) at 10:00 AM*:
>
> *Unit 2*
>
>    - Tests of convergence of series: comparison test, ratio test, root
>    test, Leibnitz test
>    - Complex numbers and their geometric representation
>    - Complex numbers in polar and exponential forms
>    - De Moivre's theorem and its applications
>    - Exponential, logarithmic, trigonometric, and hyperbolic functions
>
> *Unit 4*
>
>    - Euler‚Äôs theorem with corollaries and applications
>    - Chain rule
>    - Implicit functions
>    - Total differentials
>
> *Unit 5*
>
>    - Maclaurin‚Äôs and Taylor‚Äôs series expansion in two variables
>    - Maxima and minima of functions of two variables
>    - Lagrange‚Äôs method of undetermined multipliers
>    - Jacobian
>
> For students attending the tech fest at PDEU, a separate test will be
> scheduled for next week, with a date to be announced soon.
>
> With regards,
>
> On Sat, Oct 19, 2024 at 5:49‚ÄØPM Dr. Krunal Kachhia <
> krunalkachhia.maths@charusat.ac.in> wrote:
>
>> *Dear Students,*
>>
>> This is to inform you that the Continuous Evaluation Test for MSUD101
>> (Engineering Mathematics-I) will be held on *16th November 2024
>> (Saturday) from 10:00 AM to 10:40 AM*.
>>
>> Please note that no additional test will be conducted, and your
>> attendance is *mandatory*. All students must be present for the test
>> without fail.
>>
>> Additionally, the checking of Assignment-2 will follow the schedule below:
>>
>>    - *13th November 2024* (CE-I) (Wednesday): 2:20 PM onwards in
>>    Classroom No. 310
>>    - *15th November 2024* (CE-II) (Friday): 3:20 PM onwards in Classroom
>>    No. 310
>>
>> Thank you for your cooperation.
>> *Best regards,*
>>
>>  --
>>

subject: Two examples cancelled in the list of classwork of Comple number
snippet: Dear Students Good Moning Please note that the examples 12 and 13 mentioned in De Moivre's theorem and their applications of complete numbers have been cancelled. The reason behind this is that the
content:
Dear Students
Good Moning
Please note that the examples 12 and 13 mentioned in De Moivre's theorem
and their applications of complete numbers have been cancelled. The reason
behind this is that the examples are of hit-and-run
[image: Comple number.png]
 type. I have attached these two examples to this email.

subject: Re: Regarding Internal Practical Exam
snippet: Dear students, Due to the declared holiday on 15th Nov, 2024, practical exam for CE1 will be conducted on 22nd Nov, 2024 (Friday), during lab hours. It shall remain as it is on 14th Nov, 2024 for CE2.
content:
Dear students,
*Due to the declared holiday on 15th Nov, 2024, practical exam for CE1 will
be conducted on 22nd Nov, 2024 (Friday), during lab hours.*

*It shall remain as it is on 14th Nov, 2024 for CE2.*
*--*
*Thanks & Regards,*
*Aayushi Chaudhari | PhD*
Assistant Professor,
U & P U Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,Changa,Anand-388421.
www.charusat.ac.in


On Thu, Oct 24, 2024 at 3:57‚ÄØPM Aayushi Chaudhari <
aayushichaudhari.ce@charusat.ac.in> wrote:

> Dear students,
> Kindly take a note that you will be having your internal practical exam as
> per the following schedule:
> *CE1: 15th Nov, 2024 (Friday - during lab hours)*
> *CE2: 14th Nov, 2024 (Thursday - **during lab hours**)*
> *Exam will be conducted on Hackerrank, so please keep your IDs ready for
> the same, with charusat ID as username. Keep practicing...*
>
> *Have a happy and safe Diwali!!!!*
>
> *Note: Students who have not attended expert talk without any prior
> permission are not eligible for this exam.*
> *--*
> *Thanks & Regards,*
> *Aayushi Chaudhari | PhD*
> Assistant Professor,
> U & P U Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
> Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
> CHARUSAT,Changa,Anand-388421.
> www.charusat.ac.in
>

--

subject: Re: MSUD101 Continuous Evaluation Test and Assignment-2 Checking Schedule
snippet: Dear Students, Please find below the syllabus for the upcoming class test, scheduled for 16th November 2024 (Saturday) at 10:00 AM: Unit 2 Tests of convergence of series: comparison test, ratio test,
content:
Dear Students,

Please find below the syllabus for the upcoming class test, scheduled for *16th
November 2024 (Saturday) at 10:00 AM*:

*Unit 2*

   - Tests of convergence of series: comparison test, ratio test, root
   test, Leibnitz test
   - Complex numbers and their geometric representation
   - Complex numbers in polar and exponential forms
   - De Moivre's theorem and its applications
   - Exponential, logarithmic, trigonometric, and hyperbolic functions

*Unit 4*

   - Euler‚Äôs theorem with corollaries and applications
   - Chain rule
   - Implicit functions
   - Total differentials

*Unit 5*

   - Maclaurin‚Äôs and Taylor‚Äôs series expansion in two variables
   - Maxima and minima of functions of two variables
   - Lagrange‚Äôs method of undetermined multipliers
   - Jacobian

For students attending the tech fest at PDEU, a separate test will be
scheduled for next week, with a date to be announced soon.

With regards,

On Sat, Oct 19, 2024 at 5:49‚ÄØPM Dr. Krunal Kachhia <
krunalkachhia.maths@charusat.ac.in> wrote:

> *Dear Students,*
>
> This is to inform you that the Continuous Evaluation Test for MSUD101
> (Engineering Mathematics-I) will be held on *16th November 2024
> (Saturday) from 10:00 AM to 10:40 AM*.
>
> Please note that no additional test will be conducted, and your attendance
> is *mandatory*. All students must be present for the test without fail.
>
> Additionally, the checking of Assignment-2 will follow the schedule below:
>
>    - *13th November 2024* (CE-I) (Wednesday): 2:20 PM onwards in
>    Classroom No. 310
>    - *15th November 2024* (CE-II) (Friday): 3:20 PM onwards in Classroom
>    No. 310
>
> Thank you for your cooperation.
> *Best regards,*
>
>  --
>
>

subject: Fwd: Participation of Students, Teachers, and Administrators in the ‚ÄòAsk Our Expert‚Äô Programme on NAD-ABC on November 8, 2024 -Regarding
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply6@aicte-india.org> Date: Thu, 7 Nov, 2024, 11:00 pm Subject: Participation of Students, Teachers, and Administrators in the
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply6@aicte-india.org>
Date: Thu, 7 Nov, 2024, 11:00‚ÄØpm
Subject: Participation of Students, Teachers, and Administrators in the
‚ÄòAsk Our Expert‚Äô Programme on NAD-ABC on November 8, 2024 -Regarding


Dear Madam/Sir,
Greetings from All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) ..!

We are pleased to inform you that the Ministry of Electronics and
Information Technology (MeitY) is organizing a *online live talk show *on
the *Academic Bank of Credits(ABC)*, a project of the Ministry of Education
(MoE) aimed at providing a seamless, student-centric learning experience
while enhancing the ease of credit accumulation and transfer for students
across institutions.

As part of the outreach efforts under the Digital India Initiative, MeitY
is hosting the 3rd episode of the ‚ÄúAsk Our Expert Programme‚Äù focused on
ABC-NAD. This programme will be held *on November 8, 2024, starting at 1 PM
onwards*. *The live talk show will be conducted by experts from the
government, featuring focused discussions aimed at equipping faculty,
students, and administrators from various Academic Institutions (AIs) with
essential knowledge about the benefits, implementation process, and
opportunities associated with the ABC*.Given the role that these
stakeholders play in the success of the Academic Bank of Credits, we
earnestly urge you to encourage and facilitate their participation in this
session.

The details for joining the webinar are mentioned below:-

¬∑         *Date*: 8th November 2024
¬∑       *  Time*: 1 PM onwards
¬∑         *Platform*: YouTube Official Digital India Channel
¬∑         *Link*: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dqIoGwIXjoM

This session will not only deepen the understanding of participants about
ABC but also align them with the Digital India vision for a more connected
and efficient educational ecosystem. The insights shared during this will
empower faculty to effectively leverage ABC, support students in their
academic journeys and help administrators optimize institutional credit
management practices.

We trust that this collaboration will greatly benefit our educational
community, ultimately contributing to a more integrated and accessible
learning environment for all.

For any further assistance, Mr. Gaurav Khare may kindly be contacted at
gaurav.khare1@digitalindia.gov.in.

Thank you for your support in encouraging faculty and students to engage in
the future of e-governance and collaborative technology platforms.

In view of the foregoing,  AICTE requests your institution to share this
information with all the faculty, students, staff, and others, so that they
can benefit from it.

--

subject: Syllabus of MSUD101 for MIDTERM Exam
snippet: Dear Students Pls note that the institute will conduct an exam of MSUD101 on 18/11/2024 for the late admitted students and for those students who remain absent in the Midterm exam conducted in the
content:
Dear Students
Pls note that the institute will conduct an exam of MSUD101 on 18/11/2024
for the late admitted students and for those students who remain absent in
the Midterm exam conducted in the month of September. The paper style and
Syllabus of the exam is as follows:
Paper Style
05 MCQ +15 Marks Discreptive questions
Syllabus:
Unit 1 : Higher order derivative
Unit 2 : Infinite series *( Infinite series * *only* *and Complex number is
not included in the exam)*
Unit 3 : Matrix
Unit 4: Partial differentiation
BEST OF LUCK ....

If you have any queries, then consult me in the staff room 309, 2nd floor,
Ec Ee building.

*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*

--

subject: Fwd: Invitation to participate in All India Women ONLY Start-a-thon (AIWOS) - a national-level start up competition exclusively for women- reg.
snippet: Dear Girls Students, Greetings for the Day!! Nice opportunity to shine for a start-up. More details are in the trailing mail. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AICTE <no-reply@sampark.gov
content:
Dear Girls Students,

Greetings for the Day!!

Nice opportunity to shine for a start-up. More details are in the trailing
mail.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE <no-reply@sampark.gov.in>
Date: Thu, 31 Oct, 2024, 11:19‚ÄØam
Subject: Invitation to participate in All India Women ONLY Start-a-thon
(AIWOS) - a national-level start up competition exclusively for women- reg.



Having trouble reading this email? View it in your mobile/ web browser
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/campaigns/2024/30-Oct/AICTE/index.html>
------------------------------

Respected Madam/Sir,

*Greetings from AICTE!*

AICTE in collaboration with Shooting Stars Foundation has launched the *All
India Women ONLY Start-a-thon (AIWOS) - a national-level start up
competition exclusively for women!* This is a great opportunity for
entrepreneurially ambitious women to turn their ideas into impactful
ventures. You are encouraged to circulate the details amongst women
students of the below program and urge them to participate in maximum
numbers.

*Key Details:*

   - Registrations: Now Open
   - Eligibility: Women across India (can participate individually or as
   part of a team)
   - Mode: Fully Online
   - There is no registration fee and students will not be required to pay
   any fee at any stage of the program
   - Registration link:
   https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1Ao5Ubh0xGUJFqcvscdjpLdU01nKEUAA7pCUuBKxIH4U
   <https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=769680ef3c574a5d93da237d42fc6e175d7e3844&lat=2024&mid=b5c2567dc4949bd5ba70e03b8ec45a7aa59cbd6e>
   - For Questions: aiwos@sstarsfoundation.org
   <https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=4359d6e7d64444273436de745bffd060e834cc53&lat=2024&mid=b5c2567dc4949bd5ba70e03b8ec45a7aa59cbd6e>

*About AIWOS:*

AIWOS is a national level start-up competition exclusively for Women to
spark entrepreneurship interest in women students. We are bringing together
experts and organizations for a 1st of its kind *Women Exclusive Startup
Program* to maximize their learning and career outcomes.

*Women students registering/participating for AIWOS ? *

   - Tailored training programs to enhance employability (Registered
   Students will get details of upcoming webinars)


   - Mentorship from industry leaders and successful entrepreneurs
   - Chance for start-ups to be considered by top angel investors and
   incubators for funding and incubation support
   - Internship/Placement opportunities at top corporates

Kindly motivate women students to take advantage of this opportunity to
accelerate their careers and step towards their entrepreneurial journey!

 PFA:-
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sWNE6HblCwe1vf3T3QZvXVtFtOmzBdnQ/view?usp=sharing
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=2989eedcbd6de7b1c233fab1ecb73708951fc41c&lat=2024&mid=b5c2567dc4949bd5ba70e03b8ec45a7aa59cbd6e>



*With Warm Regards,**Amit Dutta**,*
*(PhD.)*
*Director,*
*Policy & Academic Planning Bureau*
*All India Council for Technical Education,*
*Nelson Mandela Marg, Vasant Kunj,
<https://www.google.com/maps/search/Nelson+Mandela+Marg,+Vasant+Kunj,+New+Delhi-+110070?entry=gmail&source=g>*
*New Delhi- 110070
<https://www.google.com/maps/search/Nelson+Mandela+Marg,+Vasant+Kunj,+New+Delhi-+110070?entry=gmail&source=g>
*
*Phone no. 011-29581117**Email id - *directorpnap@aicte-india.org
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=778b61d2a69a9b992e90629cb3460fb650818909&lat=2024&mid=b5c2567dc4949bd5ba70e03b8ec45a7aa59cbd6e>
Share it on Social Media [image: social icon]
<https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fjan-sampark.nic.in%2Fcampaigns%2F2024%2F30-Oct%2FAICTE%2Findex.html>

*Nirav Bhatt*

subject: Quiz - II of MSUD101 on 22/11/2024(Rewised date)
snippet: Dear Students Good Morning Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google Forms on 21/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25. Earlier it was scheduled for 18/11/202. It has been
content:
Dear Students
Good Morning
Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google
Forms on 21/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25. *Earlier it was scheduled for
18/11/202. I**t has been rescheduled for 22/11/2024** due to the Midterm
Exam for late-admitted students.*
The link will be shared on your institute mail ID.
*Make sure you have your institute email ID (________@charusat.edu.in
<https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=________%40charusat.edu.in&authuser=0>)
and Password of account otherwise, you will not be able to take the exam.*

*Syllabus of the exam : *
Unit 2
Infinite Series*(Only infinite series and complex number is not included)*
Tests of convergence of series viz., comparison test, ratio test, root
test, Leibnitz test

Unit 4 Partial differentiation
Partial derivative and geometrical interpretation, Euler‚Äôs theorem with
corollaries and their
applications, Chain rule, Implicit functions, Total differentials

Unit 5 Applications of Partial Differentiations*(Half of the Unit)*
Maclaurin‚Äôs and Taylor‚Äôs series expansion in two variables, Tangent plane
and normal line to a surface, Maxima and Minima of the function of two
variables
*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*

subject: [IMPORTANT]IIT CERTIFICATIONS & AICTE Approved Industrial Internships For First Year CHARUSAT Students
snippet: DEAR STUDENTS OF CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY ANAND, GUJRAT Warm Greetings! We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with IIT Roorkee's Cognizance: a 2-
content:
*DEAR STUDENTSOFCHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGYANAND, GUJRAT*

*Warm Greetings!*

We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with *IIT
Roorkee's Cognizance*: a *2-Month Training and Internship Program* featuring
certifications from prestigious companies including *Cisco, Meta
(Facebook), IBM*, and other leading multinational organizations across
various fields.

*Who Can Apply?*
We invite applications from shortlisted students in all departments. If any
of your classmates haven't received this information, please feel free to
forward this email to them.

*It is Important for Interested Students to submit their application, if
you get shortlisted you will be getting a response from our HR Team:*

Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>


* Program Overview:*

*First Month: Training*

   - Participate in live lectures and receive guidance from industry
   professionals.
   - You will receive login details after registering.

*Second Month: Internship*

   - Engage in real-world projects with professional mentorship.
   - *Project Details:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete 10 unique projects with your
      mentor.
      - *Group Capstone Project:* Collaborate in teams on a capstone
      project, with specific roles assigned to each intern. All necessary
      resources will be provided by the company.

*Class Formats:*

   1. *Blended Learning:*
      - Access recorded sessions and join live doubt-clearing sessions
      every weekend.
   2. *Live Mentor-led Classes:*
      - Attend live Zoom sessions 2-3 times per week at 6:30 PM, with
      recorded sessions available for later review. You will also have
access to
      our Learning Management System (LMS) for six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon completion, students will receive:

   - A *Certificate of Completion* from Cognizance IIT Roorkee.
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and entry to a growing professional
   network.
   - Training on *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - Curriculum focused on *Generative AI and Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with industry leaders.
   - Personalized mentorship for tailored guidance.



*Don‚Äôt miss out on this valuable opportunity!*
*Interested students should submit their applications to be part of this
transformative experience.*


Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>



*Best regards,*

*AKASH KAPOOR*
*Senior Academic **Counselor*
*HR MANAGER'S TNK*

snippet: Dear Students, Felicitations! You have been Designated for the Internship Program! We're happy to encourage you to apply for Teachnook's WIPRO-Verified 2-Month Training + Internship Program,
content:
Dear Students,

*Felicitations! You have been Designated for the Internship Program!*

We're happy to encourage you to apply for *Teachnook's WIPRO-Verified* 2-Month
Training + Internship Program, which is being organised in cooperation with
IIT Roorkee (Cognizance). This curriculum will prepare you to master
cutting-edge technology while also providing you with real-world experience.

*Utilize At this spot:* *https://forms.gle/dd9UA7bGq4orjCut6
<https://forms.gle/dd9UA7bGq4orjCut6>*

*Hear from our previous interns who have benefited from this program:*

üîí  I am thrilled to share that I have successfully completed my internship
at Teachnook and have earned my certification in Cloud Computing! This
experience has been incredibly rewarding and has significantly enhanced my
knowledge and skills in the field of cloud computing.   üñ•Ô∏è     (
https://www.linkedin.com/in/kalyani-bandaru-a0238926a/recent-activity/all/),
Kalyani Bandaru. KLE

"I'm thrilled to announce the successful completion of my internship at
TEACHNOOK (TEACHSCAPE ONLINE LEARNING SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED) as an
Artificial Intelligence trainee. Over the past 3 months, I had the
privilege of working with an incredibly talented and innovative team" üöÄ   (
https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7121581076975665152/),
Harshitha Sai .SRM

"Excited to share that I've started my new internship role in Artificial
Intelligence with Teachnook, in collaboration with Cognizance IIT Roorkee"
(https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7229045651194441728/),
Rajvel R. KLE

"I‚Äôm happy to share that I‚Äôm starting a new position as Campus Ambassador at
 TEACHNOOK <https://www.linkedin.com/company/teachnook/>"
(*https://www.linkedin.com/in/gokul-kumar-v-236a24217/recent-activity/all/
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/gokul-kumar-v-236a24217/recent-activity/all/>*),
Gokul Kumar KLE

*You'll receive top-notch training:-*

*Expert Mentors:* Learn from industry leaders who are available to assist
you.
*Hands-on Learning:* Develop important abilities ranging from Low Code/No
Code to AI Prompt Engineering.
Work on meaningful projects to obtain practical experience.

*Exciting internship:*
*10+ Live Projects:* Use your recently developed abilities to tackle
real-world problems.
*Capstone Project:* Collaborate with companies to demonstrate your
competence.
*Career Boost:* Receive expert resume-building advice, practice interviews,
and masterclasses from renowned global leaders.

*Certification:*
*Official Certificates:* Obtain outstanding credentials from IIT Roorkee
and our partner companies.
*Verified credentials:* Stand out with a WIPRO Dice ID.
*Placement Assistance*: Join our Growth Community for immediate job
placement assistance.

*Don't pass up this Prospect to boost your career! Apply at the moment and
take the first step towards a bright future.*




*I look forward to your application!Best Regards,IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance)*

subject: Regarding Internal Practical Exam
snippet: Dear students, Kindly take a note that you will be having your internal practical exam as per the following schedule: CE1: 15th Nov, 2024 (Friday - during lab hours) CE2: 14th Nov, 2024 (Thursday -
content:
Dear students,
Kindly take a note that you will be having your internal practical exam as
per the following schedule:
*CE1: 15th Nov, 2024 (Friday - during lab hours)*
*CE2: 14th Nov, 2024 (Thursday - **during lab hours**)*
*Exam will be conducted on Hackerrank, so please keep your IDs ready for
the same, with charusat ID as username. Keep practicing...*

*Have a happy and safe Diwali!!!!*

*Note: Students who have not attended expert talk without any prior
permission are not eligible for this exam.*
*--*
*Thanks & Regards,*
*Aayushi Chaudhari | PhD*
Assistant Professor,
U & P U Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,Changa,Anand-388421.
www.charusat.ac.in

--

subject: Regarding First Semester Midterm Examination, Nov. 2024
snippet: Dear First Year Students (Late admitted students & absent students in the first midterm exam), Please find the First Semester Midterm Examination Schedule, Nov. 2024 in the attachment. This exam
content:
Dear First Year Students (Late admitted students & absent students in the
first midterm exam),

Please find the *First Semester Midterm Examination Schedule, Nov. 2024*
in the attachment. This exam will be conducted for *late admitted students
and absent students* (in the first midterm exam), as per the attached
student list using *traditional paper examination* (using supplementary: on
paper, No Tablet). Kindly find the attachment.

Feel free to reach out to me if you have any questions. (Room No. 425, A7
Building & +91-9726622007)

I will share the seating arrangements after the Diwali Break.

Thank you.
---
Best Regards,

*Dr. Sagar Chokshi,*

Department of Mechanical Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology

subject: West Zone Inter University Youth Festival 2024-25
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to invite you to participate in the selection process for the CHARUSAT team at the upcoming All India/West Zone Inter University Youth Festival 2024-25. This festival is a
content:
Dear Students,

We are excited to invite you to participate in the selection process for
the CHARUSAT team at the upcoming All India/West Zone Inter University
Youth Festival 2024-25.
This festival is a prestigious platform where you can showcase your talents
and represent our university on a national level.
Benefits of Participation:
- Recognition and Exposure: Gain visibility and recognition for your
talents.
- Skill Development: Enhance your leadership, teamwork, and creative skills.
- National-Level Opportunities: The chance to represent CHARUSAT at
national youth festivals.
- Networking: Build connections with peers across universities.

Important Details:
Registration Form: https://forms.gle/C1VFdPTgfucvzUHKA

Deadline for Registration: 1st November, 2024

Guidelines, Rules, and Regulations: Please review the attached documents
carefully for event details and required documents.
We encourage all students to take advantage of this opportunity to grow and
make CHARUSAT proud. For any queries, feel free to contact us.

--

snippet: HELLO STUDENTS.... CHARUSAT üéØAre you ready to transform your career? We extend a warm invitation for you to participate in the COGNIZANCE (IIT ROORKEE) Industrial Learning and Certification Program. We
content:
HELLO STUDENTS.... CHARUSAT
üéØAre you ready to transform your career? We extend a warm invitation for
you to participate in the COGNIZANCE (IIT ROORKEE) Industrial Learning and
Certification Program.
                         *We kindly request you to fill out the application
form to provide us with more information about you:*

Submit Your Application

GOOGLE link:
https://forms.gle/5QsUKieWT6hfopYE7

Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information:
https://chat.whatsapp.com/BWQFpMKPbgLDeQ8cwmm1WU


*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*

*üìöFirst month:* IIT training has been designed in the form of Live
lectures along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)

*üßë‚ÄçüíªSecond month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.



*Project 1- *10 individual projects are assigned to each intern, which they
must complete with their mentor.

*Project 2-* Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to 15 interns.
For each intern particular work will be assigned to them, and they have to
work on it.

(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

üî•Don't miss out‚Äîthis opportunity is too good to keep to yourself. Share it
with your peers and let‚Äôs grow together!

Learn More About The Program <https://teachnook.com/mentor>



*Program Highlights:*

   - India's First - offering programs with low-code and no code tools,
   with a promise of 100% outcome-driven results
   - Linked In Top Startup 2023
   - Certifications from Cognizance - IIT Roorkee verified through Wipro
   Dice ID
   - Learn from tech - giant mentors and industry leaders
   - Cutting-edge curriculum including generative AI and prompt engineering
   - Exclusive masterclasses with students, founders, and CXos from top
   global companies
   - Personalized instructors for comprehensive guidance from start to
   finish

*üåüStudent Success Stories*

"Introduced myself to data science and deep dived in to core of it while
doing projects. Had a good learning experience."

- Atul Kumar (" LinkedIn Profile
<https://www.linkedin.com/posts/atul-kumar-325086260_python-ai-ml-activity-7206308025538621440-oT5h?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>
")

"Successfully completed "MICROBIOLOGY" course on Teachnook,Strengthened
expertise in core concepts of microbiology."
- Ashrita (" LinkedIn Profile
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/ashrita-panuganty-417315229?lipi=urn%3Ali%3Apage%3Ad_flagship3_profile_view_base_contact_details%3BaxzuAcKNQ7WrWrpUMJRfdw%3D%3D>
")

"Excited to have completed my online internship! It was an incredible
learning journey that enhanced my skills and broadened my perspective on
Artificial intelligence."
- YuvaSri (" LinkedIn Profile
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/yuvasri-n-7a85aa234?lipi=urn%3Ali%3Apage%3Ad_flagship3_profile_view_base_contact_details%3Bf1Xs3GLPSZOmQn%2B%2BVb%2BU6g%3D%3D>
")

"Excited to share my latest achievement: completing an internship in the
dynamic world of stock markets! üìàüéì"

- Nandana (" LinkedIn Profile
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/nandana-beneesh?lipi=urn%3Ali%3Apage%3Ad_flagship3_profile_view_base_contact_details%3BYtMYGrezQbK4iehub437og%3D%3D>

subject: CHARUSAT - FMS - IIIM - Invitation @ Prabandhan 2024 (Exhibition cum Sale) - Inaugural Ceremony
snippet: Dear All, Greetings! We are thrilled to inform you that Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management (IIIM) is organising PRABANDHAN ‚Äì 2024 from October 25 to 28, 2024 (10:00 AM to 09:00 PM). Prabandhan
content:
Dear All,



Greetings!



We are thrilled to inform you that Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of
Management (IIIM) is organising *PRABANDHAN ‚Äì 2024 *from October 25 to 28,
2024 (10:00 AM to 09:00 PM).


Prabandhan is a student-driven event in which students work in close
collaboration with industries, entrepreneurs, gruh-udhyog, and SMEs to
understand the product, devise marketing strategies, learn financial
management and negotiation skills, and ultimately sell the product.


You are invited to visit the exhibition with your family, friends, and
relatives to motivate the student participants.




The inaugural ceremony details are as follows:



*Chief Guest: Anitaben Patel & Aartiben Patel (IPCO Parivar)*

*Place: Sardar Patel Banquet Hall, Anand (Opp. D Z Patel High School, 80
Feet Road, Anand)*

*Date: October 25, 2024 (Friday)*

*Timing: 10:00 AM*



*Please find the attached invitation and product poster herewith this mail.*


*Hoping to see you all at Prabandhan 2024 during all the four days of the
event (October 25-28, 2024).*



*Regards,*



*TEAM PRABANDHAN - IIIM*

--

subject: Certified Ethical Hacker v13 (CEHv13) - World‚Äôs No. 1 Ethical Hacking Certification, now with the power of AI (Oct 2024) - For CHARUSAT Students Only
snippet: Dear students, We are glad to inform you that "Charotar University of Science and Technology - CHARUSAT" is the official EC-Council Academia Partner since January 2020. We are immensely
content:
Dear students,

We are glad to inform you that *"Charotar University of Science and
Technology - CHARUSAT"* is the official *EC-Council Academia Partner *since
January 2020. We are immensely pleased to welcome ‚ÄúCHARUSAT‚Äù *students* to
EC Council's newly launched *CEHv13* program. Certified Ethical
Hacker CEHv13
<https://www.eccouncil.org/programs/certified-ethical-hacker-ceh/> will
teach you the latest commercial-grade hacking tools, techniques, and
methodologies hackers and information security professionals use to hack an
organization lawfully. *100+ students have benefited from CEH at CHARUSAT
with a subsidized academia kit price.*

*What‚Äôs new in CEHv13?*: *From the creators of Certified Ethical Hacker
(CEH) comes the latest and evolved version 13 with added AI capabilities.
Structured across 20 learning modules covering over 550 attack techniques,
CEH provides cybersecurity professionals with the core knowledge they need
to detect and defend against emerging threats.*

*You will get:*

   - EC-Council Official Course Book for CEHv13 for self-study (24 Months) -
   Accessible Online/Offline. To Download App
   <https://support.vitalsource.com/hc/en-us/articles/201344733-Bookshelf-Download-Options>

   - Access To iLabs for 6 Months. Check the ilabs Demo Here:
   *https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI* <https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI>.
   - An Exam Voucher (1 Year) - *Get a globally recognized certificate
for* passing
   the exam. Accreditations
   <https://linkprotect.cudasvc.com/url?a=https%3a%2f%2fwww.eccouncil.org%2faccreditations%2f&c=E,1,hLej6Kb3ZRL_QKhhm71kedMm89bbj8UclU3d50zuCt2frG_t19Fir_60SvUk16RJBGYXwVBLF11HLMhr7nDv8WGkPElWNiTm9zdZ_xfo&typo=1>
   - Over 200 hands-on labs with Over 3,500 hacking tools. Learn how to
   hack multiple operating systems (Windows 11, Windows servers, Linux,
   Ubuntu, Android)
   - The venue of the Exam will be our University Premises.

*Popular Cybersecurity Tools in the Course:*


* - Network scanning and mapping tools (e.g., Nmap, hping3)- Vulnerability
assessment tools (e.g., OpenVAS, Nessus)- Penetration testing tools (e.g.,
Metasploit, Aircrack-ng)- Packet sniffers and network analyzers (e.g.,
Wireshark, Omnipeek Network Analyzer)- Social engineering tools (e.g.,
Social-Engineer Toolkit (SET), SpeedPhish Framework (SPF))- Password
cracking tools (e.g., John the Ripper, L0phtCrack)- Forensics tools (e.g.
FTK, EnCase, Autopsy)- Wireless hacking tools (e.g., Aircrack-ng,
Wifiphisher)- Encryption tools (e.g., CryptoForge, VeraCrypt)*
*Master AI to automate ethical hacking tasks and hack and defend against AI
systems.*

*‚Ä¢ ShellGPT* ‚Äì Automates various reconnaissance and penetration testing
tasks using AI-driven scripting.
*‚Ä¢ ChatGPT *‚Äì Helps generate code, automate tasks, and create scripts for
ethical hacking.
‚Ä¢ *FraudGPT* ‚Äì Simulates AI-assisted malicious activities to learn defense
strategies.
‚Ä¢ *WormGPT* ‚Äì An offensive AI tool used to simulate exploitations and
malware creation.
‚Ä¢ *DeepExploit* ‚Äì AI-powered vulnerability scanning and exploitation tool.
‚Ä¢ *Nebula* ‚Äì Automates network discovery and vulnerability identification
with AI.
‚Ä¢ *Veed.io* ‚Äì Can visualize security analytics and post-exploitation
results for better reporting.


*Typical Job Roles for C|EH :*

   - Mid-Level Information Security Auditor
   - Cybersecurity Auditor
   - Security Administrator
   - IT Security Administrator
   - Cyber Defense Analyst
   - Senior Security Consultant
   - Information Security Manager
   - Senior SOC Analyst
   - Solution Architect
   - Cybersecurity Consultant



   - Vulnerability Assessment Analyst
   - Warning Analyst
   - Information Security Analyst 1
   - Security Analyst L1
   - Infosec Security Administrator
   - Cybersecurity Analyst L1, L2, & L3
   - Network Security Engineer
   - SOC Security Analyst
   - Security Analyst
   - Network Engineer

*Webinar on "A Career in Cybersecurity" by EC-Council with Collaboration of
CHARUSAT | Campus Official: *https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X-QgxO3JhlA


*Testimonials:*

   - How Certified Ethical Hacker Helped Me Land a Job with Big4 | Sidhant
   Gupta <https://youtu.be/PLvVyh96n8M?si=IVLEptb5F-QPMUaw>
   - Catch Your Big Break in Cybersecurity with C|EH | Ravina Joshi
   <https://youtu.be/TO7veOnV9T4?si=uzHTokSpVAtp1iOm>

experts and gain skills equivalent to those taught at premier institutions

 Hi SHREEJA,  
    
Welcome to Day 5. Today, we‚Äôre working with loops. This control structure enables you to repeat a block of code until some condition is met. Get in the loop!  
    
Practice makes perfect.

subject: Mini Project List
snippet: Dear Students, Kindly find the attached list of mini projects, you may perform the project among three students within your lab group and present it in the form of presentation to your respective lab
content:
Dear Students,
Kindly find the attached list of mini projects, you may perform the project
among three students within your lab group and present it in the form of
presentation to your respective lab faculty. Date of presentation will be
informed after diwali vacation.
*Rules:*
*Select the project number as project ID.*

*Only one student from the group has to fill up the form.*

*Project should be unique within the group, else it will be rejected.*

*Mention the student ID in form as Student 1, Student 2 and Student 3
individually. If only one or two students are participating then mention
'-' in the rest.*

*No change will be allowed in the group after filling up the form.*

*Note: Whether the project is approved or rejected will be displayed on
23rd October, 2024.*

*Link of form: https://forms.gle/YQwU7MHsjMcw66Hr8
<https://forms.gle/YQwU7MHsjMcw66Hr8>*


*--*
*Thanks & Regards,*
*Aayushi Chaudhari | PhD*
Assistant Professor,
U & P U Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,Changa,Anand-388421.
www.charusat.ac.in

--

snippet: üéâ Invitation to Participate in COGNIZANCE (IIT ROORKEE) Industrial Learning and Certification Program üéâ Dear Student, We are thrilled to invite you to participate in the prestigious COGNIZANCE (IIT
content:
*üéâ Invitation to Participate in COGNIZANCE (IIT ROORKEE) Industrial
Learning and Certification Program üéâ*

*Dear Student,*

We are thrilled to invite you to participate in the prestigious COGNIZANCE
(IIT ROORKEE) Industrial Learning and Certification Program üéì. This
program is designed to equip you with the skills and knowledge required to
excel in the industry, and we believe that you would be an excellent fit! üíº

***üìù Enrollment catalogue:** *

To Begin, kindly fill out the application mode at:-
*https://forms.gle/qN9ev12dRq4JrdzX9
<https://forms.gle/qN9ev12dRq4JrdzX9>*

Don't forget to share the Application with your friends and ensure that
everyone fills it out! ü§ù

***üì± Join Our Official WhatsApp Group:***

For more information and updates, join our official WhatsApp group
at:-*https://chat.whatsapp.com/FoCH2ksmzC31ogZEhbaMTy
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/FoCH2ksmzC31ogZEhbaMTy> üì±*

***üìÖ Preferred Slots for First Years:***

We have reserved slots for first-year students from *September to December*.
Don't miss out on this good time! üìÖ

***üìö Program Highlights:***

Our program afford a unique blend of theoretical knowledge and practical
experience, with the following highlights:

*Low-Code and No-Code Tools:* India's first program to afford low-code and
no-code tools, with a ensure of 100% outcome-driven results üìà
*LinkedIn Top Startup 2023:* We are proud to be recognized as a top startup
on LinkedIn üöÄ
*Certifications from Cognizance - IIT Roorkee: *Verified through Wipro Dice
ID, our certifications are highly valued in the industry üìú
*Tech-Giant Mentors and Industry Leaders:*Learn from outstanding in the
industry and gain valuable insights ü§ù
*Cutting-Edge Curriculum: *Including generative AI and prompt engineering,
our curriculum is designed to keep you ahead of the curve üìö
*Exclusive Masterclasses:*With students, founders, and CXOs from top global
companies, our masterclasses propose unparalleled networking
opportunities üì¢
*Personalized Instructors:*Our instructors will guide you every step of the
way, ensuring that you receive comprehensive guidance üìù

***üìä Program Structure:***

Our program is divided into two months, with the following structure:

*üñ•Ô∏èFirst Month:*IIT training through live lectures and mentorship from
industry professionals üìö
*üî¨Second Month:*Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals, including a LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT üìä
*Minor Project: *10 individual projects assigned to each intern, with
mentor guidance üìù
*Capstone Project: *Capstone Project, a group project assigned to 15
interns, with specific work assigned to each intern üìà

***üìö Class Options:***

We extend two types of classes to suit your learning style:

*Blended Program/Recorded Classes:* Receive recorded sessions and clear
doubts in live doubt-clearing sessions every weekend üìö
*Mentor-Led/Live Classes:* Attend live Zoom classes at 6:30 PM, 2-3 days a
week, with recorded sessions available üìä

***üë®‚Äçüéì Student Testimonials:***
*LinkedIn <https://www.linkedin.com/company/teachnook/posts/?feedView=all>*
Hear from our previous interns who have benefited from this program:

 " I am thrilled to announce the successful completion of my
internship at TEACHNOOK
(TEACHSCAPE ONLINE LEARNING SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED)
<https://www.linkedin.com/company/teachnook/> in collaboration with Croatia
Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
<https://www.linkedin.com/company/coratia-technologies-pvt-ltd/>, where I
had the opportunity to make a project on analyzing, cleaning, predicting
insights of Health Insurance dataset.    üñ•Ô∏è" ( LinkedIn
<https://www.linkedin.com/posts/sai-srikanth-42870b281_datanalytics-intership-datascience-activity-7150024127104319488-KPuI?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>
)- *Sai Srikanth, Saveetha College of Engineering*

"This spectacular lucky moment  allows me to work on a project under the
guidance of a mentor, enhancing my skills and gaining hands-on experience
in the world of web development. üöÄ"  (LinkedIn
<https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7206357305221603328/>
)- *GKrishna A, VIT AP*

" Excited to announce that I'm starting my second internship as a Data
Science Intern in TEACHNOOK  <https://www.linkedin.com/company/teachnook/> in
collaboration with Cognizance and IIT Roorkee!    "(LinkedIn
<https://www.linkedin.com/posts/aditya-raj-kaushik-053b57259_datascience-internship-iitroorkee-activity-7207004218925195266-9jJA?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>
) - *Aditya Raj Kaushik, GITAM*

" üöÄ I'm thrilled to announce that TeachNook is offering internship
opportunities for passionate individuals eager to make a difference in
education!  " (*https://www.linkedin.com/in/gokul-kumar-v-236a24217/recent-activity/all/
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/gokul-kumar-v-236a24217/recent-activity/all/>LinkedIn
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/gokul-kumar-v-236a24217/recent-activity/all/>*
)- *Pratik Kumar Gupta, AMITY University*

***üìà Secure Your Spot:***

*Don't miss out on this moment to supercharge your career! Fixed slots are
available, so Join us to secure your spot and gain a competitive edge in
the dynamic job market üöÄ*

***üìà LCNC CURRICULUMS:***
 Curriculams LCNC
<https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1DBrnL-0eFcZ8vFZ9GhziK2gNH-5h73NJ>


Our curriculum is designed to equip you with the skills and knowledge
required to excel in the industry. Don't miss out on this good time to
upskill and reskill! üìö



***üöÄ Embark on Your Journey to triumph with TEACHNOOK:**Your future starts
on the spot! Secure your spot Right Away and take the first step towards a
successful career journey üöÄ*

subject: MSUD101 Continuous Evaluation Test and Assignment-2 Checking Schedule
snippet: Dear Students, This is to inform you that the Continuous Evaluation Test for MSUD101 (Engineering Mathematics-I) will be held on 16th November 2024 (Saturday) from 10:00 AM to 10:40 AM. Please note
content:
*Dear Students,*

This is to inform you that the Continuous Evaluation Test for MSUD101
(Engineering Mathematics-I) will be held on *16th November 2024 (Saturday)
from 10:00 AM to 10:40 AM*.

Please note that no additional test will be conducted, and your attendance
is *mandatory*. All students must be present for the test without fail.

Additionally, the checking of Assignment-2 will follow the schedule below:

   - *13th November 2024* (CE-I) (Wednesday): 2:20 PM onwards in Classroom
   No. 310
   - *15th November 2024* (CE-II) (Friday): 3:20 PM onwards in Classroom
   No. 310

Thank you for your cooperation.
*Best regards,*

 --

************************************************************************************
* Dr. Krunal B. Kachhia*
*  Head, Department of Mathematical Sciences,*

*  IQAC Coordinator(PDPIAS)  P. D. Patel Institute of Applied
Sciences(PDPIAS)*
 NIRF 2021 rank-22th (*https://www.nirfindia.org/2021/CollegeRanking.html
<https://www.nirfindia.org/2021/CollegeRanking.html>**)*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*

*(Re-accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC)*
*CHARUSAT Campus, Changa, GUJARAT, INDIA*
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*E-mail: krunalkachhia.maths@charusat.ac.in
<krunalkachhia.maths@charusat.ac.in>,*

*Mob. No: +91-9033974322*

*********************************************************************************************

subject: Fwd: Certified Ethical Hacker v13 (CEHv13) - World‚Äôs No. 1 Ethical Hacking Certification, now with the power of AI (Oct 2024)
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Pritesh Prajapati <priteshprajapati.it@charusat.ac.in> Date: Sat, Oct 19, 2024 at 12:02 PM Subject: Certified Ethical Hacker v13 (CEHv13) -
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Pritesh Prajapati <priteshprajapati.it@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Sat, Oct 19, 2024 at 12:02‚ÄØPM
Subject: Certified Ethical Hacker v13 (CEHv13) - World‚Äôs No. 1 Ethical
Hacking Certification, now with the power of AI (Oct 2024)
To: Head CE CHARUSAT <hod.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Head CSE <
hod.cse@charusat.ac.in>, HOD AIML <hod.aiml@charusat.ac.in>, HOD Depstar <
hodds@charusat.ac.in>, Head EC CHARUSAT <hod.ec@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Head IT CHARUSAT <hod.it@charusat.ac.in>, Principal C.S.Patel Institute
of Technology <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>, Principal DEPSTAR <
principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>, Dean FTE CHARUSAT <
dean.fte@charusat.ac.in>, Principal CMPICA CHARUSAT <
principal.cmpica@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Sir/Madam,

Please share the email below with your students to get benefit from
subsidized academic costs as an EC-Council Academia Partner.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dear students,

We are glad to inform you that *"Charotar University of Science and
Technology - CHARUSAT"* is the official *EC-Council Academia Partner *since
January 2020. We are immensely pleased to welcome ‚ÄúCHARUSAT‚Äù *students* to
EC Council's newly launched *CEHv13* program. Certified Ethical
Hacker CEHv13
<https://www.eccouncil.org/programs/certified-ethical-hacker-ceh/> will
teach you the latest commercial-grade hacking tools, techniques, and
methodologies hackers and information security professionals use to hack an
organization lawfully. *100+ students have benefited from CEH at CHARUSAT
with a subsidized academia kit price.*

*What‚Äôs new in CEHv13?*: *From the creators of Certified Ethical Hacker
(CEH) comes the latest and evolved version 13 with added AI capabilities.
Structured across 20 learning modules covering over 550 attack techniques,
CEH provides cybersecurity professionals with the core knowledge they need
to detect and defend against emerging threats.*

*You will get:*

   - EC-Council Official Course Book for CEHv13 for self-study (24 Months) -
   Accessible Online/Offline. To Download App
   <https://support.vitalsource.com/hc/en-us/articles/201344733-Bookshelf-Download-Options>

   - Access To iLabs for 6 Months. Check the ilabs Demo Here:
   *https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI* <https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI>.
   - An Exam Voucher (1 Year) - *Get a globally recognized certificate
for* passing
   the exam. Accreditations
   <https://linkprotect.cudasvc.com/url?a=https%3a%2f%2fwww.eccouncil.org%2faccreditations%2f&c=E,1,hLej6Kb3ZRL_QKhhm71kedMm89bbj8UclU3d50zuCt2frG_t19Fir_60SvUk16RJBGYXwVBLF11HLMhr7nDv8WGkPElWNiTm9zdZ_xfo&typo=1>
   - Over 200 hands-on labs with Over 3,500 hacking tools. Learn how to
   hack multiple operating systems (Windows 11, Windows servers, Linux,
   Ubuntu, Android)
   - The venue of the Exam will be our University Premises.

*Popular Cybersecurity Tools in the Course:*


* - Network scanning and mapping tools (e.g., Nmap, hping3)- Vulnerability
assessment tools (e.g., OpenVAS, Nessus)- Penetration testing tools (e.g.,
Metasploit, Aircrack-ng)- Packet sniffers and network analyzers (e.g.,
Wireshark, Omnipeek Network Analyzer)- Social engineering tools (e.g.,
Social-Engineer Toolkit (SET), SpeedPhish Framework (SPF))- Password
cracking tools (e.g., John the Ripper, L0phtCrack)- Forensics tools (e.g.
FTK, EnCase, Autopsy)- Wireless hacking tools (e.g., Aircrack-ng,
Wifiphisher)- Encryption tools (e.g., CryptoForge, VeraCrypt)*
*Master AI to automate ethical hacking tasks and hack and defend against AI
systems.*

*‚Ä¢ ShellGPT* ‚Äì Automates various reconnaissance and penetration testing
tasks using AI-driven scripting.
*‚Ä¢ ChatGPT *‚Äì Helps generate code, automate tasks, and create scripts for
ethical hacking.
‚Ä¢ *FraudGPT* ‚Äì Simulates AI-assisted malicious activities to learn defense
strategies.
‚Ä¢ *WormGPT* ‚Äì An offensive AI tool used to simulate exploitations and
malware creation.
‚Ä¢ *DeepExploit* ‚Äì AI-powered vulnerability scanning and exploitation tool.
‚Ä¢ *Nebula* ‚Äì Automates network discovery and vulnerability identification
with AI.
‚Ä¢ *Veed.io* ‚Äì Can visualize security analytics and post-exploitation
results for better reporting.


*Typical Job Roles for C|EH :*

   - Mid-Level Information Security Auditor
   - Cybersecurity Auditor
   - Security Administrator
   - IT Security Administrator
   - Cyber Defense Analyst
   - Senior Security Consultant
   - Information Security Manager
   - Senior SOC Analyst
   - Solution Architect
   - Cybersecurity Consultant



   - Vulnerability Assessment Analyst
   - Warning Analyst
   - Information Security Analyst 1
   - Security Analyst L1
   - Infosec Security Administrator
   - Cybersecurity Analyst L1, L2, & L3
   - Network Security Engineer
   - SOC Security Analyst
   - Security Analyst
   - Network Engineer

content:

subject: AICTE Approved Internship to Get Certified by CISCO, META, IBM to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT *Student, *Applause for being shortlisted for the internship
program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here  üëâ*   *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq








*Top Preferred Courses:‚úÖ Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine
Learning.‚úÖ Cloud Computing.‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.

*Third month:* Based on your enactment during the first two months of the
program, we will conduct a technical interview in the same company during
the third month. You will be offered a stipend-based Internship if you
perform well in the interview.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :‚úÖ Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.‚úÖ The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.‚úÖ Admittance to a growth community.*

*Warisha*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*warisha.nouman@teachnook.com <warisha.nouman@teachnook.com>*

subject: CHARUSAT Team Selection for All India/West Zone Inter University Youth Festival 2024-25
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to invite you to participate in the selection process for the CHARUSAT team at the upcoming All India/West Zone Inter University Youth Festival 2024-25. This festival is a
content:
Dear Students,

We are excited to invite you to participate in the selection process for
the CHARUSAT team at the upcoming All India/West Zone Inter University
Youth Festival 2024-25. This festival is a prestigious platform where you
can showcase your talents and represent our university on a national level.

*Benefits of Participation:*

- Recognition and Exposure: Gain visibility and recognition for your
talents.

- Skill Development: Enhance your leadership, teamwork, and creative skills.

- National-Level Opportunities: The chance to represent CHARUSAT at
national youth festivals.

- Networking: Build connections with peers across universities.

*Important Details:*

*- Registration Form: *https://forms.gle/C1VFdPTgfucvzUHKA

*- Deadline for Registration:* 1st November, 2024

*- Guidelines, Rules, and Regulations*: Please review the attached
documents carefully for event details and required documents.

We encourage all students to take advantage of this opportunity to grow and
make CHARUSAT proud. For any queries, feel free to contact us.

--

To: <amitthakkar.it@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Prof. Amit Thakkar,

Greetings from Internshala!

This is to remind you that *today is the last day* to share an incredible
opportunity for your students‚Äîthe *Prime Minister Internship Scheme*,
announced in the 2024-25 budget. This initiative aims to provide *1 crore*
internships over the next five years, giving students real-world experience
in India‚Äôs top *500 companies*, including sectors like IT, Consulting,
Banking, Energy, FMCG, Telecom, and more.

*Please share the following link with all your students to check their
eligibility for the Prime Minister Internship scheme:*
*internshala.com/i/nl-pm*
<https://lnk.updates.internshala.com/vtrack?clientid=142167&ul=BwFXAFdaCw5PBh1TVFlETVEECA5WQh1dEHMGUVVKTEcEQhtVURdeChpRWgxCQF4EWFlTRh4MQnNaWlBAEUsDQhtVBxoPDEU=&ml=BwZQBFVSCQlPBh0HDgQACEU=&sl=d0gnSDMxRWt+Yh1eV1seTEkBAhFSQx1dCkcAS1pLUVUJVxtXXVRLVA==&pp=0&fl=XUAQRFxNFlFdQgRAV0NYWFUETQZYXRxdS10JFERV&ext=>

*Last date to register:* 18th October 2024

*What‚Äôs in it for your students?*

   - 12-month internship in leading companies across various sectors

   - Practical skills that complement academic education
   - ‚Çπ5,000 monthly stipend for 12 months, along with a one-time ‚Çπ6,000
   grant from the Government of India, disbursed through DBT after starting
