*Additional benefits:*
Interns will be covered under Government of India‚Äôs insurance schemes,
including *Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana* and *Pradhan Mantri
Suraksha Bima Yojana*, with the government covering the premium. Companies
may also provide additional accidental insurance.

subject: Registration form for webinar on "MBA from Indian B-schools"
snippet: Dear students, Here is an opportunity to explore in depth information , tools and techniques for getting admissions in top class B-schools of India for MBA and allied courses. The resource person is Dr
content:
Dear students,

Here is an opportunity to explore in depth information , tools and
techniques for getting admissions in top class B-schools of India for MBA
and allied courses.

The resource person is Dr. Darshan Pandya from one of the leading
institutes, School of Business Management, NMIMS University, Mumbai. He is
also an alumni of CHARUSAT. So it's a great chance to interact with him for
getting proper and crystal clear information from him to clear competitive
examinations for getting admission in top Business schools of India.

Fill the form to register for the webinar via
https://forms.gle/1axWRhSVZUDEbgfE6 link.
*LIMITED SEATS ARE THERE . FIRST COME FIRST SERVE.*

Event details are given below.

*Webinar on "MBA from Indian B-schools"*
*Date: 22nd **October, 2024  *
*Time: 5:00 pm onwards *

*Platform :  Google Meet*
[image: Slide1.JPG]


*Thanks and regards.*





*Harmish BhattAssistant Professor,Department of Mechanical
Engineering,Faculty of Technology & EngineeringCharotar University of
Science & Technology*
*Education Campus Changa -388421 *
*Dist: Anand, Gujarat India*




*Phone Contact:Mobile: 094286 57212(O): 02697 265324Fax: 02697 247100*

--

subject: Fwd: Mandatory Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz for All BTech Students
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Sanni <sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in> Date: Tue, Oct 15, 2024, 11:21 Subject: Mandatory Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz for All BTech Students To:
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Sanni <sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Oct 15, 2024, 11:21
Subject: Mandatory Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz for All BTech Students
To: <24ec@charusat.edu.in>, <24me@charusat.edu.in>, <24cl@charust.edu.in>, <
24ee@charust.edu.in>, <24ce@charust.edu.in>, <24it@charust.edu.in>, <
24aiml@charust.edu.in>, <24cse@charust.edu.in>, Radhika Patel <
radhikapatel.it@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Pratik Pataniya <pratikpataniya.phys@charusat.ac.in>, Sachin Patel <
sachinpatel.phys@charusat.ac.in>, Dr. Manan N. Shah <
mananshah.phys@charusat.ac.in>, Tapobroto Bhanja <
tapobroto.icc@charusat.ac.in>, Dr. Shweta Dabhi <
shwetadabhi.phys@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Students,

This is to inform you that a mandatory quiz -1 on Engineering Physics - 1
will be held for all BTech students. The quiz will cover key topics from
your syllabus and is essential for your continuous evaluation.

*Quiz Details:*
Quiz 1
Syllabus: Experiments 1 to 5 (Basic concepts, Experimental Process, etc)
Date: 19/10/2024
Time: 4:00 PM to 4:30 PM
Venue: Online (Google Form) (Link will be provided before 5 mins of Exam)
Format: Multiple-choice questions (MCQs)

Please ensure your participation as this is a compulsory part of the
assessment process. No excuses for internet connectivity, technical issues
with devices, etc. will be entertained. No marks will be given if fail to
attend this quiz.

For any further information, feel free to reach out by replying to this
email.

Best regards,
Sanni

-- 
*Thanks,*



*Sanni, Ph.D.Assistant professorDepartment of Physical Sciences
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/PDPIAS/people/>Faculty of Applied SciencesP D
Patel Institute of Applied Sciences,CHARUSAT
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/>, Changa. - 388 421, India*

*Email: sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in <sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in>*
*            sunkapatel@gmail.com <sunkapatel@gmail.com>*
*Phone: (M) +91 - 9978577009*

--

subject: Mandatory Foundation course Quiz for All BTech Students
snippet: Dear Students, About Foundation Course: Foundation Course in Math and Physics, which is a mandatory audit course for all 1st semester BTech students. This course is designed to bridge the gap between
content:
Dear Students,

*About Foundation Course: *
Foundation Course in Math and Physics, which is a *mandatory audit course*
for all *1st semester BTech students*. This course is designed to bridge
the gap between high school and university-level concepts, focusing on
fundamental topics such as calculus, algebra, mechanics, electromagnetism,
etc. The aim is to build a strong foundation for your advanced engineering
studies.


*Course Evaluation:*>> Internal Online Quiz: 25 Marks *(Date: 19/10/2024 |
3:00 PM to 3:30 PM) (Link will be provided before 05 mins of the quiz time)*
>> External Online Quiz: 25 Marks *(to be announced later with the external
theory exam)*
>> Total: *50 Marks*
>> Both quizzes will be conducted *online (Google Forms)*.
>> Questions in both quizzes will be asked from the question banks attached
with this email.


*Important Note:*
*1) No excuse for internet connectivity, device failure, etc will be
entertained. If you failed to attend the quiz then you shall be marked
absent.*
*2) This is a separate course that has to do nothing with your
ongoing Engineering Physics and Engineering Mathematics courses.*

*Attachments*
1) Syllabus of Foundation Course
2) Question Bank of Physics and Mathematics

For any queries, please feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
Sanni
-- 
*Thanks,*



*Sanni, Ph.D.Assistant professorDepartment of Physical Sciences
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/PDPIAS/people/>Faculty of Applied SciencesP D
Patel Institute of Applied Sciences,CHARUSAT
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/>, Changa. - 388 421, India*

*Phone: (M) +91 - 9978577009*

subject: Announcement of ULSC Logo Competition Winner
snippet: Dear Students and Faculty, We are excited to announce the winner of the ULSC Logo Competition! After careful consideration and review of all the creative submissions, we are pleased to congratulate
content:
Dear Students and Faculty,

We are excited to announce the winner of the ULSC Logo Competition!

After careful consideration and review of all the creative submissions, we
are pleased to congratulate *Satyam Charola (ID: 22CE016)* as the winner of
this competition. His design will represent the ULSC, and we appreciate the
effort and creativity he put into the logo.

Satyam was awarded with a cash prize for his achievement.

We extend our heartfelt thanks to all participants for their outstanding
contributions and enthusiasm. Stay tuned for more such opportunities!

Best regards,

*Convener*


*University Level Central Students Council*

*CHARUSAT.*

--

subject: Fwd: Mandatory Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz for All BTech Students
snippet: Dear Students, This is to inform you that a mandatory quiz -1 on Engineering Physics - 1 will be held for all BTech students. The quiz will cover key topics from your syllabus and is essential for your
content:
Dear Students,

This is to inform you that a mandatory quiz -1 on Engineering Physics - 1
will be held for all BTech students. The quiz will cover key topics from
your syllabus and is essential for your continuous evaluation.

*Quiz Details:*
Quiz 1
Syllabus: Experiments 1 to 5 (Basic concepts, Experimental Process, etc)
Date: 19/10/2024
Time: 4:00 PM to 4:30 PM
Venue: Online (Google Form) (Link will be provided before 5 mins of Exam)
Format: Multiple-choice questions (MCQs)

Please ensure your participation as this is a compulsory part of the
assessment process. No excuses for internet connectivity, technical issues
with devices, etc. will be entertained. No marks will be given if fail to
attend this quiz.

For any further information, feel free to reach out by replying to this
email.

Best regards,
Sanni

subject: Re: IEEE Membership Special Offers.
snippet: Hey everyone, Just a gentle reminder to become an IEEE Member before 12th October that is TODAY to avail maximum discounts. For your ease we have mentioned the important student promo codes and also
content:
Hey everyone,

Just a gentle reminder to become an *IEEE Member* before 12th October that
is *TODAY* to avail maximum discounts. For your ease we have mentioned the
important student promo codes and also attached a document with step by
step method to take the membership : -

1. IEEE Computer Science Society - CSIEEEDAYSTU24
2. IEEE Signal Processing Society - IEEEDAY2024SPS
3. IEEE Communication Society - IEEEDAYCOMSOC-S
4. IEEE Smart Cities - SMARTCITIES100

Also you can visit for more Special Offers on IEEE Day Link:
https://ieeeday.org/special-activities-offers/

Join *IEEE *using link: https://www.ieee.org/membership/join/index.html

A quick reminder to *use *your *personal email ID* when applying for
membership. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to enhance your
knowledge, expand your professional network, and grow with IEEE. Join us
today and make the most of IEEE Day 2024!

If you need any assistance or have questions, please feel free to contact



*Sakshi Shah: 9429866748*


Once you have completed please fill out the below google form. Hurry!!
Become an IEEE Member today

IEEE Membership Acknowledgement Form
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1FVOG849uStfk0PcnWsnMZ0-9We1CVOu-h-GFZ8imfa0/edit>


Regards
IEEE CSPIT Student Branch
[image: newlogoieee.png]

On Thu, Oct 10, 2024 at 2:14‚ÄØPM IEEE CSPIT <ieee.charusatsb@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Hello budding engineers,
>
> We hope you are doing well. Did you know *IEEE* is celebrating *IEEE Day *
> *2024* in the month of October. They have offered special membership
> offers. They are active till *12 October 2024. *
>
> *What is IEEE?*
>
> IEEE is the world‚Äôs largest technical professional organization. Our
> Student Branches offer opportunities for career development, technical
> learning, leadership experience, and networking in engineering and related
> fields.
>
> *Why Join the IEEE?*
>
>    - *Build Your Resume:* Participate in projects, workshops, and
>    hackathons in areas like AI, Robotics, and Software Development to gain
>    real-world experience.
>    - *Networking Opportunities:* Connect with industry professionals,
>    mentors, and peers for internships, jobs, and career advice.
>    - *Leadership Experience:* Take on roles to develop management,
>    team-building, and communication skills.
>    - *Global Competitions & Events:* Compete in IEEE Xtreme and attend
>    IEEE conferences to showcase your abilities.
>    - *Exclusive Resources:* Access the IEEE Xplore digital library to
>    stay ahead in coursework and research.
>
>
> There are promo codes available for some *IEEE* societies also.* Kindly note
> you must be an IEEE member first before taking any IEEE society membership.*
>
>
> *1. IEEE Computer Society: 50% discount for all IEEE members: CSIEEEDAY24*
>
>
> *2. IEEE Signal Processing Society: 50% discount for new members
> only: IEEEDAY2024SPS*
>
> 3. IEEE Power and Energy Society: 50% discount for all IEEE members:
> IEEEDAY24PES
>
> 4. IEEE Smart cities technical community will be free using code:
> SMARTCITIES100
>
> 5.  IEEE Education Society: 50% discount for all IEEE members:
> EDIEEEDAYHG25
>
> 6. IEEE Electronics Packaging Society will be *free* using code:
> IEEEDAY2024EPS
>
> 7. IEEE Geoscience and Remote Sensing Society: 50% discount for new
> members only: IEEEDAY2024GRS
>
> 8. IEEE magnetics Society will be *free* using code:IEEEDAY2024MAG
>
> 9.  IEEE Broadcast Technology Society will be *free* using code:
> IEEEDAY2024BTS
>
> 10. IEEE Reliability Society: 50% discount for all IEEE members:
> IEEEDAY2024RLS
>
> 11. IEEE Communications society: 50% discount for new members only:
> IEEEDAYCOMSOC50
>
> 12. IEEE Vehicular Society: 50% discount for new members only:
> IEEEDAY2024VTS
>
> Also you can visit for more Special Offers on IEEE Day Link:
> https://ieeeday.org/special-activities-offers/
>
> Join *IEEE *using link: https://www.ieee.org/membership/join/index.html
>
> A quick reminder to *use *your *personal email ID* when applying for
> membership. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to enhance your
> knowledge, expand your professional network, and grow with IEEE. Join us
> today and make the most of IEEE Day 2024!
>
> If you need any assistance or have questions, please feel free to contact
>
>
>
> *Sakshi Shah: 9429866748*
>
>
>
> *IEEE CSPIT SB 2024-25*
>
> [image: image.png]

subject: IEEE Membership Special Offers.
snippet: Hello budding engineers, We hope you are doing well. Did you know IEEE is celebrating IEEE Day 2024 in the month of October. They have offered special membership offers. They are active till 12 October
content:
Hello budding engineers,

We hope you are doing well. Did you know *IEEE* is celebrating *IEEE Day *
*2024* in the month of October. They have offered special membership
offers. They are active till *12 October 2024. *

*What is IEEE?*

IEEE is the world‚Äôs largest technical professional organization. Our
Student Branches offer opportunities for career development, technical
learning, leadership experience, and networking in engineering and related
fields.

*Why Join the IEEE?*

   - *Build Your Resume:* Participate in projects, workshops, and
   hackathons in areas like AI, Robotics, and Software Development to gain
   real-world experience.
   - *Networking Opportunities:* Connect with industry professionals,
   mentors, and peers for internships, jobs, and career advice.
   - *Leadership Experience:* Take on roles to develop management,
   team-building, and communication skills.
   - *Global Competitions & Events:* Compete in IEEE Xtreme and attend IEEE
   conferences to showcase your abilities.
   - *Exclusive Resources:* Access the IEEE Xplore digital library to stay
   ahead in coursework and research.


There are promo codes available for some *IEEE* societies also.* Kindly note
you must be an IEEE member first before taking any IEEE society membership.*


*1. IEEE Computer Society: 50% discount for all IEEE members: CSIEEEDAY24*


*2. IEEE Signal Processing Society: 50% discount for new members
only: IEEEDAY2024SPS*

3. IEEE Power and Energy Society: 50% discount for all IEEE members:
IEEEDAY24PES

4. IEEE Smart cities technical community will be free using code:
SMARTCITIES100

5.  IEEE Education Society: 50% discount for all IEEE members:EDIEEEDAYHG25

6. IEEE Electronics Packaging Society will be *free* using code:
IEEEDAY2024EPS

7. IEEE Geoscience and Remote Sensing Society: 50% discount for new members
only: IEEEDAY2024GRS

8. IEEE magnetics Society will be *free* using code:IEEEDAY2024MAG

9.  IEEE Broadcast Technology Society will be *free* using code:
IEEEDAY2024BTS

10. IEEE Reliability Society: 50% discount for all IEEE members:
IEEEDAY2024RLS

11. IEEE Communications society: 50% discount for new members only:
IEEEDAYCOMSOC50

12. IEEE Vehicular Society: 50% discount for new members only:
IEEEDAY2024VTS

Also you can visit for more Special Offers on IEEE Day Link:
https://ieeeday.org/special-activities-offers/

Join *IEEE *using link: https://www.ieee.org/membership/join/index.html

A quick reminder to *use *your *personal email ID* when applying for
membership. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to enhance your
knowledge, expand your professional network, and grow with IEEE. Join us
today and make the most of IEEE Day 2024!

If you need any assistance or have questions, please feel free to contact



*Sakshi Shah: 9429866748*



*IEEE CSPIT SB 2024-25*

subject: INFO_STUDENT NOTICE
snippet: Dear First Year Student of Charotar University of Science and Technology Congratulations on being shortlisted for our AICTE-approved Internship Program! NOVEMBER-DECEMBER BATCH Teachnook, in
content:
Dear First Year Student of *Charotar University of Science and Technology *


*Congratulations on being shortlisted for our AICTE-approved Internship
Program!*
*NOVEMBER-DECEMBER BATCH*

Teachnook, in collaboration with Cognizance IIT Roorkee, is offering a
2-month Training + Internship program. This opportunity is available for
every department with fixed slots. We invite you to complete the
application form to secure your spot.

*FINAL CALL FOR NOVEMBER BATCH*

*  Application Form:  *
*https://forms.gle/8bQxSh9Rcyzqo72o8 <https://forms.gle/8bQxSh9Rcyzqo72o8>*
*(LAST 10 SLOTS ARE AVAILABLE)*


*PROGRAM DETAILS*
*- First Month: Training includes live lectures and mentorship from
industry professionals. Login credentials will be provided upon
registration.*

*- Second Month: Internship with live mentorship on projects from
professionals. Experience real-world problems through:*

  *- Project 1:* 10 individual projects to be completed with your mentor.
  *- Project 2:* Capstone Group Project with specific tasks assigned to
each intern.

*Benefits:*

- Program Completion Certificate from IIT Roorkee Cognizance.
- Internship Certificate from Top MNCs with Wipro Dice ID verification.
- 6-month LMS portal access.
- Growth Community pass with placement assistance.
- 24/7 personalized mentorship.
- Complimentary sessions on Gen AI & Prompt Engineering.
- Guidance on Low Code & No Code applications.
- Live & doubt-clearing sessions conducted by industrial experts.
- Guest lectures from Microsoft & Meta.

To enroll in this program, please complete the application form at your
earliest convenience.



*STUDENTS WHO ARE ALREADY ENROLLED, IGNORE THIS MAIL.*

Warm regards,

Teachnook
*Cognizance IIT Roorkee*

content:

the format. Get your practical file printed till 23 practical.

subject: MYSY Scholarship Criteria
snippet: Dear Students!! Greetings!! Hope you are doing well. As you may know, 75% attendance is mandatory to qualify for the Mukhyamantri Yuva Swavalamban Yojana (MYSY) scholarship. If the candidate does not
content:
Dear Students!!
Greetings!!
Hope you are doing well.
As you may know, 75% attendance is mandatory to qualify for the
Mukhyamantri Yuva Swavalamban Yojana (*MYSY) *scholarship. If the candidate
does not meet the criteria, the institute may not be able to process the
scholarship. The candidate shall be asked to justify such instance and the
institute shall have sole discretion for consideration of justification.

The remaining 25% may be spared for leaves viz. medical issues, family
events, festivals etc. However, it is strongly recommended that more than
80% of attendance be maintained in both classrooms and laboratories.

All the best,
Trushit Upadhyaya

-- 
Professor & I/c Principal
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology
Faculty of Technology & Engineering
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
CHARUSAT Campus, Changa, 388421
Petlad, Anand
Gujarat, India.

--

 If you have any queries, consult me in the staff room 309 Ec-Ee building,

subject: AICTE Approved Internship to Get Certified by CISCO, META, IBM to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT *Student, *Applause for being shortlisted for the internship
program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here  üëâ*   *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq









*Top Preferred Courses:‚úÖ Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine
Learning.‚úÖ Cloud Computing.‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :‚úÖ Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.‚úÖ The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.‚úÖ Admittance to a growth community.*

*Advaya*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*advaya.pathak@teachnook.com <advaya.pathak@teachnook.com>*

snippet: CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY (CHARUSAT) DEAR STUDENT 24ce138 DEPARTMENT OF CE AICTE APPROVED INTERNSHIP PROGRAM - MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING WITH COGNIZANCE - IIT ROORKEE [HAS BEEN
content:
CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY (CHARUSAT)



*DEAR STUDENT  24ce138DEPARTMENT OF CE*

*AICTE APPROVED INTERNSHIP PROGRAM  - MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING WITH
COGNIZANCE - IIT ROORKEE [HAS BEEN INCLUDED IN G FORM]*

We are offering a *2-month Course Training & Internship* in collaboration
with *COGNIZANCE - IIT ROORKEE* and *WIPRO DICE ID CERTIFICATES* by
Teachscape.
How to Participate:

   1. *Fill Out the Form : * *https://forms.gle/jPS328sEopknEcaH9
   <https://forms.gle/jPS328sEopknEcaH9>*

   (First 50 applicants may qualify for scholarship seats‚Äîfirst come, first
   served.)

Collaborating Companies:

   - MICROSOFT
   - IBM
   - CISCO
   - META
   - WIPRO

*Program Details:*

   - *Duration:* 1 or 2 months (your choice)
   - *Mode:* Remote
   - *Batches:* September, October, November, December

Benefits Upon Completion:

   - *Completion Certificate* from COGNIZANCE IIT ROORKEE
   - *Co-Branded Internship Certificate* from top MNCs
   - *100% Placement Assistance*
   - *Access to a Growing Community*
   - *Letter of Recommendation*
   - *Placement Training* (Resume building, mock interviews)

Program Structure:

   - *First Month:* Live lectures and mentorship from industry
   professionals.
   - *Second Month:* Hands-on industry projects with mentor guidance.
   - *Project 1:* Individual projects assigned to each intern.
      - *Project 2:* Group capstone project with a team of 15 interns.

Why Choose This Program?

   - First in India to offer low-code and no-code tools.
   - LinkedIn Top Startup 2023.
   - Certifications verified through Wipro Dice ID.
   - Learn from industry leaders and mentors.
   - Cutting-edge curriculum on generative AI and prompt engineering.

*Click here to apply:*  *https://forms.gle/jPS328sEopknEcaH9
<https://forms.gle/jPS328sEopknEcaH9>*

Secure your spot and enhance your skills with this valuable program!

subject: Fwd: ACM India Winter Schools 2024 Announcement
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Pritesh Prajapati <priteshprajapati.it@charusat.ac.in> Date: Sat, Oct 5, 2024 at 11:09 AM Subject: ACM India Winter Schools 2024 Announcement To: <
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Pritesh Prajapati <priteshprajapati.it@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Sat, Oct 5, 2024 at 11:09‚ÄØAM
Subject: ACM India Winter Schools 2024 Announcement
To: <21it@charusat.edu.in>, <22it@charusat.edu.in>, <23it@charusat.edu.in>
Cc: Head IT CHARUSAT <hod.it@charusat.ac.in>


Dear students,

Find the email below for your reference.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: ACM India
Date: Sat, Oct 5, 2024 at 11:00‚ÄØAM
Subject: ACM India Winter Schools 2024 Announcement
To: Priteshkumar Prajapati <priteshprajapati.it@charusat.ac.in>


[image: ACM India Logo] <https://www.acm.org>
------------------------------
****ACM India Winter Schools 2024 Announcement**** [image: to view image
click on]

We are back with "ACM India Winter Schools 2024." ACM India schools offer
self-motivated students in-depth knowledge and exposure to research in
current, advanced technology areas. Each school in this stellar lineup
covers academic and applied research in the technology topic and is taught
by the best-in-class experts from academia and industry.
Applying for the Winter Schools

The *application fee *for this school program is Rs 150 + 18% GST; you can
give first and second preference in the application form. All payments are
non-refundable. We request you to *apply*
<https://maestro.acm.org/trk/click?ref=z16l2snue3_2-31722_0x342b85x021529>
after
careful consideration since the demand is high and the seats are limited to *40
per school*.

And last but not least, as usual, one school is reserved for women
students. This time it is on "*Algorithms for Big Data and Machine Learning*"
at Dhirubhai Ambani Institute of Information and Communication Technology
(DA-IICT), Gandhinagar.

Please apply for the Winter Schools 2024 here
<https://maestro.acm.org/trk/click?ref=z16l2snue3_2-31722_0x342b86x021529>.

Last date for application: *Monday, October 21, 2024 (midnight IST)*
Announcement of selection via email: *Tuesday, November 5, 2024*
Registration deadline: *Friday, November 15, 2024 (midnight IST)*

Here is the list of the schools planned. More details about each school are
available via the respective school‚Äôs page below.

Data Structures and Algorithms for Strings, with applications to Search
Engines and Computational Biology
<https://maestro.acm.org/trk/click?ref=z16l2snue3_2-31722_0x342b87x021529>
Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham, Coimbatore
12/12/24 - 24/12/24

Decoding AI: Building Explainable and Robust Intelligence
<https://maestro.acm.org/trk/click?ref=z16l2snue3_2-31722_0x342b88x021529>
SRM University, Amravati, Andhra Pradesh
12/12/24 - 24/12/24

Algorithms for Big Data and Machine Learning
<https://maestro.acm.org/trk/click?ref=z16l2snue3_2-31722_0x342b89x021529>
*(WOMEN
only)*
Dhirubhai Ambani Institute of Information and Communication Technology
(DA-IICT) Gandhinagar
16/12/24 - 24/12/24

Introduction to Modern Cryptography
<https://maestro.acm.org/trk/click?ref=z16l2snue3_2-31722_0x342b8ax021529>
IIT Madras, Chennai (Sponsored by CYSTAR, IIT Madras)
16/12/24 - 21/12/24

Please note that you *need not be an ACM member* to attend any of these
schools, but our usual recommendation is to become one and experience all
other benefits of ACM student membership
<https://maestro.acm.org/trk/click?ref=z16l2snue3_2-31722_0x342b8bx021529>! *
ACM student member attendees of the schools will get a 20% discount * on
the registration fees.

Selection & Registration

*Selection:* ACM India will select the students based on the data provided.
Selected students will be informed via email.

*Registration:* Only the selected students will be required to pay
non-refundable school fees, no more than * INR 2500 + 18% GST*. A payment
link will be provided only to the selected students. Please note that once
selected to a school you cannot change to another school. Also note that if
selected, you should pay and register, to be fair to those who could not
get in. So choose responsibly.

Each day comprises lectures as well as tutorial sessions with hands-on
problem-solving experience. The industry partnership can expose you to the
career options in the area covered by the school; some schools may organise
sessions dedicated to this.

Top performing students in these schools may earn opportunities for
internship in industry and will be invited to an all-expense-paid trip to
the *ACM India ARCS Symposium *and * ACM India Annual Event 2025 at PSG
Tech, Coimbatore * in February-March 2025.

Please feel free to circulate this message in your academic institution and
fellow student network.

Regards,

*ACM India Schools Committee*
------------------------------

--

subject: Important Notice: Quizzes and Attendance
snippet: Dear Students, I would like to remind you of the importance of attending both lecture and lab sessions regularly. As per the rule, it is compulsory for students to maintain a minimum of 75% attendance
content:
Dear Students,

I would like to remind you of the importance of attending both lecture and
lab sessions regularly. As per the rule, it is compulsory for students to
maintain a minimum of 75% attendance in lectures and labs.

Additionally, please be informed that the quizzes for Unit 1 and Unit 2 of
the ICT subject will be conducted next week. It is crucial for all students
to be present for these quizzes, as any student who is absent will receive
0 marks. Please note that there will be no opportunity to retake the
quizzes.

content:
Dear students,

This is a reminder to complete your *course registration* in the *E-Governance
System* at your earliest convenience. Please be aware that failing to
register may result in your ID not appearing in the system.

This issue could potentially impact your attendance records for both

To avoid any disruptions, please ensure that your registration is finalized
as soon as possible.

subject: Reg : Student Achievement Data Entry [ June-Dec : A.Y 2024-25 ]
snippet: Dear Students, This is to inform you that if you are going for any kind of event (For eg Technical event/hackathon, Sports, Co-curricular, Extra activities, Research Paper Publication) in charusat or
content:
Dear Students,


This is to inform you that if you are going for any kind of event (*For
e.g. Technical event/**hackathon, Sports, Co-**curricular, Extra
activities, Research Paper Publication*) in charusat or outside charusat
and secure any position, then make an entry in e-governance module as per
said below.


*This will help us to recognize and appreciate the students for the
department, institute and university.*


*Students will be recognized through the social media platforms of charusat
university, institute, and department and put on
the Student Achievement Board of the department every month.*


*How to apply :*

1. From Student's Login>>E-Governance Module>>Students>>*Event
Participation Entry*
2. From Counsellor's Login>> E-Governance Module>>Student
Counselling>>*Student Event
Approval*

These modules manage *P**ost Event Participation data* of students. i.e.
once a student(s) participates in an event, Student/Team-leaders have to
make an entry in e-Governance by logging into their e-Governance account.

*General Process Flow:*

   1. Student/Team-leader has to make an entry in the "Event Participation
   Entry" Module (Path: Student Login>>E-Governance Module>>Students>>Event
   Participation Entry).
   2. In case of participation is *in a group/Team*, the *Team
   Leader student* has to make an entry and he/she has to enter ID's of
   other students in the application. All students who have participated in
   the event will be notified through the email after submission of event data.
   3. Once the student makes an entry, his/her counsellor will be notified
   through an email.
   4. The Counselor will verify the entry along with the uploaded documents
   by reviewing the original documents. The e-Governance system will
   communicate with the student/ Team-Leader to meet counselors for
   verification of documents.
   5.  An email will be sent to the student on approval of the entry. Only
   the approved entries will be considered for the student attendance
   compensation.

*Students are requested to do timely entry
for student event achievement and inform your respective counselors too.*

Fill up the *Google form* <https://forms.gle/1SXrdoUtNbYG8Duy8> for the
same and submit the required data.

*Note :*
*In case of any student achievement first notify your counsellor and apply
in e-governance.*

-- 
*Thanks & Regards *
*-----------------------------------*

*Ronak R Patel,*

*Assistant Professor,*
*U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,*
*Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,*
*CHARUSAT, Changa, Gujarat - 388421*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC*

--

subject: Quiz - I of MSUD101 on 07/10/2024
snippet: Dear Students Good Morning Kindly note that the online quiz of MSUD101 will be conducted on 07/10/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25 on Google Forms. The link will be shared on your institute mail ID. Make
content:
Dear Students
Good Morning
Kindly note that the online quiz of MSUD101 will be conducted on 07/10/2024
between 11:15 and 11:25 on Google Forms.
The link will be shared on your institute mail ID.
*Make sure you have your institute mail id (________@charusat.edu.in
<https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=________%40charusat.edu.in&authuser=0>)
otherwise, you will not be able to give the exam.*
*Syllabus of the exam : *
Unit 1
Lagrange‚Äôs Mean Value Theorem, Local Maxima and Minima of the function of
one variable
Successive differentiation: nth derivative of elementary functions:
rational, logarithmic, trigonometric, exponential and hyperbolic
Leibnitz rule for the nth-order derivatives of the product of two functions
Power series expansion of a function: Maclaurin‚Äôs and Taylor‚Äôs series
expansion.
L‚ÄôHospital‚Äôs rule and related applications, Indeterminate forms

Unit 3
Definition of Matrix, types of matrices and their properties
Determinant and their properties
Rank and nullity of a matrix
Determination of rank
Solution of a system of linear equations by Gauss elimination and Gauss
Jordan Methods


Unit 4
Partial derivative and geometrical interpretation

*BEST OF LUCK*

*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *

*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*

subject: Online Meeting regarding ABC-ID for First Year(2024 admitted) students
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Students, You might know that the Government of India has initiated National Education Policy 2020 (NEP-2020). One of the important points under the policy, applicable to higher education
content:
Dear CHARUSAT Students,

You might know that the Government of India has initiated *National
Education Policy 2020 (NEP-2020)*. One of the important points under the
policy, applicable to higher education, is to provide a  *CREDIT transfer
facility* through *ABC-ID*(Academic Bank of Credits-ID).

In line with the above-mentioned subject, you all are requested to *create
the ABC-ID* (IF you havn't created yet) from the below-given website. The
details of the need for ABC-ID and its benefits are mentioned in the
presentation as available in the link below. please go through the
presentation for a detailed understanding of the same.

*Kindly find the attachment regarding different ways to create ABC-ID.*

*Link of ABC-ID Presentation manual*:
https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1vokIiR3YRPeU_4qNAxa3cosi9lHFewm5HBUxfJA-IQw/preview?slide=
id.p
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*Regarding ABC ID*
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Steps to create ABC id is:

step-1: create abc id from: https://www.abc.gov.in/
step-2: Select student as shown below:

[image: image.png]

*The online meeting to solve doubts/queries (If any) regarding the ABC-ID
is scheduled as per below:*

Date:  07/10/2024, Monday
Time: 11.10 am
Meeting Link: Meeting link will be shared soon [Microsoft Team]




-- 
*Regards,*

*Nirav Bhatt*

--

subject: TheHackersMeetup X CHARUSAT - Student Chapter : Core Team Selection
snippet: Dear Students, I hope you're doing well! In today's digital world, "Cybersecurity" is more critical than ever. Whether you're just starting out or have some experience, staying
content:
Dear Students,

I hope you‚Äôre doing well!

In today‚Äôs digital world, "*Cybersecurity"* is more critical than ever.
Whether you're just starting out or have some experience, staying ahead of
evolving cyber threats is essential. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôre excited to invite you
to join the *Hackers Meetup Club*‚Äîa dynamic community focused on enhancing
cybersecurity knowledge, skills, and collaboration.
*Why You Should Join:*

   - *Learn from Experts*: Interact with industry professionals and gain
   hands-on experience with the latest tools and techniques in ethical hacking
   and cybersecurity defense.
   - *Stay Updated*: Understand the most recent cyber threats and how to
   protect systems from vulnerabilities and attacks.
   - *Hands-on Training*: Participate in real-world projects, Capture the
   Flag (CTF) events, and workshops to develop your practical skills.
   - *Collaborate & Grow*: Connect with like-minded peers, work on
   cybersecurity challenges, and expand your professional network.
   - *Boost Your Career*: Cybersecurity skills are in high demand across
   industries, and being part of the Hackers Meetup Club will give you a
   competitive edge in the job market.

*Leadership Opportunities Available!*

We‚Äôre expanding our team and are looking for passionate individuals to take
on leadership roles in the following domains:

   1. *Chapter Lead*: Lead the overall activities of the club, organize
   events, and drive the strategic direction of our initiatives.
   2. *Creative Team*: Develop innovative content and design engaging
   visuals to help promote our events and grow the club‚Äôs presence.
   3. *Marketing Team*: Manage outreach efforts, including social media and
   partnerships, to increase the visibility and reach of the club.
   4. *Logistics Team*: Handle the coordination of events, workshops, and
   meetups, ensuring everything runs smoothly from start to finish.
   5. *Documentation Team*: Be responsible for maintaining accurate records
   of club activities, creating reports, summarizing events, and preparing
   learning materials to support future sessions.

*Ready to Join or Lead?*

To get involved, simply fill out the Google Form linked below. Whether you
want to participate as a member or apply for one of the leadership roles,
we‚Äôd love to have you on board!

Click on link below : Hacker's MeetUp Team Selection Form
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSew6YYYvYtbAx_njD_WvWW4R83UsUQb7IC-iT4Vv2yHgNS0UA/viewform?usp=sharing>

Join us in the Hackers Meetup Club to develop your cybersecurity skills,
take on leadership roles, and contribute to securing the digital world.


We look forward to welcoming you to the team!


Best Regards,
*Akshita Kadam*
*Assistant Professor,*
*Department of CSE - CSPIT, **CHARUSAT*
Email: akshitakadam.cse@charusat.ac.in
LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/akshita-kadam

--

subject: Re: EOC Activity by CSPIT[CE] CREATIVE PROJECT IDEAS FOR IMPROVING THE LIVES OF SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE
snippet: Dear All, U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering, CSPIT organizes following Event in step towards helping people having disabilities or Physically Challenged. Title of the Event: "
content:
Dear All,



U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering, CSPIT organizes
following Event in step towards helping people having disabilities or
Physically Challenged.



*Title of the Event:* " CREATIVE PROJECT IDEAS FOR IMPROVING THE LIVES OF
SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE "



Guidelines:



1.    Students may submit their creative working project ideas on
a drawing sheet of paper/PPT/PDF.


Submission Link: https://forms.gle/GUHRx6sLvhYPatmx7


These can be further modified on the day of presentation [*7/12/2024*].

2.    Last *Extended Date* of Entry Submission: 30th November, 2024 [Ideas
through online shared google form]. Each student has to make a separate
entry using the shared google form link.

3.    Students may use a pen, pencil, sketch pens or any other tools
[Computer Software/Hardware] to depict their ideas on the day of
presentation [Date: 7/12/2024, Venue: MAC LAB (601), A7 Building].
Participants have to remain present in MAC LAB (601) [A7 Building]
from 09:15 am to 12:00 pm on 07/12/2024, Saturday to present their
project ideas.
Students may use presentation and poster to demonstrate their project ideas.

4.    Students may show Project Implementation

5.    Students may submit their ideas in a group of maximum 3 students.

6.    Best of the THREE Innovative Ideas will be awarded prize money &
certificate *(First prize 1500 Rs/-, Second Prize 1000 Rs/-, Third Prize
500 Rs/-)*. Others will receive a certificate of participation.



*EOC Department Coordinators are requested to encourage students for
participation and please forward this mail to students of your department.*


*For any further query you may please contact student coordinators (**23CE022
- Devam Bhaveshbhai Ghodasara *and *23CE115 - Priya Babubhai Pedhadiya* *).*

Dhaval Bhoi
Assistant Professor,
U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT, Changa.
Ta-Petlad Dist.Anand
PIN-388421 GUJARAT, INDIA

subject: AICTE Approved Internship to Get Certified by CISCO, META, IBM to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear Students of CHARUSAT. Teachnook is conducting an AICTE APPROVED Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly go through this and join the group as well as fill out the form also ASAP. Register before Slots get
content:
*Dear Students of CHARUSAT.*

Teachnook is conducting an *AICTE APPROVED* Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly
go through this and join the group as well as fill out the form also ASAP.
Register before Slots get filled.



*Greetings!*

*We are pleased to share that our company is collaborating with top Notch
MNCs to offer a unique 2-month Training + Internship  Program. This
advanced program will provide you with the practical skills that you need
to enhance your career.*

 We are enrolling only *LIMITED STUDENTS* in the program.



*It is Mandatory for Interested students to fill out the form, if you get
shortlisted you will get a call from our HR Team:GOOGLE
FORM: https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>*

*To know more information join in WhatsApp group:*

*https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq>*


*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*

*First month:* Training has been designed in the form of Live lectures
along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)
No Prerequisites Required.

*Second month: *Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.

*Project 1:- *10 individual projects are assigned to each intern, which
they must complete with their mentor.

*Project 2:-  *Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a
group of 10-12 interns. For each intern, a particular work will be assigned
to them, and they have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

*Here are two types of Sessions we are providing:*

*1. Blended Program/Recorded Sessions: *You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear them in live doubt-clearing sessions
which will be organized every weekend.

*2. Mentor-led/Live Sessions: *You will be having live Zoom classes after 7
PM for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well
*LMS(Learning Management System)* portal which you will have access to for
6 months.

After Completion of the program, the student shall receive :


[image: ‚úÖ] Program completion certificate issued by MNCs and Verified By
Wipro DICE ID.

[image: ‚úÖ] Co-Branded Internship certificate from Top MNCs.

[image: ‚úÖ] Get certified by CISCO, META, IBM, and Microsoft Certified
Fundamentals.

[image: ‚úÖ] 100% Placement Assistance.

[image: ‚úÖ] Access to a growing community.

*Shashi*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*shashidhara.d@teachnook.com <shashidhara.d@teachnook.com>*

subject: Training and Internship Opportunities to Kick Start Your Journey with Top-Notch MNC's
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT* Student, *Applause for being shortlisted for the internship
program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here  üëâ*   *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq








*Top Preferred Courses:‚úÖ Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine
Learning.‚úÖ Cloud Computing.‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.

*Third month:* Based on your enactment during the first two months of the
program, we will conduct a technical interview in the same company during
the third month. You will be offered a stipend-based Internship if you
perform well in the interview.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :‚úÖ Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.‚úÖ The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.‚úÖ Admittance to a growth community.*

*Anusha*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*anusha.hr@teachnook.com <anusha.hr@teachnook.com>*

subject: Announcement: Digital Logo Making Competition for U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to announce the Digital Logo Making Competition for the students of CSPIT CE. This is a unique opportunity for you to showcase your creativity and design skills while
content:
Dear Students,

We are excited to announce the *Digital Logo Making Competition* for the
students of *CSPIT CE*. This is a unique opportunity for you to showcase
your creativity and design skills while contributing to our department.

*Competition Details:*

   -

   *Theme:* Design a logo that represents the values, vision, and mission
   of the U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering.
   -

   *Eligibility:* Open to all students of CSPIT CE.
   -

   *Submission Format:* Logo designs must be created digitally and
   submitted in .PNG or .JPEG format (high resolution).
   -

   *Submission Deadline:* 5th October, 2024.

*Mission:* Our mission is to provide opportunities for students to grow
academically, culturally, and personally, promote teamwork and leadership,
and advocate for student needs to create a supportive university
environment. *Excitingly, prizes will be awarded to the top design,
recognizing your creativity and effort!*

To submit your entries, please fill out the following Google Form:
*Submit Your Entries Here* <https://forms.gle/ui4DRNebZi1LR7xk8>

Further details have been shared in the attached document.

We look forward to seeing your creative submissions!

Best Regards,

- Rikita Chokshi & Trusha Patel

For any query you can contact us...

-- 

Thank You
Ms. Rikita Chokshi
CE Dept, CSPIT,
CHARUSAT-Changa

--

subject: Training and Internship Opportunities to Kick Start Your Journey with Top Notch MNC's
snippet: Dear Students of CHARUSAT. Teachnook is conducting an AICTE APPROVED Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly go through this and join the group as well as fill out the form also ASAP. Register before Slots get
content:
*Dear Students of CHARUSAT.*

Teachnook is conducting an *AICTE APPROVED* Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly
go through this and join the group as well as fill out the form also ASAP.
Register before Slots get filled.



*Greetings!*

*We are pleased to share that our company is collaborating with top Notch
MNCs to offer a unique 2-month Training + Internship  Program. This
advanced program will provide you with the practical skills that you need
to enhance your career.*

 We are enrolling only *LIMITED STUDENTS* in the program.



*It is Mandatory for Interested students to fill out the form, if you get
shortlisted you will get a call from our HR Team:GOOGLE
FORM: https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>*


*To know more information join in WhatsApp group:*

*https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq>*


*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*

*First month:* Training has been designed in the form of Live lectures
along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)
No Prerequisites Required.

*Second month: *Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.

*Project 1:- *10 individual projects are assigned to each intern, which
they must complete with their mentor.

*Project 2:-  *Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a
group of 10-12 interns. For each intern, a particular work will be assigned
to them, and they have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

*Here are two types of Sessions we are providing:*

*1. Blended Program/Recorded Sessions: *You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear them in live doubt-clearing sessions
which will be organized every weekend.

*2. Mentor-led/Live Sessions: *You will be having live Zoom classes after 7
PM for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well
*LMS(Learning Management System)* portal which you will have access to for
6 months.

After Completion of the program, the student shall receive :


[image: ‚úÖ] Program completion certificate issued by MNCs and Verified By
Wipro DICE ID.

[image: ‚úÖ] Co-Branded Internship certificate from Top MNCs.

[image: ‚úÖ] Get certified by CISCO, META, IBM, and Microsoft Certified
Fundamentals.

[image: ‚úÖ] 100% Placement Assistance.

[image: ‚úÖ] Access to a growing community.


  Bipin Shah
Key Account Manager,Teachnook
9364102817
| teachnook.com
| bipin@teachnook.com

subject: Blood Donation Camp on 30/09/2024
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Family, We hope this message finds you well. We are excited to announce a special event that can make a significant impact on the lives of others in our community. CHRF and NSS units of
content:
*Dear CHARUSAT Family,*

We hope this message finds you well. We are excited to announce a special
event that can make a significant impact on the lives of others in our
community. CHRF and NSS units of CHARUSAT, BDIPS, ARIP and MTIN
have organized a Blood donation camp in collaboration with the Lions Club
of Nadiad Mains, and Indian Red Cross Society. We invite each one of you to
participate and contribute to this noble cause.

Blood Donation Camp details are as under:



*Date: 30/09/2024*

*Time: 09:30 am to 3:30 pm*

*Location: Physiotherapy Department, Ground floor, CHRF, CHARUSAT *



Let's come together as a university community and make
this Blood Donation Camp a resounding success. Your contribution can truly
make a life-saving difference.

If you have any questions or need further information, please feel free to
contact the NSS Department.

Thank you for your willingness to participate, we are looking forward to
seeing you at the Blood Donation Camp!

Link for registration into Blood Donation Camp: *(Fill this out on or
before 27/09/2024)*


https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd_asjz8lC4zZHjVyxqu8PSZdZhPSnsSu0RJpj7wDmdhFlEzg/viewform?usp=sf_link



*Kishan Patel*

*NSS Program Coordinator *

*Charusat NSS Cell*

--

subject: EOC Activity by CSPIT[CE] CREATIVE PROJECT IDEAS FOR IMPROVING THE LIVES OF SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE
snippet: Dear All, U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering, CSPIT organizes following Event in step towards helping people having disabilities or Physically Challenged. Title of the Event: "
content:
Dear All,



U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering, CSPIT organizes
following Event in step towards helping people having disabilities or
Physically Challenged.



*Title of the Event:* " CREATIVE PROJECT IDEAS FOR IMPROVING THE LIVES OF
SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE "



Guidelines:



1.    Students may submit their creative working project ideas on
a drawing sheet of paper/PPT/PDF.


Submission Link: https://forms.gle/GUHRx6sLvhYPatmx7


These can be further modified on the day of presentation [*05/10/2024*].

2.    Last Date of Entry Submission: 2nd October, 2024 [Ideas through
online shared google form]. Each student has to make a separate entry using
the shared google form link.

3.    Students may use a pen, pencil, sketch pens or any other tools
[Computer Software/Hardware] to depict their ideas on the day of
presentation [Date: 05/10/2024, Venue: MAC LAB (601), A7 Building].
Participants have to remain present in MAC LAB (601) [A7 Building]
from 09:15 am to 12:00 pm on 05/10/2024, Saturday to present their
project ideas.
Students may use presentation and poster to demonstrate
their project ideas.

4.    Students may show Project Implementation

5.    Students may submit their ideas in a group of maximum 3 students.

6.    Best of the THREE Innovative Ideas will be awarded prize money &
certificate *(First prize 1500 Rs/-, Second Prize 1000 Rs/-, Third Prize
500 Rs/-)*. Others will receive a certificate of participation.



*EOC Department Coordinators are requested to encourage students for
participation.*


*For any further query you may please contact student coordinators (**23CE022
- Devam Bhaveshbhai Ghodasara *and *23CE115 - Priya Babubhai Pedhadiya* *).*



Dhaval Bhoi
Assistant Professor,
U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT, Changa.
Ta-Petlad Dist.Anand
PIN-388421 GUJARAT, INDIA

--

subject: Training and Internship Opportunities to Kick Start Your Journey with Top Notch MNC's
snippet: Dear Students of CHARUSAT. Teachnook is conducting an AICTE APPROVED Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly go through this and join the group as well as fill out the form also ASAP. Register before Slots get
content:
*Dear Students of CHARUSAT.*

Teachnook is conducting an *AICTE APPROVED* Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly
go through this and join the group as well as fill out the form also ASAP.
Register before Slots get filled.



*Greetings!*

*We are pleased to share that our company is collaborating with top Notch
MNCs to offer a unique 2-month Training + Internship  Program. This
advanced program will provide you with the practical skills that you need
to enhance your career.*

 We are enrolling only *LIMITED STUDENTS* in the program.



*It is Mandatory for Interested students to fill out the form, if you get
shortlisted you will get a call from our HR Team:GOOGLE
FORM: https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>*


*To know more information join in WhatsApp group:*

*https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq>*


*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*

*First month:* Training has been designed in the form of Live lectures
along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)
No Prerequisites Required.

*Second month: *Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.

*Project 1:- *10 individual projects are assigned to each intern, which
they must complete with their mentor.

*Project 2:-  *Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a
group of 10-12 interns. For each intern, a particular work will be assigned
to them, and they have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

*Here are two types of Sessions we are providing:*

*1. Blended Program/Recorded Sessions: *You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear them in live doubt-clearing sessions
which will be organized every weekend.

*2. Mentor-led/Live Sessions: *You will be having live Zoom classes after 7
PM for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well
*LMS(Learning Management System)* portal which you will have access to for
6 months.

After Completion of the program, the student shall receive :


[image: ‚úÖ] Program completion certificate issued by MNCs and Verified By
Wipro DICE ID.

[image: ‚úÖ] Co-Branded Internship certificate from Top MNCs.

[image: ‚úÖ] Get certified by CISCO, META, IBM, and Microsoft Certified
Fundamentals.

[image: ‚úÖ] 100% Placement Assistance.

[image: ‚úÖ] Access to a growing community.


*Advaya*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*advaya.pathak@teachnook.com <advaya.pathak@teachnook.com>*

subject: Dear 24ce138, AICTE Approved Industrial Training and Internship Program in from MNC's with 100% Placement Assistance for CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY Students.
snippet: Dear 24ce138, Congratulations on being shortlisted for the Internship Program! We are providing the slots as first come, first serve basis (LIMITED SLOTS UNDER THE SCHOLARSHIP) CONGRATULATIONS TO ALL
content:
Dear 24ce138,
*Congratulations on being shortlisted for the Internship Program!*

We are providing the slots as first come, first serve basis
 (LIMITED SLOTS UNDER THE SCHOLARSHIP)

CONGRATULATIONS TO ALL THE STUDENTS WHO HAVE SUCCESSFULLY GRABBED THE
OPPORTUNITY

 *EMPOWERING FUTURE INNOVATORS: TECHNICAL & NON-TECHNICAL DOMAINS
INTERNSHIP FOR STUDENTS OF CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY*
*Teachnook*, in partnership with (*COGNIZANCE*) *IIT Roorkee*, is thrilled
to announce an exclusive 2-month training and internship program designed
by industrial mentors. We have a limited number of slots available for
enrollment in our program. Secure your slot today before they're all filled!
1. Training

   -

   Professional Mentors: Learn from industry experts.
   -

   From Scratch: Master fundamentals and advanced skills.
   -

   Low Code/No Code: Build applications with minimal coding.
   -

   Generative AI: Develop AI models.
   -

   Prompt Engineering: Design and fine-tune AI prompts.

2. Internship

   -

   10+ Live Projects: Gain real-world experience.
   -

   Capstone Project: Collaborate with MNC.
   -

   Resume Building: Craft a standout resume.
   -

   Mock Interviews: Get feedback from industry experts.
   -

   Masterclasses: Learn from top global company leaders.

Certification

   -

   Course Certificate: From IIT Roorkee Cognizance.
   -

   Internship Certificate: From MNC's.
   -

   Verified by WIPRO Dice ID: Credible and valuable credentials


                                            *To ensure your participation
and make the most out of this opportunity, please make sure to fill out the
application form: *



                                                              *APPLY NOW*
<https://forms.gle/9XsJhRHre43dP6oT9>


*We look forward to your active participation in the Training and
Internship Program under Teachnook in Collaboration with IIT Roorkee
Cognizant. This is an excellent chance for you to broaden your horizons and
take a step towards a successful career. For any inquiries or assistance,
feel free to contact us.*

*JOIN THIS GROUP AFTER FILLING THE FORM:*
*OFFICIAL GROUP LINK- *
*JOIN NOW* <https://chat.whatsapp.com/D8G5mg8oUhmJCOJInFpaQd>



*Best regards,*

subject: Apply for Start-up Gujarat Seed Fund (30 Lakhs-40 Lakhs) via CIVF
snippet: Dear Start-up, As you know CIVF (CHARUSAT Innovative Ventures Foundation)- a section-8 company of Charusat University has been officially recognized as a Nodal Institute by the Industries
content:
Dear Start-up,
As you know CIVF (CHARUSAT Innovative Ventures Foundation)- a section-8
company of Charusat University has been officially recognized as a *Nodal
Institute* by the *Industries Commissionerate, Govt. of Gujarat*. We invite
you to apply for a seed grant to fuel your growth and innovation. Don't
miss this opportunity to accelerate your startup journey! (Find the scheme
document as *Ann-1*)

As a Nodal Institute, CIVF can now offer the following support:

   - Assistance up to *INR 30 lakh* as a *seed support* to the startups.
   - Sustenance allowance of *INR 20,000 per month *to the startups and *INR
   25,000 per month* to *women-led startups* for a period of one year.
   - Additional assistance up to *INR 10 lakh *for the startups generating
   significant impact on the society. Thus seed support extends to up to INR
   40 lakhs.
   - Assistance up to *INR 1 lakh* per startup for obtaining* training in
   soft skills *on a reimbursement basis.
   - Assistance up to *INR 3 lakh* to enroll and participate in
   national/international recognized *acceleration programs.*
   - Additional 1% Interest Subsidy, maximum up to* 9% on term loans* to
   applicants under the scheme's provisions for assistance to MSMEs.

The application process is as Under:

1. Read the eligibility criteria of the scheme. (Product/service should be
innovative, Company should be registered and the Start-up should be based
in Gujarat) *(*Refer to detailed eligibility criteria in* Ann-2)*

2. Fill out the form based on the benefit you want to avail. (Find all
applicable forms in the attachment as *Ann-3, Ann-4, Ann-5 & Ann-6. *Take
the pdf content of the application form in Word, enter the details in soft
copy, take print and sign and stamp on hard copy and send the original file
at CIVF- 209, IIIM)

2. Pitch deck presentation in front of CIVF Internal Committee.

3. CIVF will recommend the selected start-ups to Industries Commissionerate
for seed grant or other benefits.

4. If approved at the SLEC committee of  *Industries Commissionerate*, the
grant will be given to NI (i.e. CIVF) and be disbursed to start-up in
tranches based on your milestones.

All the Very Best and Feel free to seek further information.

*Deadline: 01/10/2024 till 12:30 PM*

Note: "Please share the above information with eligible start-up founders
to ensure that the deserving candidates can benefit from the government
scheme."
*Regards,*

*Dr. Swati Joshi, *
*Senior Executive Officer (SEO), *
*CHARUSAT Innovative Ventures Foundation (CIVF), **209, IIIM,*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT) *
*CHANGA - 388 421 *
*GUJARAT - INDIA *

*Contact no.: +91- 7383491911*
*E-mail: seo@civf.co.in <http://seo@civf.co.in/swatijoshi@civf.co.in>*

--

subject: AICTE Approved Internship to Get Certified by CISCO, META, IBM to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT* Student, *Applause for being shortlisted for the internship
program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here  üëâ*   *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq








*Top Preferred Courses:‚úÖ Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine
Learning.‚úÖ Cloud Computing.‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.

*Third month:* Based on your enactment during the first two months of the
program, we will conduct a technical interview in the same company during
the third month. You will be offered a stipend-based Internship if you
perform well in the interview.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :‚úÖ Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.‚úÖ The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.‚úÖ Admittance to a growth community.*


*Warisha*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*warisha.nouman@teachnook.com <warisha.nouman@teachnook.com>*

Dear Students from CHARUSAT
Greetings from *Corizo*!

*Corizo* is proud to collaborate with industry giants like* Deloitte, KPMG,
Amazon, IBM, Goldman Sachs *and esteemed academic partners such as *NIT,
VIT, BIT, SRM, DYPU *to extend a warm invitation to applicants at
CHARUSAT Internship
programs across various domains in engineering, management, and science
backgrounds.

In these challenging times, practical learning is more crucial than ever.
Everyone is actively seeking internships and training experiences. Here's a
golden opportunity to gain insights directly from industry professionals.

As we near the completion of our campaign at  CHARUSAT  for the Summer
Campaign,
we encourage you to register using the "Apply Now" link for in-depth
discussions with our student counselor. Your decision-making process can
then be well-informed.

Act fast! This exclusive offer is limited to the first 10 registrations for
the batch. Click the link below to proceed:

*Form link: *https://forms.gle/tki52NqFCE82dmNbA

This is a comprehensive 2-month online Training + Internship Program
facilitated by industry experts with 15+ years of experience!!!

*1st Month:*

*¬∑       Theoretical learning from Industrial Experts.*

*¬∑       Live interactive sessions.*

*¬∑       Doubt clearing sessions.*

*¬∑       Weekly 4-5 sessions via Zoom or Google Meet.*

*2nd Month:*

*¬∑       Application of concepts learned in the first month.*

*¬∑       Real-time Projects with proper mentor assistance, to build an
attractive resume.*

*¬∑       Minor Project - Individual (07 days).*

*¬∑       Major Project - Group (21 days).*

*3rd Month:*

*¬∑       Placement Assistance (100% Guarantee) [Multiple sessions of Mock
Interview, Group Discussion, Resume building, and Personality Development,
Placement Assistance will be given to you, which will make you stand out in
the placement procedure.]*

*Perks:*

*¬∑       Internship Completion certificate from Hiring Partners
collaboration with Corizo.*

*¬∑       Course completion certificate from Corizo And ISO Certified.*

*¬∑       Letter Of Recommendation From MNCs for Job reference.*

*Benefits:*

*¬∑       100% Guaranteed Internship provided by our hiring partners from
MNC‚ÄôS.*

*¬∑       Certificates From Hiring Partners (most valued certification).*

*¬∑       Training by Industry Certified Professionals with live Mentorship.*

*¬∑       Opportunity to work on Major and Minor Projects mentored and
curated by Corporate Trainers.*

*¬∑       Access to exclusive course content prepared by top-notch Industry
Experts.*

*¬∑       Hands-on Professional Experience.*

*¬∑       Lifetime access to the Growth community.*

The entire program is supervised by industry experts from our affiliated
MNCs who will guide you through your projects with the help of a planned
curriculum as well as their personal experiences.

Learn Boldly & Inspire. Get An Education, Not Just A Degree.

Note: Apply Referral Code *CORIZO@30* to Avail a Discount. Moreover,
students can choose their comfortable month to start the Internship.

Looking forward to an enriching learning experience together!



Best Regards,

Corizo Team

subject: AICTE Approved Internship to Get Certified by CISCO, META, IBM to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT* Student, *Applause for being shortlisted for the internship
program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here  üëâ*   *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq









*Top Preferred Courses:‚úÖ Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine
Learning.‚úÖ Cloud Computing.‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.

*Third month:* Based on your enactment during the first two months of the
program, we will conduct a technical interview in the same company during
the third month. You will be offered a stipend-based Internship if you
perform well in the interview.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :‚úÖ Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.‚úÖ The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.‚úÖ Admittance to a growth community.*


*Warisha*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*warisha.nouman@teachnook.com <warisha.nouman@teachnook.com>*

subject: Re: CSPIT 2024 State Quota (ACPC) Admission : MYSY Documents Submission / Verification
snippet: Dear CSPIT Students, Please ignore the earlier email. All students are requested to submit MYSY for the students admitted in the year 2024 under STATE QUOTA at CSPIT ADMIN OFFICE ‚Äì Room No 101 rather
content:
Dear CSPIT Students,

Please ignore the earlier email.

All students are requested to submit MYSY  for the students admitted in the
year 2024 *under STATE QUOTA* at *CSPIT** ADMIN
OFFICE  ‚Äì Room No 101 rather than 102A.*


On Sat, Sep 21, 2024 at 4:17‚ÄØPM Yatin Talati <yatintalati.lib@charusat.ac.in>
wrote:

> Dear CSPIT Students,
>
> As per trailing email, all students are requested to submit MYSY documents submission / verification for
> Renewal and Delayed (students admitted in the year 2021, 2022 and 2023) at
> *CSPIT** ADMIN OFFICE  ‚Äì Room No 101 rather than 102A.*
>
> On Wed, Sep 18, 2024 at 9:26‚ÄØAM Yatin Talati <
> yatintalati.lib@charusat.ac.in> wrote:
>
>> Dear CSPIT Students,
>>
>> We are pleased to inform you that MYSY documents submission /
>> verification start for the students admitted in the year 2024 *under
>> STATE QUOTA at CSPIT EE/EC Building ‚Äì UIIC office, Room No 102A.*
>>
>> *For fresh students admitted in the year 2024 under Management Quota OR
>> Vacant Quota will be intimated soon.*
>>
>>  *Please take a note of the following points before submitting
>> the documents:*
>>
>> A.  Lock the Application and take printout of form. *P**rint out of
>> Application form from the WhatsApp image is not acceptable. *
>>
>> B.  All uploaded scan documents *must be clearly visible**.*
>>
>> C.  Submit the application form with photocopies of all uploaded
>> documents *(except IT Form). *
>>
>> D. Please upload a fee receipt which contains *Revenue Stamp and sign by
>> the Account Section of CHARUSAT. *
>>
>> E. Students must write *Enrolment Number (ID No.) in the MYSY form. *
>>
>> F. Upload Sahay renewal certificate *(Will get through your e governance
>> login) *from head of institute *in original with sign of Principal Sir
>> (Not blank). *
>>
>> *G. **Write barcode ID at the top of the form* which will help us to
>> retrieve the data immediately.
>>
>> *Special Note:*
>>
>> 1.      Students are requested to *just drop the application in the tray
>> placed at UIIC office.*
>>
>> 2.      To save time, *there is no need to stay at UIIC office, timely
>> appropriate action will be taken by us.*
>>
>> 3.      University shall remain closed from 25th October 2024 (Friday)
>> to 5th November 2024 (Tuesday) during the Diwali Festival.
>>
>>
>>       *REFER MYSY SITE FOR MORE INFO. (**http://mysy.guj.nic.in
>> <http://mysy.guj.nic.in/>**)*
>> --
>> Thanks,
>> *Yatin Talati*
>>
>> Accredited Grade ‚ÄúA+‚Äù by NAAC, GOI
>>
>> Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
>> Off. Nadiad - Petlad Highway, Changa, Gujarat, INDIA 388421

snippet: Dear FYCE/IT/CSE/EC/AIML Students, Please find the "Seating arrangement for the first semester midterm exam" in the attachment. Note: Students are required to adhere to the seating
content:
Dear *FYCE/IT/CSE/EC/AIML* Students,

Please find the "Seating arrangement for the first semester midterm exam" in
the attachment.

*Note:*


   - Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in
   the email attachment.
   - Students are required to uphold decorum in the examination hall.
   Mobile phones, smartwatches, or any other electronic devices are strictly
   prohibited within the exam hall. Bags must be left outside, and it is
   mandatory to wear an ID card (if available).
   - Students have to take their seat in the exam hall at least 15
   minutes prior to the exam time.
   - The exam will conduct in the CMPICA building.

Thank you.

*Dr. Sagar Chokshi,*

subject: Final Batch Allocation for AICTE-Approved Advanced training and Internship Program
snippet: Dear Student of Charotar University of Science and Technology, We are pleased to inform you that you have been shortlisted for the AICTE-approved Internship Program offered in collaboration with
content:
Dear Student of* Charotar University of Science and Technology*,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been *shortlisted* for the
AICTE-approved Internship Program offered in collaboration with
Cognizance, *IIT
Roorkee*. This opportunity is for the *October-November Batch*, and we
encourage you to secure your spot as soon as possible, as this is the* Final
batch allocated for your university*.

*Program Overview*
The program is a comprehensive *2-month Training + Internship* designed to
provide hands-on experience and professional mentorship. It is open to all
departments, though availability is limited.

*Application Deadline: 21/09/2024, till 11.59 PM (Final 10 Slots Remaining)*
*Click here to apply* <https://forms.gle/g9FSBC8THfCWzQW37>

*Program Structure*

   -

   *First Month:*
   Training includes live lectures and mentorship from industry
   professionals. Upon registration, you will receive login credentials to
   access the learning platform.
   - *Project 1:* Complete 10 individual projects under the supervision of
      your mentor.
   -

   *Second Month:*
   A fully mentored internship focusing on real-world projects with
   guidance from professionals:
   - *Project 2:* Engage in a Capstone Group Project with specific roles
      assigned to each intern.

*Program Benefits*

   - Certificate of Completion verified by DICE ID powered by WIPRO and *IIT
   Roorkee Cognizance*.
   - Internship Certificate from top MNCs with *Wipro Dice ID verification*.
   - 6-month access to the *Learning Management System (LMS)*.
   - Membership to the *Growth Community* with placement assistance.
   - 24/7 personalized mentorship.
   - Complimentary sessions on *Generative AI & Prompt Engineering*.
   - Guidance on *Low Code & No Code applications*.
   - Live doubt-clearing sessions with industry experts.
   - Guest lectures featuring professionals from *Microsoft & Meta*.

To secure your participation in this prestigious program, kindly complete
the *application form* at your earliest convenience.

*Apply Now* <https://forms.gle/g9FSBC8THfCWzQW37> ‚Äì *Last 10 slots
available!*

Please note: *If you have already enrolled, you may disregard this email.*

We look forward to your participation in this exciting opportunity.

Warm regards,
*Teachnook*
In Collaboration with *IIT Roorkee Cognizance*

subject: Reminder: Invitation to "InnoTech 1.0" Project and Research Expo ‚Äì Tomorrow!

content:

This is a gentle reminder about the *"InnoTech 1.0"* project and research
expo organized by the *U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering*.
We are excited to have you join us *tomorrow, 21st September 2024*, from *10:00
AM to 1:00 PM* at *A7 Building*, *Computer Engineering Department*.

Below is the original invitation from our professor:
