From: Ronak R Patel <ronakrpatel.ce@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Sep 17, 2024 at 12:38‚ÄØPM
Subject: Reg: Invitation to visit "InnoTech 1.0" on 21st September 2024
To: <24ce@charusat.edu.in>, <23ce@charusat.edu.in>, <22ce@charusat.edu.in>,
<23pgce@charusat.edu.in>, <24pgce@charusat.edu.in>
Cc: Head CE CHARUSAT <hod.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Deep Kothadiya <
deepkothadiya.ce@charusat.ac.in>



Dear All,

We are pleased to invite you to *"InnoTech 1.0,"* a project and research
expo organized by the* U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering*.
The event is scheduled for *21st September 2024* from *10:00 AM to 1:00 PM*
 at *A7 Building, Computer Engineering Department*.

This exciting event will feature the work of over 100+ students, showcasing
innovative projects and research across diverse fields in computer
engineering. *"InnoTech 1.0*" aims to provide a platform for students to
present their ideas, exchange knowledge, and engage with professionals from
the industry.

We would be honored to have you visit the expo, interact with our
students.. Your presence will undoubtedly inspire and motivate our students
as they prepare for their professional journeys. It will be a great
opportunity for them to learn from your expertise and understand the
expectations of the industry.

We look forward to your participation in making this event a success and
contributing to the growth and development of our future engineers.

Thank you for considering our invitation. We hope to see you at *"InnoTech
1.0."*

--
*Thanks & Regards *
*-----------------------------------*

*Ronak R Patel,*

*Assistant Professor,*
*U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,*
*Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,*
*CHARUSAT, Changa, Gujarat - 388421*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC*

content:
Dear Students,

We would like to inform you about an important update regarding the
upcoming GitHub Workshop.

Students who have secured late admission in the 2nd and 3rd round of ACPC
and are scheduled to attend the extra session of *MSUD101 Engineering
Mathematics* this Saturday are *not required to attend the GitHub Workshop.*

We understand the importance of both sessions, and this decision has been
made to ensure that you can focus on your academic commitments without any
conflict.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

subject: Batch Allocation for AICTE-Approved Advanced training and Internship Program
snippet: Dear Student of Charotar University of Science and Technology, We are pleased to inform you that you have been shortlisted for the AICTE-approved Internship Program offered in collaboration with
content:
Dear Student of* Charotar University of Science and Technology*,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been *shortlisted* for the
AICTE-approved Internship Program offered in collaboration with
Cognizance, *IIT
Roorkee*. This opportunity is for the *October-November Batch*, and we
encourage you to secure your spot as soon as possible, as this is the
*First** batch allocated for your university*.

*Program Overview*
The program is a comprehensive *2-month Training + Internship* designed to
provide hands-on experience and professional mentorship. It is open to all
departments, though availability is limited.

*Application Deadline: 20/09/2024, till 11.59 PM (Final 20 Slots Remaining)*
*Click here to apply* <https://forms.gle/g9FSBC8THfCWzQW37>

*Program Structure*

   -

   *First Month:*
   Training includes live lectures and mentorship from industry
   professionals. Upon registration, you will receive login credentials to
   access the learning platform.
   - *Project 1:* Complete 10 individual projects under the supervision of
      your mentor.
   -

   *Second Month:*
   A fully mentored internship focusing on real-world projects with
   guidance from professionals:
   - *Project 2:* Engage in a Capstone Group Project with specific roles
      assigned to each intern.

*Program Benefits*

   - Certificate of Completion verified by DICE ID powered by WIPRO and *IIT
   Roorkee Cognizance*.
   - Internship Certificate from top MNCs with *Wipro Dice ID verification*.
   - 6-month access to the *Learning Management System (LMS)*.
   - Membership to the *Growth Community* with placement assistance.
   - 24/7 personalized mentorship.
   - Complimentary sessions on *Generative AI & Prompt Engineering*.
   - Guidance on *Low Code & No Code applications*.
   - Live doubt-clearing sessions with industry experts.
   - Guest lectures featuring professionals from *Microsoft & Meta*.

To secure your participation in this prestigious program, kindly complete
the *application form* at your earliest convenience.

*Apply Now* <https://forms.gle/g9FSBC8THfCWzQW37> ‚Äì *Last 20 slots
available!*

Please note: *If you have already enrolled, you may disregard this email.*

We look forward to your participation in this exciting opportunity.

Warm regards,
*Teachnook*
In Collaboration with *IIT Roorkee Cognizance*

subject: Internship Opportunity: Adorebits - Internship Opportunities EUCC Malta Country Tech Development Partner
snippet: Dear Students, There is a work-from-home internship opportunity specifically for those who want to be entrepreneurs or further study abroad. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Adore Bits <
content:
*Dear Students,*
*There is a work-from-home internship opportunity specifically for those
who want to be entrepreneurs or further study abroad.*

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Adore Bits <contact@adorebits.com>
Date: Thu, Sep 19, 2024 at 2:29‚ÄØPM
Subject: EUCC Malta Country Tech Development Partner - Adorebits -
Internship Opportunities
To: niravbhattit <niravbhatt.it@charusat.ac.in>


üåü *Kickstart Your Career with Adorebits Technology Internship!* üåü

Are you ready to dive into the world of cutting-edge technology and
real-world business development? üöÄ Join Adorebits Technology, where
innovation meets opportunity!

Recognized as one of India‚Äôs Fastest Growing Hot 100 Innovative Technology
Companies and a technical partner of global names like the Chartered
Institute of Marketing, UK and EUCC - Malta Country, Adorebits is your
gateway to the future. With over 9 years of expertise in Blockchain, AI/ML,
and more, we‚Äôre reshaping industries‚Äîand now, we want YOU to be part of
this exciting journey!

üéØ *Why Choose Adorebits Technology?*

1. *Real-World Learning*: Gain hands-on experience in live international
projects, working with the latest in *Business Development*, Brand
Management, Digital Marketing, and more.
2. *Work from Anywhere*: Enjoy the flexibility of a *remote internship*,
fitting work into your schedule wherever you are.
3. *Expert Mentorship*: Learn from seasoned professionals featured in
*Economic Times and Yourstory*.
4. *People-Centric Culture*: Thrive in a collaborative, intern-friendly
environment where your voice matters!
5. *5 Days a Week Culture*: Embrace a balanced workweek with weekends off.
6. *Work-Life Balance*: Benefit from a supportive environment that values
your personal well-being.
7. *Flexible Working Time*: Adapt your working hours to fit your schedule.
8. *Live Client Work Exposure*: Gain real-world experience by working
directly with clients on impactful projects.

üí° *What You‚Äôll Learn*:
- Gain practical experience in Business Development, Brand Management,
Digital Marketing, and more.
- Tackle real-world challenges and solutions in a global tech company.

üíº *An Unpaid, Yet Priceless Experience*:
While the internship is unpaid, the quality of learning and global exposure
is invaluable. You‚Äôll build a portfolio of live, impactful projects,
setting yourself apart in the competitive tech world. On successful
completion of the internship, a certificate will be awarded.

If you‚Äôre passionate about tech, innovation, and growth, this is your
chance to stand out!

üîó *Apply Now*: https://forms.gle/aausA1rGeEtMiTio7

Let‚Äôs spread the word! Share this opportunity with your network and help
connect enthusiastic candidates with a future in tech! For queries, reach
out at contact@adorebits.com.

üåç Adorebits ‚Äì Where Innovation and Opportunity Meet!

-
Regards
HR Team
Adorebits Technology











-- 
*Regards,*

*Nirav Bhatt*

--

subject: Steps to access WiFi Internet on laptop and computer labs
snippet: Dear New Students... To access wifi internet, please follow under mentioned steps: 1:- open URL http://egov.charusat (Open URL within campus only) 2:- Login with your egovernance ID and Password 3:-
content:
Dear New Students...

To access wifi internet, please follow under mentioned steps:

1:-   open URL http://egov.charusat  (Open URL within campus only)
2:-   Login with your egovernance ID and Password
3:-   Top left cornet (3 horizontal bar) go to settings
4:-   Select "Internet WiFi password change"
5:-   You may set a strong password for your internet access. With the help
of your student ID and Wi-Fi password, you can access the internet from
permitted computer labs and on your laptop. (WiFI on mobile is restricted)

To access WiFi from Laptop, connect to either CHARUSAT WiFi or WINCell SSID
with password "charusat"

You may also get a better idea with the attached video.

*Best Regards*


*Ritesh Bhatt *Head Datacenter, WIN-Cell
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
Accredited *Grade 'A+'* by NAAC

At. Changa 388 421, Ta. Petlad,
Dist. Anand
O: +912697-265106 / 07

--

subject: Reg : Student Achievement Data Entry [ June-Dec : A.Y 2024-25 ]
snippet: Dear Students, This is to inform you that if you are going for any kind of event (For eg Technical event/hackathon, Sports, Co-curricular, Extra activities, Research Paper Publication) in charusat or
content:
Dear Students,


This is to inform you that if you are going for any kind of event (*For
e.g. Technical event/**hackathon, Sports, Co-**curricular, Extra
activities, Research Paper Publication*) in charusat or outside charusat
and secure any position, then make an entry in e-governance module as per
said below.


*This will help us to recognize and appreciate the students for the
department, institute and university.*


*Students will be recognized through the social media platforms of charusat
university, institute, and department and put on
the Student Achievement Board of the department every month.*


*How to apply :*

1. From Student's Login>>E-Governance Module>>Students>>*Event
Participation Entry*
2. From Counsellor's Login>> E-Governance Module>>Student
Counselling>>*Student Event
Approval*

These modules manage *P**ost Event Participation data* of students. i.e.
once a student(s) participates in an event, Student/Team-leaders have to
make an entry in e-Governance by logging into their e-Governance account.

*General Process Flow:*

   1. Student/Team-leader has to make an entry in the "Event Participation
   Entry" Module (Path: Student Login>>E-Governance Module>>Students>>Event
   Participation Entry).
   2. In case of participation is *in a group/Team*, the *Team
   Leader student* has to make an entry and he/she has to enter ID's of
   other students in the application. All students who have participated in
   the event will be notified through the email after submission of event data.
   3. Once the student makes an entry, his/her counsellor will be notified
   through an email.
   4. The Counselor will verify the entry along with the uploaded documents
   by reviewing the original documents. The e-Governance system will
   communicate with the student/ Team-Leader to meet counselors for
   verification of documents.
   5.  An email will be sent to the student on approval of the entry. Only
   the approved entries will be considered for the student attendance
   compensation.

*Students are requested to do timely entry
for student event achievement and inform your respective counselors too.*

Fill up the *Google form* <https://forms.gle/1SXrdoUtNbYG8Duy8> for the
same and submit the required data.

*Note :*
*In case of any student achievement first notify your counsellor and apply
in e-governance.*


-- 

Thank You
Ms. Rikita Chokshi
CE Dept, CSPIT,
CHARUSAT-Changa

--

subject: Reg: Medical Leave Application and Documents
snippet: Dear all Students, Kindly follow these rules: minimum 3 days of medical leave should be applied at a time. maximum 45 days of medical leave can be availed for a semester. Within 7 days after joining
content:
Dear all Students,
Kindly follow these rules:

   - minimum 3 days of medical leave should be applied at a time.
   - maximum 45 days of medical leave can be availed for a semester.
   - *Within 7 days after joining the college, students have to submit the
   medical leave application in the e-governance system & submit all the
   original proof to their counselor for approval. *
   - *After the 7-day medical application will be rejected*

1) For a duration less than one week, students have to bring only a medical
certificate.
2) For a duration of more than one week, students have to submit a medical
certificate along with other documents like a doctor's prescription or
medical report
3) For more than 45 days, students need to write an application to get
sanctioned by the principal sir.



-- 
*Thanks & Regards,*
*Parmanand Patel*
Assistant Professor,
U & P U Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,Changa,Anand-388421.
www.charusat.ac.in

--

subject: Supercharge Your Career with IEEE ‚Äì Student Branch Recruitment Open!!
snippet: Dear CSPIT Students, We're excited to invite you to join the IEEE CSPIT Student Branch 2024-25, a platform designed to help you grow both academically and professionally. Whether you're looking
content:
Dear CSPIT Students,

We‚Äôre excited to invite you to join the *IEEE CSPIT Student Branch* 2024-25,
a platform designed to help you grow both *academically* and
*professionally*. Whether you're looking to gain hands-on experience, build
your resume, or expand your network, IEEE has something for you!

*What is IEEE?*

IEEE is the world‚Äôs largest technical professional organization. Our
Student Branches are university-based groups that offer opportunities for
career development, technical learning, leadership experience, and
networking within fields of engineering and related disciplines.
Why Join the IEEE Student Branch?

   1.

   *Build Your Resume with Projects and Skills*
   Participate in technical projects, workshops, and hackathons that
   provide *real-world experience* in areas like AI, Robotics, and Software
   Development. These projects will help you showcase your skills to future
   employers.
   2.

   *Exclusive Networking Opportunities*
   Connect with *industry professionals*, *mentors*, and peers from around
   the world. These connections can open doors for internships, jobs, and
   career advice.
   3.

   *Leadership Experience*
   Take on leadership roles within the branch to develop your *management,
   team-building*, and *communication skills*‚Äîall valuable assets for your
   resume.
   4.

   *Access to Global Competitions and Events*
   Participate in global events like *IEEE Xtreme* and attend IEEE
   conferences. These are great opportunities to demonstrate your abilities
   and enhance your *professional profile*.
   5.

   *Resources to Stay Ahead*
   Gain access to the *IEEE Xplore* digital library and other exclusive
   IEEE resources, giving you an edge in coursework, research, and beyond.

------------------------------
Join One of Our Teams

As part of the IEEE Student Branch, you can also choose to join one of our
three specialized teams, based on your interests:

   - *Creative Media Team*: Get involved with content creation, graphic
   design, and social media, helping us promote our branch activities.
   - *Event Handling Team*: Plan, organize, and manage events like
   workshops and networking sessions, gaining valuable event management
   experience.
   - *Branch Representatives Team*: Act as a bridge between the branch and
   students, boosting engagement and awareness of our events.

If you do not want to be part of any of these 3 teams, but still want to be
part of *IEEE CSPIT SB* then you can always be a *Volunteer.*
Each of these teams offers you a great way to contribute, build skills, and
work closely with fellow students.
------------------------------
How to Join

Interested? It‚Äôs easy! Simply fill out the below google form and we will
call you for the selection process.

https://forms.gle/DMW9ZJh8hpv2eQG47

The Selection process consists of an interview round with the Executive
Committee of IEEE CSPIT SB and Faculty Advisor Harshul Yagnik Sir.

Once you fill out the google form you will be called for the interview
round and the allotments to specific teams will follow.

If you have any questions or want to learn more, feel free to reach out to
us at ieee.charusatsb@gmail.com or contact us on WhatsApp -

*Sakshi Shah [21CS064] - 9429866748*

Don‚Äôt miss this chance to boost your career and be part of a global network!


Looking Forward to have you onboard,
IEEE CSPIT SB 2024-25
[image: image.png]

subject: CSPIT 2024 State Quota (ACPC) Admission : MYSY Documents Submission / Verification
snippet: Dear CSPIT Students, We are pleased to inform you that MYSY documents submission / verification start for the students admitted in the year 2024 under STATE QUOTA at CSPIT EE/EC Building ‚Äì UIIC office,
content:
Dear CSPIT Students,

We are pleased to inform you that MYSY documents submission / verification
start for the students admitted in the year 2024 *under STATE QUOTA
at CSPIT EE/EC Building ‚Äì UIIC office, Room No 102A.*

*For fresh students admitted in the year 2024 under Management Quota OR
Vacant Quota will be intimated soon.*

 *Please take a note of the following points before submitting
the documents:*

A.  Lock the Application and take printout of form. *P**rint out of
Application form from the WhatsApp image is not acceptable. *

B.  All uploaded scan documents *must be clearly visible**.*

C.  Submit the application form with photocopies of all uploaded
documents *(except
IT Form). *

D. Please upload a fee receipt which contains *Revenue Stamp and sign by
the Account Section of CHARUSAT. *

E. Students must write *Enrolment Number (ID No.) in the MYSY form. *

F. Upload Sahay renewal certificate *(Will get through your e governance
login) *from head of institute *in original with sign of Principal Sir (Not
blank). *

*G. **Write barcode ID at the top of the form* which will help us to
retrieve the data immediately.

*Special Note:*

1.      Students are requested to *just drop the application in the tray
placed at UIIC office.*

2.      To save time, *there is no need to stay at UIIC office, timely
appropriate action will be taken by us.*

3.      University shall remain closed from 25th October 2024 (Friday) to 5
th November 2024 (Tuesday) during the Diwali Festival.


      *REFER MYSY SITE FOR MORE INFO. (**http://mysy.guj.nic.in
<http://mysy.guj.nic.in/>**)*
--
Thanks,
*Yatin Talati*

Accredited Grade ‚ÄúA+‚Äù by NAAC, GOI

Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Off. Nadiad - Petlad Highway, Changa, Gujarat, INDIA 388421
www.charusat.ac.in

subject: Contest : Creative Name of CSPIT Newsletter
snippet: Dear CSPIT Student(s), Greetings!! We are pleased to announce the creative contest, "Name the CSPIT Newsletter" organized by the Internal Quality Assurance Cell (IQAC), Chandubhai S. Patel
content:
*Dear CSPIT Student(s),*


Greetings!!



We are pleased to announce the creative contest, *"Name the CSPIT
Newsletter"* organized by the Internal Quality Assurance Cell (IQAC),
Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology (CSPIT), CHARUSAT.



We are preparing to launch our very first newsletter in *December 2024*, to
be published *quarterly* every year. The CSPIT Newsletter will highlight
students‚Äô achievements, research, campus events, etc.



For this newsletter, we invite all current students to suggest a creative
name that perfectly captures the *spirit, innovation, and academic
excellence* *of CSPIT. *



*Salient features of the Contest:*


   1. The Contest is open from *September 23, 2024*, *12.01 AM* *to **September
   30, 2024, 11:59 PM**. *
   2. The best 3 names will be selected by the Scrutiny Committee. Winners
   will receive acknowledgement in the Inaugural newsletter, a certificate
   of appreciation and prize money.
   3. The Prize money for the First three entries will be distributed as
   follows:


   - 1st Prize ‚Äì Rs. 2,500
   - 2nd prize ‚Äì Rs. 1,500
   - 3rd prize ‚Äì Rs. 1,000

Participants can submit their submissions through the Registration QR Code. For
more information like registration, eligibility and submission guidelines,
important dates, selection process, intellectual property rights,  and
other terms and conditions, please refer to the attached Brochure of
this contest.



For any queries, please contact the Coordinators of the Contest:



Ms. Trusha Patel (trushagajjar.ce@charusat.ac.in)

Dr. V. R. Panchal (vijaypanchal.cv@charusat.ac.in)



Thank you for being a part of this contest.



We look forward to seeing your creativity.


With best wishes


Trushit Upadhyaya

-- 
I/c Principal
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology
Faculty of Technology & Engineering
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
CHARUSAT Campus, Changa, 388421
Petlad, Anand
Gujarat, India.

--

subject: Fwd: Regarding Antiragging Affidavit 2024-25
snippet: Dear students, Please find below the anti-ragging affidavit registration process for AY 2024-25. You are informed to complete it by on or before 23/09/2024. Kindly find the revised process for filing
content:
Dear students,


Please find below the anti-ragging affidavit registration process for AY
2024-25. You are informed to complete it by on or before 23/09/2024.



Kindly find the revised process for filing the anti-ragging affidavit.



Step-1: Go to http://www.antiragging.in/affidavit_university_form.php read
yourself and make sure your parents also have read and understood the AICTE
regulations on curbing the menace of ragging. Confirm and agree that you
will not engage in ragging in any form.





Step-2: Fill in the information as desired and submit the form. Read and
confirm that you and your parents have read and understood the AICTE
regulations


Step-3: On successful completion, you will receive an email regarding the
reference number and web link where you will be able to check your
registration status.



Step-4: *(Use charusat Email id only) *You need to submit the Reference ID
of your submitted form in the following sheet :



https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ReIX4xfR4sDf8n-6vKcZ76zXIoXZHZvnun26fzB_nSc/edit?usp=sharing



Step-5: Go to http://www.antiragging.in/undertaking_request.php and *generate
an undertaking document. Take a print of it. Put your signature and your
parent's signature and submit the hard copy of it to the following
antiragging student coordinators. The coordinators will submit it to me on
24/09/2023. For any query also you may contact them.*


*Student Coordinators:*



*1) Vishwa Bhalodiya (23CE007)2) Ishan Shastri  (24CE115)*



[Reference ID can be found in your mail received from the anti-ragging
 committee.]



*Refer to this information for filling up the online affidavit [*University
Director/Vice Chancellor/Institute Principal]*:*



*Principal Name:* Dr. Trushit Upadhyaya

*College Phone Number:* 02697-247500

*Nearest Police station:* Mehlav



You *must have to add* your Anti-ragging undertaking Ref. No.  in the
e-Governance system in the Student Login. Students can enter the generated
anti-ragging IDs from Student counseling details as follows:





[image: image.png]



Counselors can get the IDs in the following report as well as in the
Student Listing Report:



[image: image.png]


Dhaval Bhoi
Assistant Professor,
U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT, Changa.
Ta-Petlad Dist.Anand
PIN-388421 GUJARAT, INDIA

--

subject: ULSC logo competition!
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to announce the Digital Logo Making Competition for the students of CHARUSAT. This is a unique opportunity to showcase your creativity and design skills while contributing
content:
Dear Students,

We are excited to announce the Digital Logo Making Competition for the
students of CHARUSAT. This is a unique opportunity to showcase your
creativity and design skills while contributing to an important aspect of
our student governance body.

*Competition Details:*
*Theme : *Design a logo that represents the values, vision, and mission of
the University level Central Students Council(ULSC).
*Eligibility : *Open to all students of CHARUSAT.
*Submission Format :* Logo designs must be created digitally and submitted
in .PNG or .JPEG format (high resolution).
*Submission Deadline : 22th September, 2024*

   - *VISION: - *To build an inclusive student community that fosters
   academic excellence, cultural enrichment, leadership, and holistic
   development.
   - *VALUES: - *We value inclusivity, collaboration, and excellence in all
   endeavors. Leadership, integrity, innovation, and student well-being are at
   the core of our actions.
   - MISSION: - Our mission is to provide opportunities for students to
   grow academically, culturally, and personally, promote teamwork and
   leadership, and advocate for student needs to create a supportive
   university environment.

*Google Form: *https://forms.gle/VEQhCobuiNDhT7ri8
Submit your entries here

Further details have been shared in the document attached below.

We look forward to seeing your creative submissions!

Best regards,

*Convener*


*University Level Central Students Council*

*CHARUSAT.*

--

subject: PPT format for the Shark Tank Students' Competition 2024.
snippet: Dear Students, An event titled "The Shark Tank Students' Competition 2024" is organized by MS Patel Department of Civil Engineering, inspired by the popular TV show Shark Tank. The event
content:
Dear Students,

An event titled* "The Shark Tank Students' Competition 2024"* is organized
by M. S. Patel Department of Civil Engineering, *inspired by the popular TV
show Shark Tank*. The event is scheduled for September 21, 2024. The event
is open to all year students enrolled in the CSPIT.

The event allows students to showcase their start-up plans in front of a
panel of judges/jury members (drawn from the faculty members of IIIM,
CHARUSAT). The event aims to foster an entrepreneurial spirit among the
students, amplify their business strategies and learn what it takes to
launch a successful company. A detailed brochure of this event is attached
herewith.

This competition has two rounds. In the first round, after completion of
your registration, you have to prepare your PPT as per the format attached
below and submit it before September 19, 2024. In the final round, selected
groups have to present their business plan in front of the jury
on September 21, 2024.

For any further querries you can contact me.


Thanks & Regards

Ms. Hemangi Oza
M. Tech Environment Engineer
Assistant Professor
Dept. of Civil Engineering
CSPIT CHARUSAT
Changa, Anand.
Mo. No.: 8780473646

--

subject: Tips for using your new inbox
snippet: Welcome to your inbox Find emails fast With the power of Google Search in your inbox, you can archive all your email and find it later in a flash. Your inbox stays tidy, and you never need to worry
content:
Tips for using your new inbox
[image: Gmail]

Welcome to your inbox
[image: Search]
Find emails fast
With the power of Google Search in your inbox, you can archive
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6576?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
all your email and find it
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6593?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
later in a flash. Your inbox stays tidy, and you never need to worry about
what to keep.
[image: Personalize]
Personalize Mail Server for Student of CHARUSAT Mail
Customize inbox backgrounds, email signatures, and other options in Mail
Server for Student of CHARUSAT Mail settings
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6562?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>.
Review and adjust your privacy and security settings at My Account
<https://myaccount.google.com/>.
[image: Organize]
Organize your email
You can organize email with labels
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/118708?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>,
which are like folders, but you can add more than one label to a message.
You can also use filters
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6579?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
to automatically sort and categorize messages as they come in.
[image: Social]
Chat and meet directly from your inbox
Message with contacts in Google Chat
<https://support.google.com/chat/answer/9341104?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
and start video meetings with up to 100 people in Google Meet
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/9822902?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
all without leaving Gmail.

Get training and tips
Find Gmail guides, tips, cheat sheets, help switching from Microsoft¬Æ
Outlook¬Æ, and more at the Google Workspace Learning Center
<https://support.google.com/a/users/answer/9259748?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
.
Visit the Learning Center
<https://support.google.com/a/users/answer/9259748?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>

Happy emailing,
The Gmail Team
[image: Google Cloud]

¬© 2024 Google LLC 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043

about important changes to your Google Cloud product or account.*
